SA20srabhu_u:95_2: yaduta samāgamāya / idaṃ ṣaṣṭham avatīrṇasya pudgalasya liṅgam /
SA20srabhu_u:96_1: punar aparam avatīrṇaḥ pudgalo mandarajaskajātīyo bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:96_2: mandamandaṃ kleśaparyavasthānam utpādayati na ca punaḥ prabandhaṃ sthāpayati,
SA20srabhu_u:96_3: aśaṭhaś ca bhavaty amāyāvī nihatamadamānāhaṃkāro guṇābhiniviṣṭo doṣadveṣṭā /
SA20srabhu_u:97_1: punar aparam avatīrṇaḥ pudgalo 'saṃlīnacitto bhavaty udāreṣv adhigamyeṣu sthāneṣu nātmānaṃ paribhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:97_3: adhimuktibahulo bhavati / idam aṣṭamam avatīrṇasya pudgalasya liṅgam /
SA20srabhu_u:98_0: imāny evaṃbhāgīyāni prabhūtāny avatīrṇānāṃ pudgalānāṃ liṅgāni veditavyāni yeṣām etat pradeśamātram ākhyātam /
SA20srabhu_u:99_0: punar etāni liṅgāni mṛdukuśalamūlasthasyāvatīrṇasya mṛdūni bhavanti,
SA20srabhu_u:99_5: imāny ucyante “avatīrṇasya pudgalasya liṅgāni” yair liṅgaiḥ samanvāgato 'vatīrṇo 'vatīrṇa iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
SA20srabhu_u:99_6: tāni punar etāni gotrasthānām avatīrṇānāṃ ca pudgalānām ānumānikāni liṅgāni (Śbh I 58) veditavyāni /
SA20srabhu_u:99_7: buddhā eva tu bhagavantaḥ paramapāramipraptāś ca śrāvakās tāyinas tatra pratyakṣadarśinaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:100_1: avatīrṇāḥ pudgalāḥ katame / asty avatīrṇaḥ pudgalo 'vatīrṇa eva na paripacyamāno na paripakvo na niṣkrāntaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:100_2: asti paripacyamāno na paripakvo na niṣkrāntaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:100_6: / ye 'pi tadanye mṛdvindriyādayaḥ pudgalāḥ gotrabhūmau nirdiṣṭā /
SA20srabhu_u:101_0: tatra yaś cāyam avatārasya svabhāvo yac ca vyavasthānaṃ yāni cemāny avatīrṇānāṃ liṅgāni ye ceme 'vatīrṇāḥ pudgalās tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipya”avatārabhūmir” ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:103_0: svabhāvas tadvyavasthānaṃ liṅgaṃ pudgala eva ca /
SA20srabhu_u:105_2: naiṣkramyabhūmiḥ katamā / āha / yac ca laukikena mārgeṇa vairāgyagamanaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:105_4: yaś ca tayoḥ sambhāraḥ, tad ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya naiṣkramyabhūmir ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:106_3: prathama eva sa samāpattyupapattike dhyāne vivekaje prītisukhe śāntadarśī bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:106_4: sa tathādarśī tadbahulavihāri san kāmavairāgyam anuprāpnoti,
SA20srabhu_u:106_6: evaṃ prathamadhyānād ūrdhvam sarvāsv adharimāsu bhūmiṣv audārikadarśi bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:106_8: sa tathādarśī tadbahulavihārī samāno yāvad ākiñcanyāyatanād vairāgyam anuprāpnoti naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ ca samāpadyate /
SA20srabhu_u:107_3: āryadharmeṣu kovidaḥ, ['phag pa'i chos rnams la bzo ba la la],
SA20srabhu_u:107_5: samudayaṃ vā samudayataḥ, nirodhaṃ vā nirodhataḥ, mārgaṃ vā mārgataḥ, śaikṣeṇa jñānadarśanena samanvāgataḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:107_6: tataś cottari mārgaṃ bhāvayaṃs traidhātukebhyo darśanabhāvanāprahātavyebhyo dharmebhya ātmānaṃ visaṃyojayati,
SA20srabhu_u:108_2: tatra saṃbhāraḥ katamaḥ / tadyathā, ātmasaṃpat, parasaṃpat, kuśalo dharmacchandaḥ, śīlasaṃvaraḥ, indriyasaṃvaraḥ, bhojane mātrajñatā, pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikānuyuktatā,
SA20srabhu_u:108_3: saṃprajānadvihāritā, kalyāṇamitratā, saddharmaśravaṇacintanā, anantarāyaḥ, tyāgaḥ, śramaṇālaṃkāraś ca, itīme dharmā laukikalokottaravairāgyagamanāya saṃbhāra ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:109_1: tatra yā cātmasaṃpat parasaṃpat kuśalaś ca dharmacchanda eṣāṃ pūrvavad vibhāgo veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:110_1: tatra śīlasaṃvaraḥ katamaḥ / yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śīlavān viharati,
SA20srabhu_u:111_1: kathaṃ śīlavān viharati / yathāsamātteṣu śikṣāpadeṣv avipannakāyakarmāntaś ca bhavaty avipannavākkarmāntaś ca,
SA20srabhu_u:112_3: ta ete nikāyabhedena bahavaḥ saṃvarā bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:112_4: asmiṃs tv arthe bhikṣusaṃvaram adhiṣṭhāyāha prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃvṛtah/
SA20srabhu_u:113_3: yathāpi tad īryāpathaṃ vetikaraṇīyaṃ vā kuśalapakṣaprayogaṃ vādhiṣṭhāya lokānuvartinā lokānutkrāntena vinayānuvartinā vinayānutkrāntena cācāreṇa samanvāgato bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:114_1: tatreryāpathādhiṣṭhāna ācāraḥ kathaṃ na lokotkrānto na vinayotkrāntaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:114_2: yathāpi tad yatra caṃkramitavyaṃ yathā caṃkramitavyaṃ tatra tathā caṃkramyate,
SA20srabhu_u:114_3: yena na lokagarhito bhavati na satāṃ samyaggatānāṃ satpuruṣāṇāṃ sahadhārmikāṇāṃ vinayadharāṇāṃ vinayaśikṣitānām avadyo bhavati garhyasthānīyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:114_4: yathā caṅkrama evaṃ sthānaṃ niṣadyā śayyā veditavyā /
SA20srabhu_u:115_1: tatretikaraṇīyādhiṣṭhāna ācāraḥ kathaṃ na lokotkrānto bhavati na vinayotkrāntaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:115_2: itikaraṇīyam ucyate cīvarācchādanam uccāraprasrāvam udakadantakāṣṭhaṃ grāmapraveśaḥ piṇḍapātanirhāraparibhogaḥ pātranirmādanaṃ sthāpanaṃ ca pādaprakṣālanaṃ śayanāsanaprajñaptiḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:115_4: yad vā punar evaṃbhāgīyaṃ kiṃcit tad itikaraṇīyam ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:115_6: yathā ca kalpayitavyaṃ tatra tathā kalpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:115_10: evam itikaraṇīyādhiṣṭhāna ācāro lokānutkrānto bhavati vinayānutkrāntaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:116_2: tatra kuśalapakṣaprayogādhiṣṭhāna ācāraḥ kathaṃ lokānutkrāntaś ca bhavati vinayānutkrāntaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:116_3: kuśalapakṣa ucyate tadyathā svādhyāyo gurūṇām sāmīcīkarmopasthānaṃ ca,
SA20srabhu_u:116_4: tathā glānopasthānam, anyo 'nyam anukampācittam upasthāpya cchandadānaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:116_9: iti ya evaṃbhāgīyā apy anye dharmā ayam ucyate kuśalapakṣaprayogaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:116_10: sa evaṃ kuśalapakṣaprayogo yathāyogaṃ yathā parikīrtitaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:116_12: yena nānuyojyo bhavati garhito laukikānāṃ vinayadharāṇāṃ vinayaśikṣitānāṃ satāṃ samyaggatānām satpuruṣāṇāṃ sahadhārmikāṇām /
SA20srabhu_u:116_13: ayam ucyate kuśalapakṣaprayogādhiṣṭhāna ācāro lokānutkrānto vinayānutkrāntaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:116_14: ya ebhir ākāraiḥ saṃpanna ācāra iyam ucyata ācārasaṃpat /
SA20srabhu_u:117_2: pañca bhikṣor agocarāḥ / katame pañca / tadyathā ghoṣo veśyaṃ pānāgāro rājakulaṃ caṇḍālakaṭhinam eva pañcamam iti /
SA20srabhu_u:117_3: ya etāṃs tathāgatapratikṣiptān agocarān varjayitvānyatra gocare caraty anavadye tatra kālenaivaṃ gocarasaṃpanno bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:118_5: punas tathā hi tasyā adhyāpatter alpakṛcchreṇa vyuttiṣṭhate,
SA20srabhu_u:118_6: yena tad aṇumātram ity (Śbh I 68) ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:118_8: “mā haivāham eṣām adhyāpattihetor abhavyo vā syām aprāptasya prāptaye,
SA20srabhu_u:118_10: apāyago vā syām apāyagāmī, ātmā vā me apavadet, śāstā vā devatā vā vijñā vā sabrahmacāriṇo dharmatayā vigarheyuḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:118_12: sa ebhyo dṛṣṭadharmasāṃparāyikebhyas taddhetukebhyo 'niṣṭebhyo dharmebhyo bhayadarśī bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:118_13: yena tāni kṣudrāṇukṣudrāṇi śikṣāpadāni jīvitahetor api na saṃcintyādhyāpadyate /
SA20srabhu_u:118_14: kadācit karhicit smṛtisaṃpramoṣād adhyāpanno laghu laghv eva yathādharmaṃ pratikaroti vyuttiṣṭhate /
SA20srabhu_u:119_2: āha / pūrvam anena prātimokṣasaṃvarasamādāne jñapticaturthena karmaṇopasaṃpadyamānena katipayānāṃ śikṣāpadānāṃ śarīraṃ śrutaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:119_3: sātirekaṃ ca tadanyam ardhatṛtīyaṃ śikṣāpadaśataṃ prātimokṣasūtroddiṣṭaṃ pratijñayaivopagataṃ “sarvatra śikṣiṣyāmī”ti,
SA20srabhu_u:119_7: tataś ca tena sarvaśikṣāpadasamādānāt prātimokṣasaṃvaraḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:119_8: tata uttarakālaṃ yeṣu śikṣāpadeṣu kuśalo bhavati tāni tāvan nādhyāpadyate /
SA20srabhu_u:119_10: yeṣu punaḥ (Śbh I 70) śikṣāpadeṣv akuśalo bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:119_11: avyutpannabuddhiḥ tāni pūrvaṃ pratijñāsamādānena samādattāny etarhi vyutpattikauśalyatayā samādadāti /
SA20srabhu_u:119_12: tebhyaḥ pūrvaṃ yathāparikīrtitebhyaḥ sthānebhya ācāryasya vopādhyāyasya vā pūrvavat,
SA20srabhu_u:119_14: yathānuśiṣṭo 'nyūnam anadhikaṃ śikṣate teṣu gurugurusthānīyavyapadiṣṭeṣu śikṣāpadeṣu,
SA20srabhu_u:119_15: aviparītagrāhī ca bhavaty arthasya vyañjanasya ca /
SA20srabhu_u:120_1: tatra katamaḥ samāsārthaḥ / tatrāyaṃ samāsārthas trilakṣaṇa eva śīlaskandhaḥ paridīpito bhagavatā,
SA20srabhu_u:121_1: yathā katham iti yat tāvad āha śīlavān viharatīty anena tāvad avipraṇāśalakṣaṇaṃ śīlasaṃvarasyākhyātam /
SA20srabhu_u:122_1: yat punar āha prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃvṛta ity anena svabhāvalakṣaṇam ākhyātam //
SA20srabhu_u:123_1: yat punar āha / ācāragocarasaṃpanna iti, anena param upanidhāya tathā samādattasya prātimokṣasaṃvarasya guṇalakṣaṇam ākhyātam /
SA20srabhu_u:124_0: tathāpi pare tām ācāragocarasaṃpadam upalabhyāprasannāś ca prasīdanti,
SA20srabhu_u:124_3: na ca manāṃsi pradūṣayanti, nāvarṇaṃ niścārayanti / anyathā śīlasaṃpannasyācāragocarasaṃpannasyāyaṃ parādhipateyo guṇa ānuśaṃsā na bhavet,
SA20srabhu_u:124_4: (Śbh I 72) etadviparyayeṇa vāsya doṣa eva bhavet /
SA20srabhu_u:125_0: yat punar āha / aṇumātreṣv avadyeṣu bhayadarśī samādāya śikṣate śīkṣāpadeṣv iti,
SA20srabhu_u:125_2: tat kasya hetoḥ / yad apy evam ācāragocarasaṃpannaḥ parādhipateyaṃ guṇānuśaṃsaṃ pratilabheta,
SA20srabhu_u:125_3: api tu śīlaṃ vipādayitvā taddhetos tatpratyayam apāyeṣūpapadyate /
SA20srabhu_u:126_0: yat punar aṇumātreṣv avadyeṣu bhayadarśī bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:126_1: prāg evādhimātreṣu samādāya ca śikṣate śikṣāpadeṣu tasmāt taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt sugatāv upapadyate /
SA20srabhu_u:126_2: bhavyo vā bhavaty aprāptasya prāptaye pūrvavad /
SA20srabhu_u:126_3: anena kāraṇenādhyātmādhipateyo 'yaṃ śīlasaṃvarasya guṇānuśaṃsa ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:127_1: aparaḥ punaḥ paryāyaḥ / samāsato bhagavatā samādattaśīlatā paridīpitā,
SA20srabhu_u:128_0: tatra yat tāvad āha / “śīlavān viharatī”ty anena samādattaśīlatākhyātā //
SA20srabhu_u:129_1: yat punar āha / “prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃvṛta” ity anena nairyāṇikaśīlatākhyātā /
SA20srabhu_u:129_2: tathā hi prātimokṣasaṃvarasaṃgṛhītaṃ śīlam adhiśīlaṃ śikṣety ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:129_4: adhicittaṃ ca, adhiprajñaṃ ca sikṣāṃ bhāvayaty,
SA20srabhu_u:129_6: yadutādhiśīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya pūrvaṃgamaṃ kṛtvā tasmāt prātimokṣasaṃvaro nairyāṇikaṃ śīlam ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:130_1: yat punar āha / “ācāragocarasaṃpanno 'ṇumātreṣv avadyeṣu bhayadarśī samādāya śikṣate śikṣāpadeṣv” ity anena śīlabhāvanākhyātā /
SA20srabhu_u:130_3: evaṃ ca bhāvitaṃ subhāvitaṃ (Śbh I 74) bhavatīti /
SA20srabhu_u:131_0: sa eṣa ekaḥ śīlasaṃvaraḥ ṣaḍākāradeśanāpratyupasthāno veditavyaḥ //
SA20srabhu_u:132_1: sa khalu eṣa śīlasaṃvaro daśabhiḥ kāraṇair vipanno veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:133_1: ādita eva durgṛhīto bhavati, atilīno bhavati, atisṛto bhavati, pramādakausīdyaparigṛhīto bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:133_4: antadvayapatito bhavati, anairyāṇiko bhavati, samādānaparibhraṣṭaś ca bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:134_1: tatra katham ādito durgṛhītaṃ śīlaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:134_3: caurābhinirṇīto vā, ṛṇārto vā, bhayārto vā, ajīvikā bhayabhīto vā, na śrāmaṇyāya, na brāhmaṇyāya, nātmaśamāya, nātmadamāya, nātmaparinirvāṇāya / evam ādito durgṛhīto bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:135_1: katham atilīno bhavati / yathāpīhaikatyo 'lajjī bhavati mandakaukṛtyaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:136_1: katham atisṛto bhavati / yathāpīhaikatyo durgṛhītagrāhī bhavaty asthānakaukṛtyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:136_3: asthāne pareṣām antike paribhavacittaṃ vāghātaṃ votpādayati pravedayati /
SA20srabhu_u:137_3: yathāpīhaikatyo yām atītam adhvānam upādāyāpattim āpannaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:137_4: sā cānena smṛtisaṃpramoṣād ekatyā na yathādharmaṃ pratikṛtā bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:137_5: yathātītam adhvānam upādāya, evam anāgataṃ vartamānam adhvānam upādāya yām āpattim āpanno bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:137_6: sā cānena smṛtisaṃpramoṣād ekatyā na yathādharmaṃ pratikṛtā bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:137_7: na ca pūrvam evāpatter āyatyām anadhyāpattaye tīvram autsukyam āpadyate,
SA20srabhu_u:137_8: yan nv “ahaṃ tathā tathā careyaṃ vihareyam,
SA20srabhu_u:137_9: yathā yathā caran viharaṃś cāpattiṃ nādhyāpadyeya” /
SA20srabhu_u:137_10: tathā ca tathā carati viharati yathāpattim adhyāpadyate /
SA20srabhu_u:137_11: so 'nena pūrvāntasahagatenāparāntasahagatena madhyāntasahagatena pūrvakālakaraṇīyena sahānucareṇa ca pramādena samanvāgataḥ nidrāsukhaṃ śayanasukhaṃ pārśvasukhaṃ ca svīkaroti /
SA20srabhu_u:137_12: adakṣaś ca bhavaty alasaḥ, anutthānasaṃpannaḥ, na kartā bhavati vijñānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ kāyena vaiyāpṛtyam /
SA20srabhu_u:138_3: “anenāhaṃ śīlena vā vratena vā tapasā vā brahmacaryavāsena vā devo vā syāṃ devānyatamo vā” /
SA20srabhu_u:139_2: yathāpīhaikatya īryāpathaṃ vādhiṣṭhāyetikaraṇīyaṃ vā kuśalapakṣaprayogaṃ vā lokotkrāntaś ca bhavati vinayotkrāntaś ca pūrvavad /
SA20srabhu_u:140_2: yathāpīhaikatyo maheccho bhavaty asaṃtuṣṭo duṣpoṣo durbharajātīyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:140_3: sa cādharmeṇa cīvaraṃ (Śbh I 78) paryeṣate na dharmeṇa,
SA20srabhu_u:140_4: adharmeṇa piṇḍapātaṃ śayanāsanaṃ glānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ paryeṣate na dharmeṇa /
SA20srabhu_u:140_5: sa ca cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaisajyapariṣkārahetor ātmano guṇasaṃbhāvanānimittam aprākṛtaṃ viṭhapitam īryāpathaṃ kalpayati,
SA20srabhu_u:140_6: anuddhatendriyatām acapalendriyatāṃ śāntendriyatāṃ ca pareṣām upadarśayati /
SA20srabhu_u:140_7: yenāsya pare guṇasaṃbhāvanājñātā dātavyaṃ kartavyaṃ manyante,
SA20srabhu_u:140_9: dhvāṅkṣaś ca bhavati mukharaḥ pragalbhaḥ kelāyitā nāmagotrodgṛhītā bahuśruto bhavati dharmadharaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:140_10: lābhakāraṇād eva ca pareṣāṃ dharmaṃ saṃlapati buddhabhāṣitaṃ vā śrāvakabhāṣitaṃ vā,
SA20srabhu_u:140_11: ātmano vā guṇān bhūtān vā kiṃcid vā punaḥ samāropya svayam eva vaktā bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:140_12: lāpayati vā paraiḥ / anuttareṇa vopadarśayitā, cīvarārthī vā, anyatamānyatamena vā śrāmaṇakena pariṣkāreṇārthī prabhūtena vāgratareṇa vā /
SA20srabhu_u:140_14: apy evarn śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayaḥ cīvareṇa vighātaṃ saṃlakṣayitvā prabhūtaṃ praṇītaṃ cīvaraṃ dātavyaṃ kartavyaṃ maṃsyante /
SA20srabhu_u:140_15: yathā cīvaram evam anyatamānyatamaṃ śrāmaṇakaṃ jīvitapariṣkāram /
SA20srabhu_u:140_16: śrāddhānāṃ ca brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām antikād yathākāmaṃ vālabhamānaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:140_17: asatsu vāsaṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣv alabhamāna evaṃ coparodhena yācate niṣpiṣya,
SA20srabhu_u:140_19: hīnaṃ vā punar labdhvā tathā saṃvidyamāneṣu bhogeṣu taṃ lābhaṃ paṃsayaty avasādayati /
SA20srabhu_u:140_20: saṃmukhaṃ ca dātāraṃ dānapatim evaṃ cāha “haṃ bho,

SA20srabhu_u:193_3: evaṃ nimittagrāhī bhavati yaduta cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu (Śbh I 106) /
SA20srabhu_u:193_4: sacet punas taṃ gocaraṃ parivarjayati cakṣurvijñanasyaivaṃ na nimittagrāhī bhavati cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu /
SA20srabhu_u:193_5: yathā cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣv evaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñeyeṣu dharmeṣu /
SA20srabhu_u:194_2_0: anuvyañjanagrāha ucyate, yas teṣv eva cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu cakṣurvijñānasyaiva
SA20srabhu_u:194_2_1: samanantarasahotpannasya vikalpakasya manovijñānasya yo gocaraḥ saṃrāgāya vā saṃdveṣāya
SA20srabhu_u:194_4: evam anuvyañjanagrāhi bhavati yad uta cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu /
SA20srabhu_u:194_5: taṃ gocaraṃ parivarjayati, notpādayati tadālambanaṃ tan manovijñānam evaṃ nānuvyañjanagrāhī bhavati yaduta cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu /
SA20srabhu_u:195_2: tatra nimittagrāho yac cakṣuṣā rūpāṇy ābhāsagatāni tajjaṃ manaskāraṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya paśyati /
SA20srabhu_u:195_3: tatrānuvyañjanagrāhaḥ, tāny eva rūpāṇi cakṣusābhāsagatāni tajjaṃ (Śbh I 108) manasikāraṃ saṃmukhikṛtya paśyati,
SA20srabhu_u:195_5_0: śṛṇoti “santy evaṃrūpāṇy evaṃrūpāṇi cakṣurvijñeyāṃ rūpāṇī”ti yāni tāni tadanugatāni
SA20srabhu_u:195_5_1: nāmāni padāni vyañjanāni yāny adhipatiṃ kṛtvā yāni niśritya yāni pratiṣṭhāyāyaṃ puruṣapudgalo
SA20srabhu_u:196_1: sa punar ayaṃ nimittagrāho 'nuvyañjanagrāhaś cāsti yannidānam asya yadadhikaraṇaṃ yadadhipateyam asya pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anusravanti /
SA20srabhu_u:196_2: asti yan na tannidānaṃ na tadadhikaraṇaṃ na tadadhipateyaṃ pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anusravanti /
SA20srabhu_u:196_3: tatra yo 'yaṃ nimittagrāho 'nuvyañjanagrāhaś cāyoniśogrāhaḥ yannidānaṃ yadadhikaraṇaṃ yadadhipateyam asya pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anusravanti /
SA20srabhu_u:196_4: tadrūpam asau nimittagrāham anuvyañjanagrāhaṃ ca parivarjayati /
SA20srabhu_u:197_3: dveṣo, mohaḥ, mohasamutthāpitaṃ ca kāyaduścaritaṃ vāgduścaritaṃ manoduścaritam ima ucyante “pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ” /
SA20srabhu_u:198_3: tadālambanās tadālambanās tena cittamanovijñānena saṃprayuktāḥ kāyavāṅmanoduṣcaritasamutthāpakās te rāgadveṣamohā utpadyante gacchanti pratisaranti /
SA20srabhu_u:199_2: evaṃ tāvan nimittagrāheṇānuvyañjanagrāheṇa ca ya utpadyate saṃkleśaś cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu yāvan manovijñeyeṣu dharmeṣu,
SA20srabhu_u:199_3: so 'sya notpadyate nimittagrāham anuvyañjanagrāhaṃ ca parivarjayataḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:199_4: sacet punaḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣād vā kleśapracuratayā vā,
SA20srabhu_u:199_5: ekākino 'pi viharataḥ pūrvadṛṣṭāni cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇy adhipatiṃ kṛtvā,
SA20srabhu_u:199_8: tān utpannān nādhivāsayati prajahāti viśodhayati vyantīkaroti /
SA20srabhu_u:200_1: sa yeṣu rūpeṣu cakṣuḥ prerayitavyaṃ bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:200_2: yeṣu śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñeyeṣu dharmeṣu manaḥ prerayitavyaṃ bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:200_3: teṣu tathā prerayati yathā na saṃkliśyate /
SA20srabhu_u:200_4: evam anena tasmāt saṃkleśān mana-indriyaṃ rakṣitaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:201_1: yeṣu punaś cakṣurvijñeyeṣu rūpeṣu cakṣurindriyaṃ na prerayitavyaṃ bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:201_2: yeṣu śrotraghrāṇajihvākāya manovijñeyeṣu dharmeṣu mana-indriyaṃ na prerayitavyaṃ bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:201_3: teṣu sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā na prerayati /
SA20srabhu_u:203_2: samāsārthaḥ / yena ca saṃvṛṇoti, yac ca saṃvṛṇoti, yataś ca saṃvṛṇoti, yathā ca saṃvṛṇoti, yā cāsau saṃvṛtiḥ, tat sarvam ekadhyam abhisamkṣipya indriyasaṃvara” ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:204_0: tatra kena saṃvṛṇoti / yārakṣitā ca smṛtis [dran pa la rtag 'grus byed pa bsgom pa gaṅ yin pa ste] tayā saṃvṛṇoti /
SA20srabhu_u:205_0: kiṃ saṃvṛṇoti / cakṣurindriyaṃ saṃvṛṇoti / śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamana-indriyaṃ saṃvṛṇoti /
SA20srabhu_u:206_0: kutaḥ saṃvṛṇoti / priyarūpāpriyarūpebhyo rūpebhyaḥ śabdebhyo yāvad dharmebhyo 'taḥ saṃvṛṇtoti //
SA20srabhu_u:207_0: kathaṃ saṃvṛṇoti / na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyañjanagrāhī,
SA20srabhu_u:207_1: yato 'dhikaraṇam eva pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anusravanti /
SA20srabhu_u:209_1: punar aparaḥ samāsārthaḥ / yaś ca saṃvaropāyaḥ, yac ca saṃvaraṇīyaṃ vastu, yā ca saṃvṛtiḥ / tad ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya “indriyasaṃvara” ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:210_0: tatra katamaḥ saṃvaropāyaḥ / yad āha / ārakṣitasmṛtir bhavati nipakasmṛtir iti cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyañjanagrāhī,
SA20srabhu_u:210_1: yāvan manasā dharmān vijñāya na nimittagrāhī bhavati nānuvyañjanagrāhī,
SA20srabhu_u:210_2: yato 'dhikaraṇaṃ eva pāpakā akuśalā dharmāś cittam anusravanti /
SA20srabhu_u:211_0: saṃvaraṇīyaṃ vastu katamat / cakṣū rūpaṃ caivaṃ yāvan mano dharmāś cedam ucyate saṃvaraṇīyaṃ vastu /
SA20srabhu_u:212_0: tatra saṃvṛtiḥ katamā / yad āha / smṛtyārakṣitamānaso bhavati samāvasthāvacāraka itīyam ucyate saṃvṛtiḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:213_1: sa khalv ayam indriyasaṃvaraḥ samāsato dvividhaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:214_1: yena viṣayeṣv ādīnavaṃ paśyati no tu tam ādīnavaṃ vyapakarṣati prajahāti /
SA20srabhu_u:215_0: tatra bhāvanābalasaṃgṛhītaḥ, yena viṣayeṣv ādīnavaṃ paśyati,
SA20srabhu_u:215_1: taṃ ca punar ādīnavaṃ vyāpakarṣati prajahāti /
SA20srabhu_u:216_0: tatra pratisaṃkhyānabalasaṃgṛhītenendriyasaṃvarena viṣayālambanaṃ kleśaparyavasthānaṃ notpādayati na saṃmukhīkaroti /
SA20srabhu_u:217_0: tatra bhāvanābalasaṃgṛhītenendriyasaṃvareṇa viṣayālambanaṃ ca kleśaparyavasthānaṃ notpādayati na saṃmukhīkaroti /
SA20srabhu_u:217_1: sarvadā sarvakālam āśrayasanniviṣṭaṃ cānuśayaṃ prajahāti samudghātayati /
SA20srabhu_u:218_0: ayaṃ viśeṣo 'yam abhiprāya idaṃ nānākaraṇaṃ pratisaṃkhyānabalasaṃgṛhītasya bhāvanābalasaṃgṛhītasya cendriyasaṃvarasya /
SA20srabhu_u:219_1: yaḥ punar bhāvanābalasaṃgṛhīta indriyasaṃvaraḥ sa vairāgyabhūmipatito veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:220_2: bhojane mātrajñatā katamā / yathāpīhaikatyaḥ pratisaṃkhyāyāhāram āharati /
SA20srabhu_u:220_3: na dravārthaṃ, na madārtham, na maṇḍanārthaṃ, na vibhūsaṇārtham iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20srabhu_u:221_2: pratisaṃkhyocyate prajñā, yayā prajñayā kavaḍaṃkārasyāhārasyādīnavaṃ samanupaśyaty ādīnavadarśanena ca vidūṣayitvābhyavaharati /
SA20srabhu_u:222_2: yaduta yasyaiva kavaḍaṃkārasya paribhogānvayo vā vipariṇāmānvayo vā paryeṣaṇānvayo vā /
SA20srabhu_u:223_2_0: yathāpīhaikatyo yasmin samaya āhāram āharati varṇasaṃpannam api gandhasaṃpannam api
SA20srabhu_u:223_2_1: rasasaṃpannam api supraṇītam api tasya kavaḍaṃkāra āhāraḥ samanantarakṣipta evāsye
SA20srabhu_u:223_2_2: yadā dantayantravicūrṇitaś ca lālāvisaraviklinnaś ca bhavati lālāpariveṣṭitaś ca
SA20srabhu_u:223_3: sa tasmin samaye kaṇṭhanālīpraluṭhitaś ca bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:223_4: sa yāsau pūrvikā purāṇā manāpatā tāṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ vijahāti /
SA20srabhu_u:223_5: parāṃ ca vikṛtim āpadyate / yasyāṃ ca vikṛtau vartamānaś charditakopamaḥ khyāti /
SA20srabhu_u:223_6: tadavasthaṃ cainaṃ saced ayaṃ bhoktā puruṣapudgalaḥ saced ākārato (Śbh I 118) manasikuryāt samanusmaret,
SA20srabhu_u:223_7: nāsya sarveṇa sarvam anyatrāpi tāvad avipariṇate,
SA20srabhu_u:223_9: kaḥ punar vādas tatra tadavastha iti /
SA20srabhu_u:223_10: ya ebhir ākārair anekavidhair anayānupūrvyā bhojanaparibhogam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā yāsau śubhā varṇanibhā antardhīyate,
SA20srabhu_u:224_2: tasya tam āhāram āhṛtavatas bhuktavato yadā vipariṇamati rātryā madhyame vā yāme,
SA20srabhu_u:224_3: paścime vā yāme, tadā sa rudhiramāṃsasnāyvasthitvagādīny anekavidhāni bahunānāprakārāṇy asmin kāye 'śucidravyāṇi vivardhayati saṃjanayati /
SA20srabhu_u:224_4: [de dag las la la ni bśaṅ ba daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:224_5: gci ba'i dṅos por yoṅs su 'ju bar 'gyur źiṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:224_7: yad asya divase śocayitavyaṃ ca bhavati tena ca yaḥ spṛṣṭo bhavati hasto vā pādo vā,
SA20srabhu_u:224_9: tad vijugupsanīyaṃ bhavaty ātmanaḥ pareṣāṃ ca /
SA20srabhu_u:224_10: tannidānāś cāsyotpadyante kāye bahavaḥ kāyikā ābādhāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:224_11_0: tadyathā gaṇḍaḥ, piṭakaḥ, dadrū, vicarcikā, kaṇḍūḥ, kuṣṭhaḥ, kiṭibhaḥ, kilāsaḥ, jvaraḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:224_11_1: kāsaḥ, śothaḥ, śoṣaḥ, apasmāraḥ, āṭakkaraṃ, pāṇḍurogaḥ, rudhiraṃ, pittabhagandara
SA20srabhu_u:224_11_2: itīme cānye 'py evaṃbhāgīyāḥ kāye kāyikā ābādhā utpadyante /
SA20srabhu_u:225_2: yathāpīhaikatya āhārahetor āhāranidānaṃ śīte śītena hanyamānaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:225_3_0: uṣṇe uṣṇena hanyamānaḥ, utsahate, ghaṭate, vyāyacchate / kṛṣiṇā vā, gorakṣyeṇa vā,
SA20srabhu_u:225_4: upacayāya vā, yathāhārasyaivam āhāranidānasya tasyaivam utsahataḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:225_5: ghaṭataḥ, vyāyacchataḥ / sacet te karmāntā vipadyante sa tannidānaṃ śocati,
SA20srabhu_u:225_6: klāmyati, paridevate, uras tāḍayati, krandati, saṃmoham āpadyate / “moho bata me vyāyāmo niṣphala” iti /
SA20srabhu_u:226_1: sacet saṃpadyate sa tasyārakṣādhikaraṇahetos tīvram autsukyam āpadyate /
SA20srabhu_u:226_2: “kaccin me bhogā rājñā vāpahriyeraṃś caurair vā,
SA20srabhu_u:226_7: kule vā kulāṅgāra utpadyeta, yas tān bhogān anayena vyasanam āpādayet” /
SA20srabhu_u:227_2: yathāpi tad āhāranidānam āhārādhikaraṇahetor mātā putrasyāvarṇaṃ bhāṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:227_3: putro mātuḥ, pitā putrasya, putraḥ pituḥ, bhrātā bhaginyā, bhaginī bhrātuḥ, sahāyakaḥ sahāyakasya, prāgeva jano janasya, te cānyo 'nyaṃ vigṛhītā bhavanti,
SA20srabhu_u:227_4: vivādam āpannās tathodārā brāhmaṇakṣatriyagṛhapatimahāsālā āhārādhikaraṇahetor evaṃ vigṛhītā vivādam āpannāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:227_6: loṣṭenāpi, daṇḍenāpi, śastreṇāpi praharanti / ayam ucyate snehaparibhraṃśakṛta ādīnavaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:228_2: yathāpi tad rājānaḥ kṣatriyā mūrddhābhiṣiktāḥ sveṣu grāma nigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣv asaṃtuṣṭā viharanta ubhayato vyūhakāni saṃgrāmānīkāni pratisaranti śaṃkhaiḥ kaṃpyamānaiḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:228_3: paṭahair vādyamānaiḥ, iṣubhiḥ kṣipyamāṇair vividhais te tatra bhrāntenāśvena sārdhaṃ samāgacchanti bhrāntena hastinā,
SA20srabhu_u:228_5: iṣubhiḥ śaktibhir vāpakṛttagātrā maraṇaṃ vā nigacchanti maraṇamātrakam vā duḥkham /
SA20srabhu_u:228_6: ayam ucyate 'tṛptikṛta ādīnava iti yo vā punar anyo 'py evaṃbhāgīyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:229_3: yathāpi tad rājñaḥ pauruṣeyā āvarodhikāni nagarāṇy anupraskandataḥ taptenāpi tailenāvasicyante,
SA20srabhu_u:229_4: taptayā vasayā, taptayā gomayaloḍikayā, taptena tāmreṇa, taptenāyasā / iṣubhiḥ śaktibhiś cāpakṛttagātrā maraṇaṃ vā nigacchanti maraṇamātrakaṃ vā duḥkham /
SA20srabhu_u:229_5: ayam ucyate 'svātantryakṛta ādīnava iti yo vā punar anyo 'py evaṃbhāgīyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:230_2: yathāpi tad ekatyenāhāranidānaṃ prabhūtaṃ kāyena duścaritaṃ kṛtaṃ bhavaty upacitaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:230_3: yathā kāyenaivaṃ vācā manasā sa ca yasmin samaya ābādhiko bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:230_4: duḥkhito, bādhaglānaḥ, tasya tat pūrvakaṃ kāyaduścaritaṃ vāṅmanoduścaritam,
SA20srabhu_u:230_7: tasyaivaṃ bhavati / “kṛtaṃ bata me pāpaṃ na kṛtaṃ bata me puṇyaṃ kāyena vācā manasā,
SA20srabhu_u:230_8: so 'haṃ yā gatiḥ kṛtapāpānāṃ gatiṃ pretya gamiṣyāmī”ti vipratisārī kālaṃ karoti kālaṃ ca kṛtvā 'pāyeṣūpapadyate yaduta narakeṣu tiryakpreteṣu /
SA20srabhu_u:231_1: tasyaivaṃ bhavati / ity ayam āhāraḥ paryeṣyamāṇo 'pi sādīnavaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:231_4: evam asti punar asyāhārasya kācid anuśaṃsamātrā,
SA20srabhu_u:231_5: sā punaḥ katamā / āhārasthitiko 'yaṃ kāya āhāraṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati /
SA20srabhu_u:232_0: (Śbh I 126) evam asyāhārasthitiko 'yaṃ kāyḥ suciram api tiṣṭhañ ca varṣaśataṃ vā tiṣṭhati /
SA20srabhu_u:232_1: kiṃcid vā punar bhūyaḥ samyak parihriyamāṇaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:232_2: asti cāsyārvāg uparatiḥ / tatra ye kāyasthitimātre pratipannāḥ na te supratipannāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:232_3: ye kāyasthitimātrakeṇa saṃtuṣṭā na ca te susaṃtuṣṭā,
SA20srabhu_u:232_4: na ca punas ta āhārakṛtaṃ paripūrṇam anavadyaṃ anuśaṃsaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:232_7: api tu tām eva kāyasthitiṃ niśritya brahmacaryaṃ samudāgamāya pratipannāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:232_8: te supratipannāḥ, ta eva ca punaḥ paripūrṇam anavadyam anuśaṃsaṃ pratyanubhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:233_1: “tan na me pratirūpaṃ syād yad vā pratyavareṇāhārānuśaṃsamātrakeṇa saṃtuṣṭo vihareyam /
SA20srabhu_u:233_2: na me pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ bālasabhāgatāṃ bālasahadhārmikatām adhyāpadyeyam” /
SA20srabhu_u:233_3: evam āhāre sarvākāraṃ paripūrṇam ādīnavaṃ jñātvā sa itaḥ pratisaṃkhyāyādīnavadarsī,
SA20srabhu_u:233_4: niḥsaraṇānveṣī cāhāraniḥsaraṇārtham eva putramāṃsopamam āhāram āharati /
SA20srabhu_u:234_0: tasyaivaṃ bhavati / “evam ete dāyakadānapatayaḥ kṛcchreṇa bhogān samudānīya,
SA20srabhu_u:234_3: yadutānukampām upādāya viśeṣaphalārthinas tasyāsmākaṃ tathā pratilabdhasya piṇḍapātasyāyam evaṃrūpo 'nurūpaḥ paribhogaḥ syāt /
SA20srabhu_u:234_4: yad ahaṃ tathā (Śbh I 128 ) paribhūtam ātmānaṃ sthāpayitvā paribhuñjīya,
SA20srabhu_u:234_5: yathā teṣāṃ kārāḥ kṛtā atyarthaṃ mahāphalāḥ syur mahānuśaṃsā mahādyutayo mahāvistārāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:234_6: candropamaś ca kulāny upasaṃkrameyaṃ vyavakṛṣya kāyaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:234_8: anātmotkarsī, aparapansī / yathā svena lābhena sucittaḥ syāṃ sumanāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:234_9: evaṃ parasyāpi lābhena sucittaḥ syāṃ sumanāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:234_11: tat kuta etal labhyaṃ pravrajitena parakuleṣu yad dadatu me pare mā na dadatu /
SA20srabhu_u:234_12_0: satkṛtya, māsatkṛtya, prabhūtaṃ mā stokaṃ, praṇītaṃ mā lūhaṃ, tvaritaṃ mā dhandham /
SA20srabhu_u:234_12_1: evaṃ caritasya me kulāny upasaṃkrāmataḥ sacet pare na dadyus tenāhaṃ na teṣām antika

SA20srabhu_u:283_3: “caṅkrama” ucyata āyate vipulamāpite pṛthivīpradeśe gamanapratyāgamanapratisaṃyuktaṃ kāyakarma /
SA20srabhu_u:283_4: “niṣadyā” ucyate yathāpīhaikatyo mañce vā pīṭhe vā tṛṇasaṃstare vā niṣīdati,
SA20srabhu_u:283_5: paryaṅkam ābhujya, ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāyābhimukhīṃ smṛtim upasthāpya /
SA20srabhu_u:283_7: āvaraṇīyā dharmā ye nivaraṇasthānīyā dharmā nivaraṇāhārakāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:283_8_0: te punaḥ katame / kāmacchandaḥ, vyāpādaḥ, styānamiddham, auddhatyakaukṛtyam, vicikitsā,
SA20srabhu_u:283_8_1: śubhatā pratighanimittam andhakāro jñātijanapadāmaravitarkaḥ paurāṇasya ca hasitakrīḍitaramitaparivāritasyānusmṛtiḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:283_12: katibhyaś ca pariśodhayati / styānamiddhāt styānamiddhāhārakāc cāvaraṇāt pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhu_u:283_13: ālokanimittam anena sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca sugṛhītaṃ bhavati sumanasikṛtam sujuṣṭaṃ supratividdham /
SA20srabhu_u:283_14: sa ālokasahagatena suprabhāsasahagatena cittena channe vā,
SA20srabhu_u:283_15: abhyavakāśe vā, caṅkrame caṅkramyamāṇaḥ anyatamānyatamena prasadanīyenālambanena cittaṃ saṃdarśayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati /
SA20srabhu_u:283_18: kaye vā punar anena styānamiddhādīnavapratisaṃyuktā dharmāḥ śrutā bhavanty udgṛhītā dhṛtāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:283_23: pareṣāṃ vā prakāśayati, arthaṃ vā cintayati tulayaty upaparīksate,
SA20srabhu_u:283_24: diśo vā vyavalokayati, candranakṣatragrahatārāsu vā dṛṣṭiṃ cārayati,
SA20srabhu_u:283_25: udakena mukham ākledayati / evam asya tat styānamiddhaparyavasthānam anutpannaṃ ca notpadyate,
SA20srabhu_u:283_27: evam anena tasmād āvaraṇīyād dharmāc cittaṃ pariśodhitaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:284_1: tatra niṣadyayā katamebhya āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhu_u:284_4: kāmacchandād vyāpādād auddhatyakaukṛtyād vicikitsāyās tadāhārakebhyaś ca dharmebhyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:285_1: sa utpanne vā kāmacchandaparyavasthāne prativinodanāyānutpanne vā dūrīkaraṇāya,
SA20srabhu_u:285_2: niṣadya paryaṅkam ābhujya, ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya pratimukhaṃ smṛtim upasthāpya,
SA20srabhu_u:285_3: vinīlakaṃ vā vipūyakaṃ vā vipaḍumakaṃ vā vyādhmātakaṃ vikhāditakaṃ vā vilohitakaṃ vāsthiṃ vā śaṃkalikāṃ vānyatamānyatamaṃ bhadrakaṃ samādhinimittaṃ manasikaroti /
SA20srabhu_u:285_4: ye vā punar anena dharmāḥ kāmarāgaprahāṇam evārabhya kāmacchandaprahāṇāyodgṛhītā bhavanti,
SA20srabhu_u:285_5: dhṛtā vacasā parijitā manasānvīkṣitā dṛṣṭyā supratividdhāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:285_6: tadyathā sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇam iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20srabhu_u:285_7: ye 'nekaparyāyeṇa kāmarāgaṃ kāmacchandaṃ kāmālayaṃ kāmaniyantiṃ kāmādhyavasānaṃ vigarhanti vivarṇayanti vijugupsayanti /
SA20srabhu_u:285_8: kāmarāgaprahāṇam (Śbh I 156) anekaparyāyeṇa stuvanti varṇayanti praśaṃsanti /
SA20srabhu_u:285_9: tān dharmāṃs tathā niṣaṇṇo yoniśo manasikaroti /
SA20srabhu_u:286_1_0: tatra vyāpāde 'yaṃ viśeṣaḥ / tathā niṣaṇṇo maitrīsahagatena cittenāvaireṇāsapathenāvyābādhena
SA20srabhu_u:286_1_1: vipulena mahadgatenāpramāṇena subhāvitenaikāṃ diśām adhimucya spharitvopasaṃpadya
SA20srabhu_u:286_2: tathā dvitīyāṃ tathā tṛtīyāṃ tathā caturthīm ity ūrdhvam adhas tiryak sarvam anantaṃ lokam spharitvopasaṃpadya viharati /
SA20srabhu_u:287_2: tadyathā niṣaṇṇo 'dhyātmam eva cittaṃ sthāpayati saṃsthāpayati saṃniṣpādayaty ekotīkaroti samādhatte /
SA20srabhu_u:288_2: tathā san niṣaṇṇo 'tītam adhvānaṃ nāyoniśo manasikaroti,
SA20srabhu_u:288_5: āhosvin nāham atīte 'dhvani, ko nv aham abhūvaṃ, kathaṃ nv aham abhūvam atīte 'dhvani /
SA20srabhu_u:288_8: ke santaḥ ke bhaviṣyāmaḥ / ayaṃ sattvaḥ kuta āgataḥ, itaś cyutaḥ kutragāmī bhaviṣyati” sa ityevaṃrūpam ayoniśomanasikāraṃ varjayitvā yoniśo manasikaroti,
SA20srabhu_u:288_9: atītam apy adhvānam anāgataṃ pratyutpannam apy adhvānam /
SA20srabhu_u:289_0: sa dharmamātraṃ paśyati vastumātraṃ sac ca sato 'sac cāsato hetumātraṃ (Śbh I 158) phalamātraṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:289_3: bhūtaṃ bhūtato jānāti / yadutānityato vā duḥkhato vā śūnyato vānātmato vānityeṣu duḥkheṣu śūnyeṣv anātmasu dharmeṣu /
SA20srabhu_u:289_4: sa evaṃ yoniśo manasikurvan, buddhe 'pi niṣkāṅkṣo bhavati nirvicikitsaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:289_5: dharme saṃghe duḥkhe samudaye nirodhe mārge hetau hetusamutpanneṣu dharmeṣu niṣkāṅkṣo bhavati nirvicikitsaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:290_1: tatra vyāpāde vaktavyam / yo 'nena pratighaṃ pratighanimittaṃ cārabhya,
SA20srabhu_u:290_2: tasya ca prahāṇāya, dharmā udgṛhītā iti vistaraḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:291_1: tasya ca prahāṇāya, dharmā udgṛhītā iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20srabhu_u:292_0: vicikitsāyāṃ vaktavyam / ye 'nena vicikitsām ārabhya, tasyāś ca prahāṇāya, dharmā udgṛhītā iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20srabhu_u:293_0: evam anena kāmacchandanivaraṇād vyāpādastyānamiddhauddhatyakaukṛtyavicikitsānivaraṇāc cittaṃ viśodhitaṃ bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:293_2: tenāha / caṅkramaniṣadyābhyām āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhu_u:294_0: sā khalv eṣā dharmādhipateyāvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittasya pariśodhanākhyāta //
SA20srabhu_u:295_1: asti punar ātmādhipateyā lokādhipateyā cāvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittapariśodhanā /
SA20srabhu_u:296_2: utpannaṃ nivaraṇaṃ nādhivāsayate prajahāti vinodayati vyantīkaroti,
SA20srabhu_u:297_0: kathaṃ lokam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittaiḥ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhu_u:297_1: ihāsya nivaraṇe samutpanna utpattikāle vā pratyupasthita evaṃ bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:297_3: śāstā me 'pavaded devatā api vijñā api sabrahmacāriṇo dharmatayā vigarheyur” iti /
SA20srabhu_u:297_4: sa lokam evādhipatiṃ kṛtvā, anutpannaṃ ca nivaraṇaṃ notpādayati,
SA20srabhu_u:297_5: utpannaṃ ca prajahāti / evaṃ lokam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā, āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhu_u:298_2: yāvad rātryāḥ prathame yāme caṅkramaniṣadyābhyām āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhu_u:299_0: (I)-C-IIl-7-a-(2)-ii-(b) Ms.52b1R, Sh.105-24, W.*72-30, P.49b4, D.41b7, N.44a3, Co.45b2, Ch.413a3 kena kāraṇena daksiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:299_2: kiṃ punar atra sādharmyam / siṃhaḥ prāṇī sarveṣāṃ tiryagyonigatānāṃ prāṇināṃ vikrānta utsāhī dṛḍhaparākramaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:299_3: bhikṣur api jāgarikāyogānuyukta ārabdhavīryo viharati vikrānta utsāhī dṛḍhaparākramaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:299_4: atas tasya siṃhopamaiva śayyā pratirūpā bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:299_5: no tu pretaśayyā devaśayyā, na kāmabhogiśayyā / tathā hi te sarva eva kusīdā hīnavīryā mandabalaparākramāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:299_6: (Śbh I 162) api tu dharmataiṣā yad dakṣiṇena pārśvena siṃhopamāṃ śayyāṃ kalpayato na tathā gātrāṇāṃ vikṣepo bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:299_8: na ca gāḍhaṃ svapiti, pāpakāṃś ca svapnān na paśyati /
SA20srabhu_u:299_9: anyathā tu śayyāṃ kalpayato viparyayeṇa sarve doṣā veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:299_10: tenāha / pāde pādam ādhāya dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:300_2: ālokanimittam anena sūdgṛhītaṃ bhavati sumanasikṛtaṃ sujuṣṭaṃ supratividdham /
SA20srabhu_u:300_3: tad eva manasikurvan sa prabhāsahagatena cittena śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:300_4: suptasyāpi cāsya yena na bhavati cetaso 'ndhakārāyitatvam /
SA20srabhu_u:301_2: ye 'nena dharmāḥ śrutā bhavanti cintitā vā bhāvitā vā kuśalā arthopasaṃhitāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:301_4: yayāsya suptasyāpi ta eva dharmā jāgrato tvābhilapanti,
SA20srabhu_u:301_5: teṣv eva ca dharmeṣu taccittaṃ bahulam anuvicarati /
SA20srabhu_u:301_6: iti yathāsmṛtyā yathāsmṛtaḥ kuśalacittaḥ śayyāṃ kalpayati,
SA20srabhu_u:301_7: avyākṛtacitto vā / evaṃ smṛtaḥ śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:302_2: suptasyāsya tathā smṛtasya yasmin samaye 'nyatamānyatamenopakleśena cetasaḥ saṃkleśo bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:302_3: sa (Śbh I 164) utpadyamānam eva taṃ saṃkleśaṃ samyag eva prajānāti,
SA20srabhu_u:302_4: nādhivāsayati, prajahāti, pratividhyati, pratyudāvartayati mānasam / tenocyate saṃprajānan śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:303_1: kathaṃ utthānasaṃjñām eva manasikurvan śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:303_2: sa vīryasaṃpragṛhītaṃ cittaṃ kṛtvā śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:303_4: tadyathāraṇyako mṛgaḥ, no tu sarveṇa sarvaṃ middhāvakramaṇanimnaṃ cittaṃ karoti,
SA20srabhu_u:304_0: api cāsyaivaṃ bhavati / “aho batāhaṃ buddhānujñātāṃ jāgarikāṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā saṃpādayeyam” iti /
SA20srabhu_u:304_1: tasyāś ca saṃpādanārthaṃ bhrśaṃ ghanarasena prayogeṇa chandagato viharaty abhiyuktaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:305_0: api cāsyaivaṃ bhavati / “yathāham adya jāgarikārtham ārabdhavīryo vyahārṣaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:305_1: kuśalānāṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ bhāvanāyai dakṣo 'nalasa utthānasaṃpannaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:305_2: śvaḥ prabhāte, nirgatāyāṃ ca rajanyāṃ, bhūyasyā mātrayārabdhavīryo vihariṣyāmy utthānasaṃpanna” iti /
SA20srabhu_u:306_1: yenāyaṃ śaknoti laghu laghv evotthānakāla utthātuṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:306_3: dvitīyayotthānasaṃjñayā buddhānujñātāṃ siṃhaśayyāṃ kalpayaty anyūnām anadhikām /
SA20srabhu_u:306_5: smṛtisaṃpramoṣe saty uttaratrottaratra samādānāya prayukto bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:306_6: evam utthānasaṃjñām eva manasikurvan śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:307_2: sa rātryāḥ paścime yāme laghu laghv eva prativibudhya caṅkramaniṣadyābhyām āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittaṃ pariśodhayatīti /
SA20srabhu_u:307_3: rātryāḥ paścimo yāma ucyate, yo 'pararātraḥ sātirekaṃ praharam /
SA20srabhu_u:307_4: sa cāyam ālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānann utthānasaṃjñām eva manasikurvan rātyāḥ madhyamaṃ yāmaṃ sātirekaṃ praharaṃ middham avakrāmayitvā,
SA20srabhu_u:307_5: yasmim samaye vyuttiṣṭhate tatra tasmim samaye vyuttiṣṭhate karmaṇyakāyo bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:307_7: yena nāsyottiṣṭhato dhandhāyitatvaṃ vā syād mandāyitatvaṃ vālasyakausīdyaṃ vā /
SA20srabhu_u:307_8: asati vā punas tasmin dhandhāyitatve mandāyitatva ālasyakausīdye laghu laghv evotthānaṃ bhavaty ābhogamātrāt /
SA20srabhu_u:307_9: caṅkramaniṣadyābhyāṃ āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittasya pariśuddhiḥ pūrvavad veditavyā /
SA20srabhu_u:308_1: samāsārthāḥ punaḥ katame / iha jāgarikāyogam anuyuktasya puruṣapudgalasya catvāri samyakkaraṇīyāni bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:308_2: katamāni catvāri / yāvaj jāgrati tāvat kuśalapakṣaṃ na riñcati,
SA20srabhu_u:308_4: kālena ca śayyāṃ kalpayati, nākālena / suptaś cāsaṃkliṣṭacitto (Śbh I 168) middham avakrāmayati,
SA20srabhu_u:308_5_0: na saṃkliṣṭacittaḥ / kālena ca prativibudhyate, notthānakālam ativartate / [nam gyi
SA20srabhu_u:308_5_1: cha stod daṅ / nam gyi cha smad la mi ñal bar sbyor ba'i rjes su brtson pa'i skyes
SA20srabhu_u:308_5_2: bu gaṅ zag gis yaṅ dag par bya ba ni bźi po de dag yin no /
SA20srabhu_u:308_6: ] itīmāni catvāri samyakkaraṇīyāny ārabhya bhagavatā śrāvakāṇāṃ jāgarikāyogānuyuktatā deśitā /
SA20srabhu_u:309_1: kathaṃ ca punar deśitaḥ / yat tāvad āha / “divā caṅkramaniṣadyābhyām āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittaṃ pariśodhayati /
SA20srabhu_u:309_2: evaṃ rātryāḥ prathamayāmaṃ caṅkramaniṣadyābhyām āvaraṇiyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittaṃ pariśodhayatī”ty anena tāvat prathamaṃ samyakkaraṇīyam ākhyātam /
SA20srabhu_u:309_3: yaduta yāvaj jāgrati tāvat kuśalapakṣaṃ na riñcati /
SA20srabhu_u:310_0: yasmāt punar āha / “bahir vihārasya pādau prakṣālya,
SA20srabhu_u:310_1: vihāraṃ praviśya dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:310_2: pāde pādam ādhāye”ty anena dvitīyam samyakkaraṇīyam ākhyātam /
SA20srabhu_u:311_0: yat punar āha / “ālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānann utthānasaṃjñām eva manasikurvan śayyāṃ kalpayatī”ty anena tṛtīyaṃ samyakkaraṇīyam ākhyātam /
SA20srabhu_u:312_0: yat punar āha / “rātryāḥ paścime yāme laghu laghv eva prativibudhya,
SA20srabhu_u:312_1: caṅkramaniṣadyābhyām āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittaṃ pariśodhayatī”ty (Śbh I 170) anena caturthaṃ samyakkaraṇīyam ākhyātam /
SA20srabhu_u:312_3: iti tatra yad uktam / “ālokasaṃjñī smṛtaḥ saṃprajānan vyutthānasaṃjñām eva manasikurvan śayyāṃ kalpayatī”ty /
SA20srabhu_u:312_4: ato dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām asaṃkliṣṭacitto middham avakrāmayati,
SA20srabhu_u:312_5: yaduta smṛtyā, saṃprajanyena / dvābhyāṃ punaḥ kāraṇābhyāṃ, kālena prativibudhyate, no tu kālam ativartate, yadutālokasaṃjñayotthānasaṃjñayā ca /
SA20srabhu_u:313_0: kathaṃ punaḥ / smṛtyā kuśalam ālambanaṃ parigṛhya svapiti /
SA20srabhu_u:313_1: saṃprajanyena tasmāt kuśalād ālambanāc cyavamānaṃ saṃkliśyamānaṃ ca cittaṃ laghu laghv eva samyak prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:313_2: evam asyābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyām asaṃkliṣṭacittasya śayyā bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:314_2: ity ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ kālena prativibudhyate,
SA20srabhu_u:315_2: yaś cāyaṃ samāsārthaḥ, iyam ucyate pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogānuyuktatā/
SA20srabhu_u:316_4: aśite pīte khādite svādite, gate sthite niṣaṇṇe śayite, jāgṛte, bhāṣite tūṣṇīṃbhāve, nidrāklamaprativinodane saṃprajānadvihāri bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:317_1: tatra katamo 'bhikramaḥ / pratikramaḥ katamaḥ / abhikramapratikrame saṃprajānadvihāratā katamā /
SA20srabhu_u:318_1: grāmāntaraṃ vā kulaṃ vā kulāntaraṃ vā vihāraṃ vā vihārāntaraṃ vā /
SA20srabhu_u:319_0: tatra pratikramaḥ / yathāpīhaikatyo grāmad vā pratinivartate,
SA20srabhu_u:319_1: grāmāntarād vā kulād vā kulāntarād vā vihārād vā vihārāntarād vā /
SA20srabhu_u:320_0: tatra saṃprajānadvihāritā / abhikramamāṇo “'bhikramāmī”ti samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:320_2: “atra mayābhikramitavyaṃ, atra mayā punar nābhikramitavyam” iti samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:320_4: ayaṃ nābhikramaṇakāla” iti samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:321_4: yathā cābhikramitavyaṃ bhavati tadrūpayā (Śbh I 174) caryayācāreṇākalpeneryāpathena tathābhikrāmati /
SA20srabhu_u:323_0: tasyāsya pūrvaparikīrtiteṣu vastuṣv abhikramataḥ pratikramataś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:323_1: yad abuddhipūrvakam aprayatnapūrvakam acchandapūrvakam antarāle cakṣuṣā rūpadarśanam /
SA20srabhu_u:324_0: yat punar teṣūpasaṃkrāntapratikrāntasya buddhipūrvakaṃ prayatnapūrvakaṃ chandapūrvakaṃ cakṣuṣā rūpadarśanam /
SA20srabhu_u:324_1: tadyathā rājñāṃ rājamātrāṇāṃ naigamānāṃ jānapadānāṃ vā brāhmaṇānāṃ gṛhapatināṃ dhanināṃ śreṣṭhinām sārthavāhānām,
SA20srabhu_u:324_2: tadanyeṣāṃ bāhyakānāṃ layanānāṃ mārutānām avarakāṇāṃ prāsādānāṃ harmyatalānām iti /
SA20srabhu_u:324_3: yad vā punar anyeṣāṃ lokacitrāṇāṃ darśanam /
SA20srabhu_u:325_0: yat punar ālokitaṃ ca vyavalokitaṃ ca svalakṣaṇataḥ samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:325_1: yac cāvalokayitavyaṃ yac ca vyavalokayitavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:325_2: yadālokayitavyaṃ yadā vyavalokayitavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:325_3: yathālokayitavyaṃ yathā vyavalokayitavyaṃ tad api samyag eva (Śbh I 176) prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:326_2: yac cālokayitavyaṃ vyavalokayitavyaṃ tad ālokayati vyavalokayati /
SA20srabhu_u:327_1: tatra katamat saṃmiñjitam, katamat prasāritaṃ, katamā saṃmiñjitaprasārite saṃprajānadvihāritā /
SA20srabhu_u:328_0: sa cet saṃmiñjitaprasāritaṃ svalakṣaṇataḥ samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:328_1: saṃmiñjayitavyaṃ prasārayitavyaṃ ca samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:328_2: yadā ca saṃmiñjayitavyaṃ yadā prasārayitavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:328_3: yathā ca saṃmiñjayitavyaṃ yathā prasārayitavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:328_8: yac ca saṃmiñjayitavyaṃ prasārayitavyaṃ saṃmiñjayati prasārayati /
SA20srabhu_u:328_9: yadā ca saṃmiñjayitavyaṃ prasārayitavyaṃ tadā saṃmiñjayati prasārayati /
SA20srabhu_u:328_10: yathā (Śbh I 178) ca saṃmiñjayitavyaṃ prasārayitavyaṃ tathā saṃmiñjayati prasārayati /
SA20srabhu_u:329_2: katamac cīvaradhāraṇaṃ, katamat pātradhāraṇaṃ, katamā saṃghāṭīcīvarapātradhāraṇe saṃprajānadvihāritā /
SA20srabhu_u:330_0: yat tāvad asya jyeṣṭaṃ cīvaraṃ ṣaṣṭikhaṇḍaṃ vā navatikhaṇḍaṃ vā,
SA20srabhu_u:330_2: iyam ucyate saṃghāṭī / tasya prāvaraṇaṃ paribhogaḥ samyag eva pariharaṇaṃ dhāraṇam ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:331_0: yat punar asya madhyaṃ vā kanīyo vādhiṣṭhānikaṃ vā cīvaram atirekacīvaraṃ vā vikalpanārhaṃ vikalpitaṃ vā /
SA20srabhu_u:331_1: tac cīvaram ity ucyate / tasya prāvaraṇaṃ paribhogaḥ samyag eva pariharaṇaṃ dhāraṇam ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:332_0: yat punar asyādhiṣṭānikam āyasaṃ vā mṛnmayaṃ vā bhaikṣabhājanam /
SA20srabhu_u:332_1: idam ucyate pātram / tasya paribhogaḥ samyag eva pariharaṇaṃ dhāraṇam ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:333_0: sacet punar ayaṃ tāṃ saṃghāṭīṃ cīvaraṃ pātraṃ dhāraṇaṃ vā svalakṣaṇataḥ samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:333_1: yac ca saṃghāṭīcīvarapātradhāraṇaṃ kalpikam akalpikaṃ vā tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:333_2: yadā ca saṃghāṭīcīvarapātradhāraṇaṃ dhārayitavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:333_3: yathā ca dhārayitavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:334_0: sa tena saṃprajanyena samanvāgataḥ sacet saṃghāṭīṃ cīvaraṃ pātraṃ dhārayamāṇo jānāti “dhārayāmī”ti /
SA20srabhu_u:334_2: yadā (Śbh I 180) ca dhārayitavyaṃ tadā dhārayati /
SA20srabhu_u:335_1: tatra katamad aśitaṃ, katamat pītaṃ, katamat khāditaṃ, katamat svāditaṃ, katamāśitapītakhāditasvādite saṃprajānadvihāritā /
SA20srabhu_u:336_0: yaḥ kaścit piṇḍapātaparibhogaḥ sarvaṃ tad aśitam ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:337_0_0: tasya punar dvidhābhedaḥ, khāditaṃ svāditaṃ ca / tatra khāditaṃ, manthā vā, apūpo
SA20srabhu_u:337_0_1: vā, odanakulmāṣaṃ veti, yad vā punar anyatamam ābhisaṃskārikam annaṃ vikṛtaṃ bhojyaṃ
SA20srabhu_u:338_0: svāditaṃ katamat / tadyathā kṣīraṃ dadhi navanītam sarpis tailaṃ madhu phāṇitaṃ māṃsaṃ matsyā vaIIūrā lavaṇaṃ vanaphalaṃ vā bhakṣaprakāraṃ vā /
SA20srabhu_u:340_1: yac cāśitavyaṃ pātavyaṃ khāditavyaṃ svāditavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:340_2: yadā cāśitavyaṃ pātavyaṃ khāditavyaṃ svāditavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:340_3: yathā cāśitavyaṃ pātavyaṃ khāditavyaṃ svāditavyaṃ tad api samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:341_0: sa tena saṃprajanyena samanvāgato 'śnanaḥ pibamānaḥ khādamānaḥ svādayamānaḥ sa cej jānāty “aśnāmi pibāmi khādāmi svādayāmī”ti /
SA20srabhu_u:341_1: yac (Śbh I 182) cāśitavyaṃ pātavyaṃ khāditavyaṃ svāditavyaṃ tad aśnāti yāvat svādayati /
SA20srabhu_u:341_2: yadā cāśitavyaṃ yāvat svādayitavyaṃ tadāśnāti yāvat svādayati /
SA20srabhu_u:341_3: yathā cāśitavyaṃ yāvat svādayitavyaṃ tathāśnāti yāvat svādayati /
SA20srabhu_u:342_1: tatra katamad gatam, katamat sthitam, kataman niṣaṇṇam, katamac chayitaṃ, katamaj jāgrtam, katamad bhāṣitam, katamas tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ, katamā nidrāklamaprativinodanā,
SA20srabhu_u:342_2: katamā gate sthite niṣaṇṇe śayite jāgrte bhāṣite tūṣṇīṃbhāve nidrāklamaprativinodanāyāṃ saṃprajānadvihāritā /
SA20srabhu_u:344_1: sahadhārmikāṇāṃ vā puratas tiṣṭhaty ācāryāṇām upādhyāyānāṃ gurūṇāṃ gurusthānīyānām /
SA20srabhu_u:345_0: yathāpīhaikatyo mañce vā pīṭhe vā tṛṇasaṃstarake vā saṃniviśati vā saṃniṣīdati vā,
SA20srabhu_u:345_1: paryaṅkam ābhujya, ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya, pratimukhīṃ smṛtim upasthāpya /
SA20srabhu_u:345_2: yathāpīhaikatyo bahir vihārasya pādau prakṣālya vihāraṃ praviśya dakṣiṇena pārśvena siṃhaśayyāṃ kalpayati,
SA20srabhu_u:345_3: pāde pādam ādhāya, mañce vā pīṭhe vā tṛṇasaṃstarake vā,
SA20srabhu_u:345_4: araṇye vā vṛkṣamūle vā śunyāgāre vā /
SA20srabhu_u:346_0: yathāpīhaikatyo divā caṅkramaṇiṣadyābhyām āvaraṇīyebhyo dharmebhyaś cittaṃ pariśodhayati,
SA20srabhu_u:346_1: evaṃ rātryāḥ prathame yāme paścime yāme /
SA20srabhu_u:347_0: yathāpīhaikatyas tathā jāgarikāyogānuyukto 'nuddiṣṭāṃś ca dharmān (Śbh I 184) uddiśati paryavāpnoti,
SA20srabhu_u:347_1: tadyathā sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇam iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20srabhu_u:347_2: uddiṣṭeṣu ca dharmeṣu vacasā paricayaṃ karoti,
SA20srabhu_u:347_5: kālena kālam ālapati pratisaṃmodayati vijñaiḥ sabrahmacaribhiḥ sārdhaṃ tadanyair vā gṛhasthair yadutodyojanapariṣkārārtham /
SA20srabhu_u:348_0: yathāpīhaikatyo yathāśrutānāṃ yathā paryavāptānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vacasā parijitānām ekākī rahogato 'rthaṃ cintayati tulayaty upaparīkṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:348_1: pratisaṃlīno vā punar bhavaty adhyātmam eva cittaṃ sthāpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:348_2: saṃsthāpayaty avasthāpayaty upasthāpayati damayati śamayati vyupaśamayaty ekotīkaroti samādhatte vipaśyanāyāṃ vā yogaṃ koroti /
SA20srabhu_u:349_1: uṣṇena vā bādhyate śrānto vā bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:350_1: sacet punar ayaṃ gataṃ yāvan nidrāklamavinodanāṃ tatsvalakṣaṇataḥ samyag eva prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:350_2: yatra ca gantavyaṃ yāvan nidrāklamaḥ prativinodayitavyaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:350_4: yadā ca gantavyaṃ yāvad yadā nidrāklamaḥ prativinodayitavyaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:350_6: yathā ca gantavyaṃ bhavati yathā ca yāvan nidrāklamaḥ prativinodayitavyaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:351_0: sa tena saṃprajanyena samanvāgato gacchan yāvan nidrāklamam (Śbh I 186) prativinodayan sa cej jānti,
SA20srabhu_u:351_2: yatra ca gantavyaṃ bhavati yatra ca yāvan nidrāklamaḥ prativinodhyitavyo bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:351_3: tatra gacchati tatra yāvan nidrāklamaṃ prativinodayati /
SA20srabhu_u:351_4: yadā ca gantavyaṃ bhavati yadā ca yāvan nidrāklamaḥ prativinodayitavyo bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:351_5: tadā gacchati tadā yāvan nidrāklamaṃ prativinodayati /
SA20srabhu_u:351_6: yathā ca gantavyaṃ bhavati yathā yāvan nidrāklamaḥ prativinodayitavyo bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:351_7: tathā gacchati tathā yāvan nidrāklamaṃ prativinodayati /
SA20srabhu_u:352_3: katamā vastuvibhāvanā / yathāpīhaikatyo yaṃ yam eva grāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vopaniśritya viharati /
SA20srabhu_u:353_0: tasyaivaṃ bhavati / “mayā khalv ayaṃ grāmo vā nigamo vā piṇḍāyopasaṃkramitavyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:353_1: piṇḍāya caritvā punar eva vihāraṃ pratiniṣkramitavyam /
SA20srabhu_u:353_2: santi punar atra kulāni grāme vā nagare vā yāni mayā nopasaṃkramitavyāni,
SA20srabhu_u:353_3: tāni punaḥ katamāni / tadyathā ghoṣaṃ' pānāgāraṃ veśyaṃ rājakulaṃ caṇḍālakaṭhinam /
SA20srabhu_u:353_4: yāni vā punaḥ kulāny ekāntena pratihatāny apratyudāvartāni /
SA20srabhu_u:354_0: santi ca punaḥ kulāni yāni mayopasaṃkramitavyāni /
SA20srabhu_u:354_1: tadyathā kṣatriyamahāsālakulāni vā brāhmaṇamahāsalakulāni vā gṛhapatimahāsālakulāni vā naigamakulāni vā jānapadakulāni vā dhanikulāni vā śreṣṭhikulāni vā sārthavāhakulāni vā /
SA20srabhu_u:355_0: yāni vā kulāni mayopasaṃkramitavyāni tāni nātisāyam upasaṃkramitavyāni tāni vikālam /
SA20srabhu_u:355_4_0: na kupiteṣu / tathā copasaṃkramitavyāni yathopasaṃkrāmann ahaṃ na bhrāntena hastinā
SA20srabhu_u:355_4_1: sārdhaṃ samāgaccheyaṃ na bhrāntena rathena punaś caṇḍenāśvena na caṇḍayā gavā na
SA20srabhu_u:355_5: na gahanaṃ na kaṇṭakavāṭaṃ vā mardeyaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:355_8: candropamaś ca kulāny upasaṃkrameyaṃ hrīmān apragalbho vyavakṛṣya kāyaṃ vyavakṛṣya cittaṃ na lābhakāmo na satkārakāmaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:355_9: yathā svena lābhena sucittaḥ sumanās tathā parasyāpi lābhena sucittaḥ sumanā anātmotkarṣy aparapaṃsako 'nukaṃpācitto dayācittaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:355_11: tat kuta etal labhyaṃ pravrajitena parakuleṣu yad dadatu me pare mā na dadatu,
SA20srabhu_u:355_12: yāvat tvaritaṃ mā dhandham iti vistareṇa /
SA20srabhu_u:355_13: upasaṃkramya ca me pratigrahe mātrā karaṇīyā /
SA20srabhu_u:355_14: na ca lābhahetoḥ kuhanā karaṇīyā lapanā naimittikatā naiṣpeṣikatā lābhena lābhaniścikīrṣatā karaṇīyā /
SA20srabhu_u:356_0: yāni ca rūpāṇi tatropasaṃkramatopasaṃkrāntena vā draṣṭavyāni bhavanti na tāny ekatyāni draṣṭavyāni tāni caikatyāni draṣṭavyāni /
SA20srabhu_u:356_1: tatra yāni na draṣṭavyāni teṣūtkṣiptacakṣuṣā bhavitavyaṃ susaṃvṛtendriyeṇa /
SA20srabhu_u:356_2: yāni punar draṣṭavyāni teṣu sūpasthitāṃ smṛtim upasthāpya /
SA20srabhu_u:356_4: tadyathā naṭo nartako hāsako lāsaka iti /
SA20srabhu_u:356_5: yad vā punar anyac cāraṇajātaṃ nṛtte vā gīte vā vādite vā pravṛttam /
SA20srabhu_u:356_6: tathā mātṛgrāmo viśeṣeṇa punaḥ śiśur udāravarṇo rañjanīya iti /
SA20srabhu_u:356_7: yāni ca punā rūpāṇi dṛṣṭāni brahmacaryopaghātāya brahmacaryāntarāyāya,
SA20srabhu_u:357_1: tadyathā jīrṇaṃ vā vṛddhaṃ vā mahaIIakaṃ vā khurukhurupraśvāsakāyaṃ purataḥprāgbhārakāyaṃ daṇḍam avaṣṭabhya pravepamānena kāyena,
SA20srabhu_u:357_2: ābādhikaṃ vā duḥkhitaṃ bāḍhaglānam ādhmātapādam ādhmātahastam ādhmātodaram ādhmātamukhaṃ pāṇḍukachavivarṇam,
SA20srabhu_u:357_3: dardrūlaṃ vā kacchūlaṃ vā kuṣṭhitaṃ vā duḥkhitahatagātram,
SA20srabhu_u:357_4: pakvagātram upahatendriyaṃ, mṛtaṃ vā kālagatam ekāhamṛtaṃ vā dvyahamṛtaṃ vā saptāhamṛtaṃ vā,
SA20srabhu_u:357_5: kākaiḥ kuraraiḥ khādyamānaṃ, gṛdhraih śvabhiḥ sṛgālair vividhair vā tiryagjātigataiḥ prāṇibhir bhakṣyamāṇam abhinirhriyamāṇaṃ vā /
SA20srabhu_u:357_6_0: mañca āropyopari vitānena prasāritena purataḥ pṛṣṭhataś ca mahājanakāyena rodamānena
SA20srabhu_u:357_6_1: krandamānena bhasmāvakīrṇapramuktakeśena tathā śokajātaṃ duḥkhajātaṃ paridevajātaṃ
SA20srabhu_u:357_7: yan “mayā draṣṭavyam” ity evaṃrūpāṇi cānyāni caivaṃbhāgīyāni rūpāṇi draṣṭavyāni,
SA20srabhu_u:357_8: yāni brahmacaryānugrahāya kuśalānāṃ ca vitarkāṇāṃ samudācārāya saṃvartante /
SA20srabhu_u:358_2: na kāyapracālakam upasaṃkramitavyaṃ na bāhupracālakaṃ na śīrṣapracālakaṃ noccagghikayā na hastāvalagnikayā na soḍhaukikayā /
SA20srabhu_u:359_2: nodguṇṭhikayā kṛtena, noccastikayā, na vitastikayā, na paryastikayā, parimaṇḍalaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya,
SA20srabhu_u:359_3: nātyutkṛṣṭaṃ nātyapakṛṣṭam, na hastiśuṇḍakaṃ na tālavṛntakaṃ na nāgaphaṇakaṃ na kulmāṣapiṇḍikaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvaritavyam /
SA20srabhu_u:359_6: nānāstīrṇe pṛthivīpradeśe prapāte prāgbhāre pātraṃ sthāpayitavyam /
SA20srabhu_u:361_1: “vihāragatenāpi me tebhyaḥ kulebhyaḥ pratyāgatena pratiniṣkrāntena divā vā rātrau vā prātipaudgalike caṅkrame caṅkramitavyaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:361_5: kuśalapakṣaprayukte nākuśalamanasikārānugate (Śbh I 200) 'ntargatair indriyair abahirgatena mānasena,
SA20srabhu_u:361_7: kālena kālaṃ gacchatā kālena kālaṃ tiṣṭhatā /
SA20srabhu_u:362_0: tathā sve vihāre sve parigaṇe svakyāṃ kuṭikāyām uddeśikāyāṃ prātipaudgalikāyāṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:362_2: tathā mañce vā pīṭhe vā tṛṇasaṃstaraṇe vā,
SA20srabhu_u:362_3: araṇye vā vṛkṣamūle vā śūnyāgāre vā niṣattavyaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:362_4: paryaṅkam ābhujya, ṛjuṃ kāyaṃ praṇidhāya, pratimukhīṃ smṛtim upasthāpya /
SA20srabhu_u:363_3: evaṃ ca punaḥ svapitavyaṃ, ālokasaṃjñinā smṛtena saṃprajānenotthānasaṃjñām eva manasikurvatā,
SA20srabhu_u:363_4: rātryāḥ paścime yāme laghu laghv eva prativibudhya /
SA20srabhu_u:364_2: bhāṣye vā svādhyāyakriyāyāṃ vā yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:364_3: prahāṇe vā pratisaṃlayane, dharmacintāyām / lokāyatāś ca mantrā vivarjayitavyāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:364_5: ye nābhijñāyai na saṃbodhāya na nirvāṇāya saṃvartante /
SA20srabhu_u:364_6_0: ye vā punar dharmās tathāgatabhāṣitā gambhīrā gambhīrābhāsāḥ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktā
SA20srabhu_u:364_6_1: idaṃpratyayatāpratītyasamutpādānulomās te satkṛtyodgṛhītavyāḥ dṛḍhaṃ ca sthiraṃ ca
SA20srabhu_u:364_7: pratipattyāḥ saṃpādanārthaṃ, na lābhasatkārahetoḥ / te ca punar dharmā vacasā suparijitāḥ kartavyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:364_8: na ca saṅgaṇikāyā atināmayitavyam na karmārāmatayā na bhāṣyārāmatayā,
SA20srabhu_u:364_9: kālena ca kalam upasthitayā smṛtyā vijñasya sabrahmacāriṇa ālapitavyāḥ saṃlapitavyāḥ pratisaṃmodayitavyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:364_11: kiṃkuśalagaveṣiṇā, anupālambhacittena, mitavādinā, yuktabhāṇinā, [gnam por smra ba daṅ] praśāntabhāṇinā ca,
SA20srabhu_u:364_13: tūṣṇīṃbhāvena ca ye pāpakā akuśalā vitarkā na (Śbh I 204) vitarkayitavyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:364_15: [mṅon pa'i ṅa rgyal can du mi bya ba daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:364_16: khyad par rtogs pa cuṅ zad tsam daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:364_17: ṅan ṅon tsam gyi bar ma dor sgyid lug par mi bya ba daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:364_18: bsaṃ par mi bya ba'i gnas rnams yoṅs su spaṅ bar bya ba daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:364_19: dus dus su źi gnas daṅ / lhag mthoṅ la brtson par bya ba daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:364_20: spoṅ ba la dga' ba daṅ / rgyun du chud par bya ba la brtson pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:364_21: gus par bya ba la brtson par bya'o sñam pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:365_1: bdag dpyid ka'i tsha bas gduṅs pa'm /
SA20srabhu_u:365_2: de ltar brtson pa daṅ / 'bad pa daṅ / rtsol ba'm / ruṅ ba'i bya ba cuṅ zad byed pas yoṅs su ṅal ba'i rgyu daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:365_3: yoṅs su ṅal ba'i gźi las dus ma yin par gñid kyi sñom pa skye bar gyur na /
SA20srabhu_u:365_4: de'i don du ci nas kyaṅ myur ba myur ba kho nar de med par 'gyur źiṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:365_5: dus yun riṅ por dge ba'i phyogs ñams par mi 'gyur ba daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:365_6: dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar chad du mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir /
SA20srabhu_u:365_7: yud tsam źig gñid bsaṅ bar bya ste /
SA20srabhu_u:365_8: der yaṅ bdag gi sgo bcad pa'm /
SA20srabhu_u:365_9: dge sloṅ yod na ltar gźug pa'm /
SA20srabhu_u:365_10: 'dul ba'i bsruṅ ba daṅ / 'dul ba'i cho gas chos gos kyis bciṅs la /
SA20srabhu_u:365_11: gnas dben par 'dug ste / gñid bsaṅ bar bya'o sñam du sems pa yin te /
SA20srabhu_u:365_12: des na de'i gñid kyi sñom pa rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med par 'gyur ro /
SA20srabhu_u:366_1: de ni 'di lta ste / rgyu ba daṅ spyod pa las brtsams nas /
SA20srabhu_u:366_2: śes bźin du (Śbh I 206) spyod pa ñid kyi go rims yin te /
SA20srabhu_u:366_3: dan po kho nar de ltar tshul bźin yid la byed pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:366_4: śes rab daṅ ldan pa'i sems mṅon par 'du byed pa gaṅ yin pa de ni de'i śes bźin źes bya'o /
SA20srabhu_u:367_0: de ltar śes bźin daṅ ldan pas rgyu ba daṅ spyod pa thams cad mi ñuṅ bar sgrub par byed pa gaṅ yin pa de ni śes bźin du spyod pa ñid ces bya'o /
SA20srabhu_u:368_0: de la 'gro ba daṅ / ldog pa daṅ / chuṅ zad bltas pa daṅ / rnam par bltas pa daṅ / bskum pa daṅ / brkyaṅ ba daṅ / snam sbyar daṅ / chos gos daṅ / lhuṅ bzed bcaṅ ba gaṅ yin pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:368_1: zos pa daṅ / 'thuṅs pa daṅ / 'chos pa daṅ / myaṅs pa gaṅ yin pa de la śes bźin du spyod pa gaṅ yin pa de ni groṅ du rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa la śes bźin du spyod pa ñid ces bya'o /
SA20srabhu_u:369_0_0: de la soṅ ba daṅ / sdod pa daṅ / 'dug pa daṅ / ñal ba daṅ / mi ñal ba daṅ / smra
SA20srabhu_u:369_0_1: ba daṅ / mi smra ba gaṅ yin pa daṅ / gñid kyi sñom pa bsaṅ ba gaṅ yin pa de la śes
SA20srabhu_u:369_0_2: bźin du spyod pa gaṅ yin pa de ni gtsug lag khaṅ na spyod pa daṅ ldan pa la śes bźin
SA20srabhu_u:369_0_3: du spyod pa ñid ces bya ste /
SA20srabhu_u:370_0: de ni re źig śes bźin du spyod pa ñid kyi rnam par dbye ba rgyas pa yin par rig par bya'o //
SA20srabhu_u:371_1: don mdor bsdu ba gaṅ źe na / rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa'i las rnam pa lṅa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:371_2: spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i las rnam pa lṅa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:371_3: rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa daṅ / spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i las la śes bźin du spyod pa rnam pa bźi gaṅ yin pa de ni don mdor bsdu ba źes bya'o /
SA20srabhu_u:372_0: de la rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa'i las rnam pa lṅa gaṅ źe na /
SA20srabhu_u:372_1: 'di lta ste / lus kyi las daṅ / mig gi las daṅ / yan lag daṅ / ñiṅ lag thams cad kyi las daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:372_2: chos gos daṅ / lhuṅ bzed kyi las daṅ / bsod sñoms kyi las te / de ni rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa'i las rnam pa lṅa źes bya'o /
SA20srabhu_u:373_0: de la re źig ldog pa daṅ 'gro ba źes bya ba gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa'i lus kyi las bstan to /
SA20srabhu_u:373_1: / “chuṅ zad bltas pa daṅ / rnam par bltas pa” źes gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa'i mig gi las bstan to /
SA20srabhu_u:373_2: / (Śbh I 208) “bskum pa daṅ / brkyaṅ ba” źes bya ba gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa'i yan lag daṅ ñiṅ lag thams cad kyi las bstan to /
SA20srabhu_u:373_3: / “snam sbyar daṅ / chos gos daṅ / lhuṅ bzed bcaṅ ba” źes gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa'i chos gos daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:373_4: lhuṅ bzed kyi las bstan to // “zos pa daṅ / 'thuṅs pa daṅ / 'chos pa daṅ / myaṅs pa” źes gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa'i bsod sñoms kyi las bstan to /
SA20srabhu_u:374_0: spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i las rnam pa lṅa gaṅ źe na /
SA20srabhu_u:374_1: 'di lta ste / lus kyi las daṅ / ṅag gi las daṅ / yid kyi las daṅ / ñin mo'i las daṅ / mtshan mo'i las te / de ni spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i las rnam pa lṅa źes bya'o /
SA20srabhu_u:374_2: de la re źig “soṅ ba daṅ / sdod pa daṅ / 'dug pa” źes gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i lus kyi las bstan to /
SA20srabhu_u:374_3: / “smra ba” źes gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i ṅag gi las bstan to /
SA20srabhu_u:374_4: / “ñal ba daṅ / mi smra ba daṅ / gñid kyi sñom pa bsaṅ ba” źes gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i yid kyi las bstan to /
SA20srabhu_u:374_5: / “mi ñal ba” źes gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i ñin mo'i las daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:374_6: mtshan mo'i las daṅ / lus kyi las daṅ / ṅag gi las kyaṅ bstan to // “ñal ba” źes gaṅ gsuṅs pa des ni spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i mtshan mo'i las daṅ yid kyi las kho nar yaṅ bstan te /
SA20srabhu_u:374_7: de ni spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i las rnam pa lṅa yin par rig par bya'o /
SA20srabhu_u:375_1: de la rgyu ba daṅ ldan pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:375_2: spyod pa daṅ ldan pa'i las la śes bźin du spyod pa rnam pa bźi gaṅ źe na /
SA20srabhu_u:375_3: daṅ po kho nar “las 'di lta bu źig brtsam mo” źes rgyu ba'i las sam /
SA20srabhu_u:375_4: spyod pa'i las śig rtsoṃ par byed pa na /
SA20srabhu_u:375_5: las de ñid la dran pa ñe bar gźag ciṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:375_6: bag yod par spyod la / las de dran pas yoṅs su zin ciṅ bag yod pas kyaṅ yoṅs su zin pas /
SA20srabhu_u:375_7: gźi gaṅ la phyogs gaṅ du / dus gaṅ gi tshe ji sñed cig rnam pa gaṅ gis ji ltar brtag par bya ba'i gźi de la /
SA20srabhu_u:375_8: phyogs der dus de'i tshe / de sñed cig rnam pa des de ltar rtog par byed ciṅ rab tu śes par byed pa ste /
SA20srabhu_u:375_9: de ltar rtog par byed ciṅ / rab tu śes par byed pa na tshe 'di ñid la kha na ma tho ba med pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:375_10: lhuṅ ba med pa (Śbh I 210) daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:375_11: 'gyod pa med pa daṅ / yid la gcags pa med pa daṅ / rjes su gduṅ ba med par 'gyur ba daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:375_12: tshe phyi ma la yaṅ kha na ma tho ba med ciṅ lus źig ste /
SA20srabhu_u:375_13: śi ba'i 'og tu ṅan son ṅan 'gro log par ltuṅ ba sems can dmyal ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:375_14: ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i tshogs kyi rgyu byas par 'gyur ba yin no /
SA20srabhu_u:376_0: de ni śes bźin du spyod pa ñid kyi don mdor bsdus pa yin te /
SA20srabhu_u:376_1: rnam par dbye ba rgyas par sṅa ma gaṅ yin pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:376_2: don mdor bsdu ba gaṅ yin pa de ni śes bźin du spyod pa ñid ces bya'o /
SA20srabhu_u:377_2: de la dge ba'i bśes gñen gaṅ źe na /
SA20srabhu_u:377_3: rgyu rnam pa brgyad kyis rnam pa thams cad yoṅs su rdzogs pa'i dge ba'i bśes gñen yin par rig par bya'o /
SA20srabhu_u:378_0: brgyad gaṅ źe na / 'di ltar 'di na la la daṅ po kho nar tshul khrims la gnas pa yin pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:378_1: maṅ du thos pa yin pa daṅ / rtog pa daṅ ldan pa yin pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:378_2: rjes su sñiṅ brtse ba daṅ ldan pa yin pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:378_3: yid yoṅs su mi skyo ba yin pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:378_4: bzod pa daṅ ldan pa yin pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:378_5: mi 'jigs pa daṅ ldan pa yin pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:378_6: tshig gi bya ba daṅ ldan pa yin no /
SA20srabhu_u:379_1: de la ji ltar na tshul khrims la gnas pa yin źe na /
SA20srabhu_u:379_2: rgyas par sṅa ma bźin du tshul khrims daṅ ldan par gnas pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:379_3: so sor thar ba'i sdom pas bsdams pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:379_4: dge sbyoṅ gi lam 'dod pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:379_5: bram ze'i lam 'dod pa daṅ / bdag dul bar bya ba daṅ / bdag źi bar bya ba daṅ / bdag yoṅs su mya ṅan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir źugs pa yin te /
SA20srabhu_u:379_6: de ltar na tshul khrims la gnas pa yin no /
SA20srabhu_u:380_1: ji ltar na maṅ du thos pa yin źe na /
SA20srabhu_u:380_2: des chos tshaṅs par spyod pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:380_3_0: thog mar dge ba / bar du dge ba / tha mar dge ba / don bzaṅ po / tshig 'bru bzaṅ
SA20srabhu_u:380_3_1: po / ma 'dres pa / yoṅs su rdzogs pa / yoṅs su dag pa / yoṅs su byaṅ ba gaṅ dag yin
SA20srabhu_u:380_3_2: pa de dag mṅon par brjod pas mṅon par rjod par byed pa daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:380_4: evaṃrūpā anena bahavo dharmā udgṛhītā bhavanti dhṛtā vacasā parijitā manasā cānvīkṣitā dṛṣṭyā supratividdhāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:381_2_0: katham adhigantā bhavati / lābhī bhavaty anityasaṃjñāyā anitye duḥkhasaṃjñāyā duḥkhe
SA20srabhu_u:381_2_2: prahāṇasaṃjāyā virāgasaṃjñāyā nirodhasaṃjñāyā maraṇasaṃjñāyā aśubhasaṃjñāyā vinīlakasaṃjñāyā
SA20srabhu_u:381_3_0: lābhī bhavati prathamasya dhyānasya dvitīyasya tṛtīyasya caturthasyākāśānantyāyatanavijñānānantyāyatanākiṃcanyāyatananaivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya
SA20srabhu_u:381_3_1: maitryāḥ karuṇāyā muditāyā upekṣāyāḥ srotaāpattiphalasya sakṛdāgāmiphalasyānāgāmiphalasya
SA20srabhu_u:381_4: śakto bhavati pratibalaś ca pareṣāṃ tribhiḥ prātihāryair avavaditum,
SA20srabhu_u:382_1: katham anukampako bhavati / pareṣām antike kāruṇiko bhavati dayāpannah /
SA20srabhu_u:382_2: arthakāmo bhavati hitakāmaḥ sukhakāmaḥ sparśakāmo yogakṣemakāmaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:383_3: ayāsī catasṛnāṃ parṣadāṃ dharmadeśanāyai dakṣo bhavaty analasa utthānasaṃpanna ārabdhavīryajātīyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:384_2: kathaṃ kṣamāvān bhavati / ākruṣṭo na pratyākrośati / roṣito na pratiroṣayati / tādito na pratitāḍayati / bhaṇḍito na pratibhaṇḍayati /
SA20srabhu_u:384_4: pragāḍheṣv api bandhaneṣu rodhaneṣu tāḍaneṣu kutsaneṣu tarjaneṣu chedaneṣv ātmāparādhī bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:384_6: na pareṣām antike kupyati / nāpy anuśayaṃ vahati / iti vimānito 'pi vivarṇito 'pi vijugupsito 'pi na vikṛtim āpadyate /
SA20srabhu_u:384_7: nānyatrārthāyaiva cetayate / kṣamaś ca bhavati śītasyoṣṇasya jighatsāyāḥ pipāsāyā daṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasaṃsparśānām /
SA20srabhu_u:384_8: parato duruktānām durāgatānāṃ vacanapathānām utpannānāṃ śārīrikāṇāṃ vedanānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ tīvrāṇāṃ kharāṇāṃ kaṭukānām amanaāpānāṃ prāṇahāriṇīnāṃ kṣamo bhavaty adhivāsanajātīyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:385_1: kathaṃ viśārado bhavati / asaṃlīnacittaḥ parṣadi dharmaṃ deśayaty agadgadasvaro 'saṃpramuṣitasmṛtipratibhānaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:385_2: na cāsya śāradyahetoḥ śāradyanidānaṃ bhayaṃ vākrāmati samāviśati /
SA20srabhu_u:385_3: nāpi kakṣābhyāṃ svedo mucyate romakūpebhyo vā /
SA20srabhu_u:386_4: valgvā, vispaṣṭayā, vijñeyayā, śravaṇīyayā, apratikūlayā, aniśritayā, aparyantayā / evaṃ vākkaraṇenopeto bhavati kalyāṇavākyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:387_1: sa ebhir aṣṭābhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ samanvāgataś codako bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:388_1: kathaṃ cokado bhavati / yad utādhiśīle ca śīlavipattyā,
SA20srabhu_u:388_2: adhyācara ācāravipattyā, dṛṣṭena śrutena pariśaṅkayā codayati,
SA20srabhu_u:388_3: bhūtena nābhūtena kālena nākālenārthopasaṃhitena nānarthopasaṃhitena ślakṣṇena na paruṣeṇa mitravattayā na dveṣāntareṇa /
SA20srabhu_u:389_1: kathaṃ smārako bhavati / āpattiṃ vā smārayati dharmaṃ vārthaṃ vā /
SA20srabhu_u:389_2: katham āpattim smārayati / yathāpi tadāpattim adhyāpadyamāno na smarati tam enaṃ smārayati,
SA20srabhu_u:389_3: “āyuṣmann amuṣmin deśe, amuṣmin vastuni, amuṣmin kāle, evaṃrūpaṃ caivaṃrūpām āpattim āpanna” iti /
SA20srabhu_u:390_1: kathaṃ dharmaṃ smārayati / yathāpi tacchrutānugṛhitān dharmān ekākī na smarati,
SA20srabhu_u:390_2: smartum icchati / tadyathā sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇam iti vistareṇa pūrvavan na smarati tam enaṃ smārayati /
SA20srabhu_u:391_0: katham arthaṃ smārayati / yathāpi tadarthaṃ vismarati tam enaṃ smārayati /
SA20srabhu_u:391_1: punar api pratinavīkaroti, uttānīkaroti, deśayati, saṃprakāśayati, yac cāpi kuśalam arthopasaṃhitaṃ brahmacaryopasaṃhitaṃ cirakṛtaṃ cirabhāṣitam apy anusmārayitā bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:392_1: katham avavādako bhavati / prāvivekye pratisaṃlayane yoge manasikāre śamathavipaśyanāyāṃ kālena kālam ānulomikam avavādaṃ pravartayati /
SA20srabhu_u:392_2: kālena ca kālaṃ tatpratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ karoti /
SA20srabhu_u:392_3_0: tadyathā cetovinivaraṇasāṃpreyagāminīṃ śīlakathāṃ vā samādhikathāṃ vā prajñākathāṃ
SA20srabhu_u:392_3_1: vā vimuktikathāṃ vā vimuktijñānadarśanakathāṃ vālpecchākathāṃ vā saṃtuṣṭikathāṃ vā
SA20srabhu_u:392_3_2: prahāṇakathāṃ virāgakathāṃ nirodhakathām apacayakathām asaṃsargakathām daṃpratyayatāpratītyasamutpādānuIomāṃ
SA20srabhu_u:393_1: katham anuśāsako bhavati / dharmeṇa vinayena śāstuḥ śāsane samanuśāsako (Śbh I 222) bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:393_2: ācāryo vopādhyāyo vā sahadhārmiko vā gurur vā gurusthānīyo vānyatamānyatamasminn adhikaraṇe 'trisṛtaṃ vyatikrāntaṃ viditvā,
SA20srabhu_u:393_3: kālena kālam avasādayati daṇḍakarmānuprayacchati pravāsayati cainaṃ /
SA20srabhu_u:393_4: punar api ca dharmeṇa samaye pratisaṃstarasāmīcīsaṃjñapitiṃ pratigṛhṇāti saṃgrāhakaś ca bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:393_5: karaṇīye cākaraṇīye vādhyācārānadhyācārād adhyācīrṇe 'nadhyācīrṇe ca śāsty anuśāsti /
SA20srabhu_u:394_4: kāmeṣv ādīnavaniḥsaraṇān vyavadānapakṣān dharmān vistareṇa saṃprakāśayati /
SA20srabhu_u:394_5: kālena kālaṃ sāmutkarṣikīṃ caturāryasatyapratisaṃyuktāṃ kathāṃ kathayati /
SA20srabhu_u:394_6: duḥkhaṃ vārabhya samudayaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā mārgaṃ vā /
SA20srabhu_u:394_7: sattvaparipākāya vā sattvavyavadānāya vā saddharmasya vā cirasthitaye /
SA20srabhu_u:394_8: yuktaiḥ padavyañjanaiḥ sahitair ānulomikair ānucchavikair aupāyikaiḥ pratirūpaiḥ pradakṣiṇair nipakasyāṅgasaṃbhāraiḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:395_1: tāṃ ca punaḥ kathāṃ kālena karoti,
SA20srabhu_u:395_2_0: satkṛtyānupūrvam anusaṃdhim anusahitaṃ harṣayan rocayan toṣayann utsāhayann anavasādayaṃs
SA20srabhu_u:395_2_1: ca yuktāṃ sahitām avyavakīrṇāṃ dhārmikīṃ yathāparṣan maitracitto hitacitto 'nukampācitto
SA20srabhu_u:396_1: yaś caibhir aṣṭābhir aṅgaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:396_2: evaṃ ca kālena kālaṃ codako bhavati smārako 'vavādako 'nuśāsako dharmadeśakah,
SA20srabhu_u:397_1: samāsārthaḥ punaḥ katamaḥ / saced ayaṃ mitrasuhṛdanukampaka ādita eva hitakāmo bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:397_2: sukhakāmaś ca / tac ca punar hitasukhaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti,
SA20srabhu_u:397_4: pratibalas ca bhavaty upāyakuśalaḥ yad utāsyaiva hitasukhasya samudāgamāyopasaṃhārāya /
SA20srabhu_u:397_5: dakṣas ca bhavaty analasa utthānasaṃpanna ārabdhavīryajātīyaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:397_6: yad uta tam eva hitasukhopasaṃhāram ārabhya /
SA20srabhu_u:398_1: yaś ca pūrvako vistaravibhāgo yaś cāyaṃ samāsārtha iyam ucyate kalyāṇamitratā //
SA20srabhu_u:399_2: saddharma ucyate buddhaiś ca buddhaśrāvakaiś ca sadbhiḥ samyaggataiḥ satpuruṣair ākhyāto deśita uttāno vivṛtaḥ saṃprakāśitaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:400_0: sa punaḥ katamaḥ / tadyathā sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇam iti vistareṇa pūrvavad dvādaśāṅgavacogatam saddharma ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:401_0_1: Ch.418b23 tatra sūtraṃ katamat / yat tatra tatra bhagavatā tāṃs tān vineyāṃs tāni
SA20srabhu_u:401_0_2: tāni vineyacāritāni cārabhya skandhapratisaṃyuktā vā kathā kṛtā,
SA20srabhu_u:401_2: dhātusaṅgaṇapratisayuktā vā, āyatanapratisaṃyuktā vā, pratītyasamutpādapratisaṃyuktā vā,
SA20srabhu_u:401_6: sā ca kathā saṃgītikāraiḥ parigṛhya śāsanacirasthitaye yathāyogam (Śbh I 228) anupūrveṇa racitānupūrveṇa samāyuktā pratirūpair nāmakāyapadakāyavyañjanakāyair,
SA20srabhu_u:401_7: yad uta teṣāṃ teṣām arthānāṃ sūcanāya kuśalānām arthopasaṃhitānāṃ brahmacaryopasaṃhitānām /
SA20srabhu_u:402_1: geyaṃ katamat / yasyānte paryavasāne gāthābhigītā, yac ca sūtraṃ neyārtham / idam ucyate geyam //
SA20srabhu_u:403_1: vyākaraṇaṃ katamat / yasmiñ chrāvakebhyo 'bhyatītakālagata upapattau vyākriyate,
SA20srabhu_u:404_1: gāthā katamā / yā na gadyena bhāṣitā, api tu pādopanibandhena dvipadā vā tripadā vā catuṣpadā vā pañcapadā vā ṣaṭpadā vā /
SA20srabhu_u:405_0_1: Ch.418c12 udānaṃ katamat / yat pudgalasya nāma gotram aparikīrtayitvānuddiśya bhāṣitam
SA20srabhu_u:405_0_2: āyatyāṃ vā saddharmacirasthitaye śāsanacirasthitaye (Śbh I 230) ca /
SA20srabhu_u:406_1: nidānaṃ katamat / yat pudgalasya nāma gotraṃ parikīrtayitvoddiśya bhāṣitam,
SA20srabhu_u:406_2: yac ca kiṃcid vinayapratisaṃyuktaṃ sotpattikaṃ sanidānaṃ prātimokṣasūtram /
SA20srabhu_u:407_1: avadānaṃ katamat / yat sadṛṣṭāntakam udāhṛtam, yena dṛṣṭāntena yasya prakṛtasyārthasya vyavadānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:408_1: vṛttakaṃ katamat / yat kiṃcit pūrvayogapratisaṃyuktam / idam ucyate vṛttakam //
SA20srabhu_u:409_1: jātakaṃ katamat / yad atītam adhvānam upādāya tatra tatra bhagavataś cyutyupapādeṣu bodhisattvacaryā duṣkaracaryākhyātā /
SA20srabhu_u:410_1: vaipulyaṃ katamat / yatra bodhisattvānāṃ mārgo deśyate 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye daśabalānāvaraṇajñānasamudāgamāya /
SA20srabhu_u:411_2_0: adbhutā dharmāḥ katame / yatra buddhānāṃ ca buddhaśrāvakāṇāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ ca bhikṣuṇīnāṃ
SA20srabhu_u:411_2_1: ca śikṣamāṇānāṃ śrāmaṇerāṇāṃ śrāmaṇerikāṇām upāsakānām upāsikānāṃ sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇāś
SA20srabhu_u:412_1: upadeśāḥ katame / sarvamātṛkābhidharmaḥ sūtrāntaniṣkarṣaḥ sūtrāntavyākhyānam upadeśa ity ucyate //
SA20srabhu_u:412_4: asti sūtram, asti vinayaḥ asty abhidharmaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:412_5: tatra yat tāvad āha, sūtraṃ geyaṃ vyākaraṇaṃ gāthodānāvadānavṛttakajātakavaipulyādbhutadharmā iti,
SA20srabhu_u:413_0: tac caitad dvādaśāṅgavacogataṃ piṭakatrayasaṃgṛhītaṃ sadbhiḥ samyaggatair deśitaṃ saddharma ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:414_3: tat punaḥ katamat / yathāpīhaikatyaḥ sūtradharo vā bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:414_4: vinayadharo vā, mātṛkādharo vā, sūtravinayadharo vā, sūtrābhidharmadharo vā, vinayamātṛkādharo vā, sūtravinayamātṛkādharo vā / idam ucyate saddharmaśravaṇam /
SA20srabhu_u:415_0: tat punaḥ śravaṇaṃ dvividham / vyañjanaśravaṇam arthaśravaṇaṃ ca //
SA20srabhu_u:416_1: cintanā katamā / yathāpīhaikatyas tān eva yathāśrutān dharmān ekākī rahogataḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:416_3: ātmacintāṃ sattvacintāṃ lokacintāṃ sattvānāṃ karmavipākacintāṃ dhyāyināṃ dhyāyiviṣayaṃ buddhānāṃ buddhaviṣayaṃ varjayitvā,
SA20srabhu_u:417_1: sā punaś cintā dvividhā / gaṇanākārā saha gaṇanāyogena dharmāṇām /
SA20srabhu_u:418_2: yathā punaḥ katham iti / rūpam ucyate daśa rūpīṇy āyatanāni yac ca dharmāyatanaparyāpannaṃ rūpam sa ca rūpaskandhaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:418_8: uttarottaraprabhedena yena vā punar asyāḥ saṃkhyāgaṇanākārāyāś cintāyā apramāṇaḥ praveśanayo veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:419_1: kathaṃ yuktyupaparīkṣākārayā cintayā skandhadeśanāṃ cintayati / catasṛbhir yuktibhir upaparīkṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:421_1: apekṣāyuktiḥ katamā / dvividhāpekṣā, utpattyapekṣā prajñaptyapekṣā ca /
SA20srabhu_u:421_2: tatrotpattyapekṣā yair hetubhir yaiḥ pratyayaiḥ skandhānāṃ prādurbhāvo bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:421_3: tasyāṃ skandhotpattau te hetavas te pratyayā apekṣyante /
SA20srabhu_u:421_5: tasyām (Śbh I 238) skandhaprajñaptau te nāmakāyapadakāyavyañjanakāyā apekṣyante /
SA20srabhu_u:421_7: yā cotpattyapekṣā yā ca prajñaptyapekṣā sā yuktir yoga upāyaḥ skandhotpattaye skandhaprajñaptaye /
SA20srabhu_u:422_1: kāryakaraṇayuktiḥ katamā / yad utpannānāṃ skandhānāṃ svena hetunā svena pratyayena tasmiṃs tasmin svakāryakaraṇe viniyogaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:422_2: tadyathā, cakṣuṣā rūpāṇi draṣṭavyāni, śrotreṇa śabdāḥ śrotavyāḥ, yāvan manasā dharmā vijñeyā iti /
SA20srabhu_u:422_4: śabdena śrotrasya, evaṃ yāvad dharmair manas iti /
SA20srabhu_u:422_5: yad vā punar anyad apy evaṃbhāgīyaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:422_6: tatra tatra dharmāṇām anyonyaṃ kāryakaraṇe prati yuktir yoga upāyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:423_2: anityāḥ skandhā iti, pratītyasamutpannā duḥkhāḥ śūnyā anātmāna iti tribhiḥ pramāṇair upaparīkṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:423_4: ebhis tribhiḥ pramāṇair upapattiyuktaiḥ satāṃ hṛdayagrāhakair vyavasthāpanā sādhanā kriyate /
SA20srabhu_u:423_5: yad uta skandhānityatāyā vā pratītyasamutpannatāyā vā duḥkhatāyā vā (Śbh I 240) śūnyatāyā vanātmatāyā vā /
SA20srabhu_u:424_1: dharmatāyuktiḥ katamā / kena kāraṇena tathābhūtā ete skandhāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:424_2: tathābhūto lokasaṃniveśaḥ / kena kāraṇena kharalakṣaṇā pṛthivī dravalakṣaṇā āpa uṣṇalakṣaṇaṃ tejaḥ samudīraṇalakṣaṇo vāyuḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:424_3: kena kāraṇenānityāḥ skandhāḥ kena kāraṇena śāntaṃ nirvāṇam iti /
SA20srabhu_u:424_5: anubhavanalakṣaṇā vedanā, saṃjānanālakṣaṇā saṃjñā, abhisaṃskaraṇalakṣaṇāḥ saṃskārāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:424_8: svabhāva eṣa īdṛśaḥ, dharmataiṣā / yaiva cāsau dharmatā saivātra yuktir yoga upāyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:424_9: evaṃ vaitat syāt, anyathā vā, naiva vā syāt, sarvatraiva ca dharmataiva pratisaraṇaṃ dharmataiva yuktiḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:425_0: evaṃ catasṛbhir yuktibhiḥ skandhadeśanopaparīkṣyate yāvat punar anyā kācid deśaneti //
SA20srabhu_u:426_2: yaivam ābhyāṃ dvābhyām ākārābhyāṃ gaṇanāsaṃkhyākārayā ca yuktyupaparīkṣaṇākārayā ca samyagupanidhyāpanā tasyās tasyā deśanāyāḥ sā cintā /
SA20srabhu_u:428_2: anantarāyaḥ katamaḥ / anantarāyo dvividhaḥ / adhyātmam upādāya bahirdhā ca /
SA20srabhu_u:429_2: yathāpīhaikatyaḥ pūrvam eva kṛtapuṇyo na bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:429_3: so 'kṛtatvāt puṇyānāṃ na lābhī bhavati kālena kālam ānulomikānāṃ jīvitapariṣkārāṇām,
SA20srabhu_u:429_6: tīvradveṣa āyatadveṣaḥ, tīvramoha āyatamohaḥ / pūrvaṃ vānenābādhasaṃvartanīyāni karmāṇi kṛtāni bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:429_9: yenāsyābhīkṣṇaṃ vāto vā kupyati pittaṃ vā śleṣmaṃ vā,
SA20srabhu_u:429_11: bhojanaguruko bhavati bahvartho bahukṛtyo gaṇasaṃnipātabahulo bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:429_12: karmārāmo vā bhāṣyārāmo vā nidrārāmaḥ saṅgaṇikārāmaḥ saṃsargārāmaḥ prapañcārāmaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:429_14: ity evaṃbhāgīyā antarāyā adhyātmam upādāya veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:430_4: yato na labhate kālena kālam ānulomikīm avavādānuśāsanīṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:430_5: kudeśe vā vasati / yatrāsya vāsaṃ kalpayato divā vauvilako bhavati prabhūtaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:430_7: tīvrakaṭukaś ca vātātapasaṃsparśo manuṣyād amanuṣyād api bhayam /
SA20srabhu_u:432_2: yenāntarāyeṇa samavahitena saṃmukhībhūtenāśakto bhavaty apratibalaḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ kuśalapakṣaprayoge /
SA20srabhu_u:433_0: sa punaḥ katamaḥ / yad ābādhako bhavati duḥkhito bāḍhaglānaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:433_1: (Śbh I 248) abhīkṣṇam asya vāto vā kupyate pittaṃ va śleṣmaṃ vā viṣūcikā vāsya kāye saṃtiṣṭhate /
SA20srabhu_u:433_2: api tv asya daśaty ahir vṛściko vā śatapadī vā manuṣyo vainaṃ viheṭhayaty amanuṣyo vā /
SA20srabhu_u:434_1: prāvivekyāntarāyaḥ katamaḥ / yad bhojanaguruko bhavati / bahvartho bahukṛtyo bahukaraṇīyaḥ karmārāmaratiṃ rato bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:434_3: bhāṣyārāmo bhavati / śaktaḥ pratibalaḥ san prāvivekye prahāṇe pratisaṃlayane bhāvanāyām uddeśasvādhyāyamātrakeṇa saṃtuṣṭaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:434_4: nidrārāmo bhavati / styānamiddhaparyavasthitaḥ kusīdajātīyo nidrāsukhaṃ pārśvasukhaṃ śayanasukhaṃ ca svīkaroti /
SA20srabhu_u:434_5: saṅgaṇikārāmo bhavati / sārdhaṃ gṛhasthapravrajitai rājakathāṃ vā karoti,
SA20srabhu_u:434_6: corakathāṃ vānnakathāṃ vā pānakathāṃ vā vastrakathāṃ vā veśyākathāṃ vā vīthīkathāṃ vā janapadamahāmātrākhyānakathāṃ vā lokākhyānakathāṃ vā samudrākhyānakathāṃ vā /
SA20srabhu_u:435_0: tatra cābhirato bhavaty abhīkṣṇañ ca gaṇasaṃnipātabahulo bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:435_1: teṣu teṣv adhikaraṇeṣu vyākṣiptamānaso bhavati vyākulamānasaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:435_4: phrad pa rnams daṅ 'bral bar mi 'dod pa daṅ] /
SA20srabhu_u:435_5: prapañcārāmo bhavati / prapañcarato 'vakramaṇīyeṣu pūrvaṃgamaḥ prāvivekyeṣu nikṣiptadhuraḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:435_7: yaiḥ samavahitaiḥ saṃmukhībhūtair na sukaraṃ bhavaty araṇyavanaprasthāni prāntāni śayanāsanāny adhyāvasitum,
SA20srabhu_u:435_8: araṇyāni vā vṛkṣamūlāni vā śūnyāgārāṇi vā /
SA20srabhu_u:436_2: tadyathā pratisaṃlayanam ucyate śamatho vipaśyanā ca /
SA20srabhu_u:437_2: pramādo 'deśavāsaś ca / yathāsya pramattasya styānamiddhaṃ vā cittaṃ paryavanahati,
SA20srabhu_u:437_3: śamathamātraṃ vāsvādayati, līnatvāya vā cittam upanāmayati,
SA20srabhu_u:437_5: yadrūpeṇa cādeśavāsena manuṣyakṛto vāmanuṣyakṛto vā parataḥ saṃghaṭṭo bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:437_9: (I)-C-IIl-11-b-(3)-ii Ms.61b2L, Sh.147-12, P.71a2, D.60a1, N.62b5, Co.64a4, Ch.420b13 vipaśyanāntarāyaḥ katamaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:438_1: tatrātmasaṃpragraho yathāpi tad “aham asty uccakulaḥ pravrajito 'līnaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:438_2: anye ca bhikṣavo na tathe”ty ātmānam utkarṣayati saṃpragṛhṇāti,
SA20srabhu_u:438_7: anye ca bhikṣavo na tathe”ty ātmānam utkarṣayati saṃpragṛhṇāti,
SA20srabhu_u:439_0: sa ātmānaṃ saṃpragṛhṇān ye te bhavanti bhikṣavaḥ sthavirā rātrijñā abhyavacīrṇabrahmacaryās tān na kālena kālaṃ paripṛcchati paripraśnī karoti /
SA20srabhu_u:439_1: te cāsya na kālena kālam avivṛtāni ca sthānāni vivṛṇvanti,
SA20srabhu_u:439_3: na ca gambhīram arthapadaṃ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca prajñayā pratividhya saṃprakāśayanti yāvad eva jñānadarśanasya viśuddhaye /
SA20srabhu_u:439_4: evamasya sa ātmasaṃpragraha āntarāyiko bhavati yaduta vipaśyanāyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:440_0: punar aparam alpamātrakasyāvaramātrakasya jñānadarśanamātrakasya sparśavihāramātrakasya lābhī bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:440_1: sa tena jñānamātrakeṇa darśanamātrakeṇa (Śbh I 254) sparśavihāramātrakeṇātmānam utkarṣayati saṃpragṛhṇāti /
SA20srabhu_u:440_2: sa ātmānaṃ saṃpragṛhṇaṃs tāvatā saṃtuṣṭo bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:440_3: nottari vyāyacchate / evam asyāntarāyaḥ kṛto bhavaty ātmasaṃpragraheṇa yaduta vipaśyanāyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:441_1: capalo vā punar anupaśāntendriyo bhavaty uddhatendriya unnatendriyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:441_4: na dṛḍhaṃ cintayati / yena vipaśyanāṃ na pūrayati na viśodhayati /
SA20srabhu_u:441_5: evam asya cāpalyam antarāyo bhavati yaduta vipaśyanāyā iti /
SA20srabhu_u:442_0: (I)-C-IIl-11-b-(3)-iii Ms.62a1M, Sh.148-20, W.*80-19, P.71b6, D.60b3, N.63a7, Co.64b6, Ch.420c5 dvau dharmau śamathāntarāyau /
SA20srabhu_u:443_0: iti yaś ca śamathāntarāyaḥ / yaś ca vipaśyanāntarāyaḥ / ayam ucyate pratisaṃlayanāntarāyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:444_0: ayaṃ ca punar antarāyasya samāsārtha iti //
SA20srabhu_u:445_1: yaś cāyaṃ samāsārtho yaś ca pūrvako vistaravibhāgas tad ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipyāntarāya ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:445_2: asya cāntarāyasya viparyayeṇānantarāyo (Śbh I 256) veditavya iti /
SA20srabhu_u:445_3: ya eṣām antarāyāṇām abhāvo vigamo 'saṅgatir asamavadhanam /
SA20srabhu_u:446_1: tyāgaḥ katamaḥ / yad dānam anavadyaṃ cittālaṃkārārthaṃ cittapariṣkārārthaṃ yogasaṃbhārārtham uttamārthasya prāptaye dadāti /
SA20srabhu_u:447_0: tatra ko dadāti / kutra dadāti / kiṃ dadāti / kena dadāti / kathaṃ dadāti / kasmād dadāti / yenāsya dānam anavadyaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:448_1: āha / dātā dānapatir dadāti / tatra katamo dātā katamo dānapatiḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:448_3: ayam ucyate dātā / yasya svakaṃ dīyate tac ca dātukāmasya nādātukāmasya,
SA20srabhu_u:449_1: tatra kutra dadāti / āha / caturṣu dadāti / duḥkhitāya, wpakāriṇe, iṣṭāya, viśiṣṭāya ca /
SA20srabhu_u:450_1_0: tatra duḥkhitāyeti / kṛpaṇā vā, vanīyakā vā, adhvagā vā, yācanakā (Śbh I 258) vā,
SA20srabhu_u:450_1_1: andhā va, badhirā vā, anāthā vā, apratisaraṇā vā, upakaraṇavikalā iti / ye vā punar
SA20srabhu_u:451_1: upakāriṇaḥ katame / tadyathā mātāpitaram, āpāyakaṃ, poṣakam, saṃvardhakam iti / ye vā punar aṭavīkāntarād uttārayanti,
SA20srabhu_u:451_2: durbhikṣād vā, paracakrabhayād vā, bandhanād vā, ābādhād vā / hitopadeśakāś cāsya bhavanti,
