SA20srabhu_u:451_8: iṣṭāḥ katame / ye saṃstutāḥ, yeṣām asyāntike bhavati prema vā gauravaṃ vā /
SA20srabhu_u:451_9: bhaktivādo vā alaptakāḥ saṃstutakāḥ sapriyakāś ca bhavantīti /
SA20srabhu_u:452_2: sādhurūpa saṃmatāḥ, avyābādhyāḥ, avyābādhyaratāḥ, vigatarāgāḥ, rāgavinayāya pratipannāḥ, vigatadveṣāḥ, dveṣavinayāya pratipannāḥ, vigatamohāḥ, mohavinayāya pratipannā iti /
SA20srabhu_u:452_3: ye vā punar anye 'py evaṃbhāgīyāḥ ima ucyante viśiṣṭāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:453_2: tatra kiṃ dadātīty āha / samāsataḥ sattvasaṃkhyātam asattvasaṃkhyātaṃ ca vastu dadāti /
SA20srabhu_u:454_3: yad vā punar anyad apy evaṃbhāgīyaṃ vastu /
SA20srabhu_u:454_4: adhyātmaṃ vā punar upādāya karacaraṇaśiromāṃsarudhiravasādīny anuprayacchati /
SA20srabhu_u:454_5: idam api sattvasaṃkhyātaṃ dānaṃ yatra bodhisattvabodhāḥ saṃdṛśyante /
SA20srabhu_u:454_6: asmiṃs tv arthe nedaṃ dānam abhipretam /
SA20srabhu_u:454_8: vaśitā ca prabhaviṣṇutā ca, arhati ca tān sattvān pareṣāṃ pratipādayitum /
SA20srabhu_u:454_10: na taddhetos tatpratyayaṃ pare manāṃsi pradūṣayanti /
SA20srabhu_u:454_11: ye ca sattvāḥ pareṣu pratipāditās te na vyāpāditā bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:456_1: asattvasaṃkhyātaṃ vastu katamat / tadyathā dhanavastu dhānyavastu deśavastu //
SA20srabhu_u:457_3: yad vā punar anyad apy evaṃbhāgīyaṃ ratnaṃ vā hiraṇyaṃ vā rūpyaṃ vā vastraṃ vā bhāṇḍopaskaraṃ vā gandhajātaṃ vā mālyajātaṃ vā /
SA20srabhu_u:458_1: dhānyaṃ katamat / yat kiṃcid bhojyaṃ vā peyaṃ vā /
SA20srabhu_u:458_2: tadyathā yavā vā, śālir vā, godhūmā vā, kolā vā, kulatthā vā, tilā vā, māṣā vā, ikṣuraso vā, [dar ba daṅ,] mṛdvīkāraso veti / yad vā punar anyad 9) apy evaṃbhāgīyam /
SA20srabhu_u:459_2: deśavastu katamat / tadyathā kṣetravastu, gṛhavastu, āpaṇavastu, puṇyaśālāvihārapratiṣṭhāpanam iti /
SA20srabhu_u:459_3: yad vā punar anyad apy evaṃbhāgīyam /
SA20srabhu_u:460_0: tatra yac ca sattvāsattvasaṃkhyātaṃ vastu, idaṃ dadātīti //
SA20srabhu_u:461_1: kena dadātīti / yā cālobhasahagatā cetanā cittābhisaṃskāro manaskarma /
SA20srabhu_u:461_2: yac ca tatsamutthāpitaṃ kāyakarma vākkarma deyavastuparityāgāya svasantāne vā parasantāne vā /
SA20srabhu_u:462_1: tatra kathaṃ dadātīti / śraddhayā dadāti / āgamadṛṣṭiḥ phaladarśī (Śbh I 266) satkṛtya dadāti /
SA20srabhu_u:462_3: kālena dadāti yathaitat pareṣām upayogyaṃ syāt /
SA20srabhu_u:462_4: parān anupahatya dadāti / dharmeṇa samayenāsāhasena samudānayitvā śuci dadāti /
SA20srabhu_u:462_5: praṇītaṃ kalpikaṃ dadāti / yena na pare sāvadyā bhavanti,
SA20srabhu_u:462_6: nātmā / abhīkṣṇaṃ dadāti / vinīya mātsaryamalaṃ saṃnidhimalaṃ ca dānaṃ dadāti /
SA20srabhu_u:462_7: pūrvam eva dānāt sumanā dadaṃś cittaṃ prasādayati dattvā cāvipratisārī bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:463_1: kasmād dadāti / āha / kāruṇyād vā dadāti yaduta duḥkhiteṣu /
SA20srabhu_u:464_1: ebhir ākārair ato 'sya gṛhiṇo vā pravrajitasya vā cittālaṃkārārthaṃ cittapariṣkārārthaṃ yogasaṃbhārārtham uttamārthasya prāptaye tad dānam,
SA20srabhu_u:467_1: kathaṃ śrāddho bhavati / prasādabahulo bhavati, avakalpanābahulaḥ, vimuktibahulaḥ, chandikaś ca kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
SA20srabhu_u:467_2: sa śāstari prasīdati, na kāṅkṣati, na vicikitsati / śāstāraṃ satkaroti, gurukaroti, mānayati, pūjayati / satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvopaniśritya viharati /
SA20srabhu_u:467_3: yathā śāstary evaṃ dharme sabrahmacāriṣu śikṣāyām avavādānuśāsanyāṃ pratisaṃstare 'pramāde samādhau /
SA20srabhu_u:468_1: katham aśaṭho bhavati / ṛjuko bhavati, ṛjukajātīyaḥ / yathābhūtam ātmānam āviṣkartā bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:469_2: katham alpābādho bhavati / arogajātīyaḥ samayā pācanyā grahaṇyā samanvāgato bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:469_3: nātyuṣṇayā, nātiśītayā, avyābādhayā, ṛtusukhayā/ yayāsyāśitapītakhāditāsvāditāni samyak sukhena paripākaṃ gacchanti /
SA20srabhu_u:470_2: sthāmavān viharati, vīryavān, utsāhī, dṛḍhaparākramaḥ, anikṣiptadhuraḥ kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /
SA20srabhu_u:470_3: dakṣaś ca bhavati, analasaḥ, utthānasaṃpannaḥ / kartā bhavati vijñānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ kāyena vaiyāpṛtyam /
SA20srabhu_u:471_2: adhandhendriyaḥ, amūḍhendriyaḥ, aneḍakaḥ, ahastasaṃvācikaḥ pratibalaḥ subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇām artham ājñātum iti /
SA20srabhu_u:472_1: katham alpeccho bhavati / yāvadbhir guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavaty alpecchatām ādiṃ kṛtvā,
SA20srabhu_u:473_1: kathaṃ saṃtuṣṭo bhavati / itaretareṇa cīvarapiṇḍapātena śayanāsanena tuṣṭo bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:473_2: saṃtuṣṭaḥ / so 'labdhvā cīvaraṃ lūhaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā notkaṇṭhati,
SA20srabhu_u:473_3: na paritasyati / labdhvā ca punar araktaḥ paribhuṅkte 'sakta iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20srabhu_u:474_1: kathaṃ supoṣo bhavti / ātmāsyaikaḥ poṣyo bhavati / na tu pare, tadyathā dārakā vā manuṣyā veti,
SA20srabhu_u:474_2: ye vā punar anye 'pi ke cid /
SA20srabhu_u:474_4: pare cainaṃ dāyakadānapatayo duṣpoṣyam iti paśyeran /
SA20srabhu_u:475_2: kathaṃ subharo bhavati / alpenāpi yāpayati / lūhenāpi yāpayati / evaṃ subharo bhavati //
SA20srabhu_u:476_0: (I)-C-IIl-13-a-(10) Ms.63b4M,Sh.157-14, W.* 82-1, P.75b3, D.63b3, N.66b4, Co.68a1, Ch.422a9 kathaṃ dhutaguṇasamanvāgato bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:476_1_1: traicīvarikaḥ / nāmatikaḥ / pāṃsukūlikaḥ / āraṇyakaḥ / vṛkṣamūlikaḥ / ābhyavakāśikaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:476_1_2: śmāśānikaḥ / naiṣadyikaḥ / )yāthāsaṃstarikaḥ / ta ete piṇḍapātaṃ cīvaraṃ śayanāsanam
SA20srabhu_u:476_1_3: ārabhya dvādaśakā dhutaguṇā bhavanti trayodaśakā vā /
SA20srabhu_u:477_0: tatra piṇḍapātikatvaṃ bhidyamānaṃ dvidhā bhavati, prāptapiṇḍapātikaḥ sāvadānapiṇḍapātikaś ca //
SA20srabhu_u:478_2: ['dris pa'i khyim dag nas] yathālabdhaṃ yathopasaṃpannaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte /
SA20srabhu_u:479_3: veśmānuveśya kulāni bhikṣitvā paryaṭitvā yathālabdhaṃ yathopasaṃpannaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ paribhuṅkte /
SA20srabhu_u:479_4: no tv uccaiḥ śuṇḍāṃ praṇidhāya kulāny upasaṃkrāmati /
SA20srabhu_u:480_0: tatra piṇḍapātikatvam aviśeṣeṇārabhya dvādaśa bhavanti prabhedaṃ punar ārabhya trayodaśa //
SA20srabhu_u:481_1: tatraikāsanikatvaṃ katamat / ekasminn āsane niṣaṇṇo yāvat paribhoktavyaṃ tāvat paribhuṅkte /
SA20srabhu_u:481_2: vyutthitaś ca punas tasmād āsanān na paribhuṅkte /
SA20srabhu_u:482_5: yataś ca punar jānīte “na me 'ta uttari bhojanena kṛtyaṃ (Śbh I 278) bhaviṣyatī”ti,
SA20srabhu_u:483_1: kathaṃ traicīvariko bhavati / tribhiś ca cīvarair yāpayati,
SA20srabhu_u:483_2: sāṃghāṭinā, uttarāsaṃgena, antarvāsena ca / trayāṇāṃ cīvarāṇām atirekam uttaraṃ na dhārayati /
SA20srabhu_u:484_1: kathaṃ nāmatiko bhavati / yat kiṃcic cīvaraṃ dhārayati tricīvaraṃ vā,
SA20srabhu_u:484_2: atirekacīvaraṃ vā / sarvaṃ tad aurṇikaṃ dhārayati /
SA20srabhu_u:485_1: kathaṃ pāṃsukūliko bhavati / yac cīvaraṃ parair muktaṃ bhavaty ucchiṣṭaṃ choritaṃ rathyāyāṃ vā,
SA20srabhu_u:485_2: vīthyāṃ vā, catvare vā, śrṅgāṭake vā, pathi vā, utpathe vā, uccārasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ vā prasrāvasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ vā,
SA20srabhu_u:485_4: tato yad aśuci tad apanīya, sāram ādāya, śodhayitvā sīvitvā vivarṇīkṛtya dhārayati /
SA20srabhu_u:486_2: katham āraṇyako bhavati / araṇyavanaprasthāni prāntāni śayanāsanāny adhyāvasati,
SA20srabhu_u:487_1: kathaṃ vṛkṣamūliko bhavati / vṛkṣamūle vāsaṃ kalpayati vṛkṣamūlaṃ niśritya /
SA20srabhu_u:489_1: kathaṃ śmāśāniko bhavati / śmaśāne vāsaṃ kalpayati, yatra mṛtamṛto janakāyo 'bhinirhriyate /
SA20srabhu_u:490_1: kathaṃ naiṣadyiko bhavati / mañce vā pīṭhe vā tṛṇasaṃstare vā niṣadyayā kālam atināmayati /
SA20srabhu_u:490_2: no tu mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā kuḍyaṃ vā vṛkṣamūlaṃ vā tṛṇasaṃstaraṃ vā niśritya pṛṣṭhaṃ vā pārśvaṃ vā dadāti /
SA20srabhu_u:491_3: yasmin tṛṇasaṃstare vā parṇasaṃstare vā śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:491_4: tṛṇasaṃstaraṃ vā parṇasaṃstaraṃ vā sakṛd yathaiva saṃstṛtaṃ bhavati tathaiva śayyāṃ kalpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:491_5: no tu punar vikopayaty abhisaṃskaroti ca /
SA20srabhu_u:492_0: kenaite dhutaguṇā ucyante / tadyathā, ūrṇā vā karpāsaṃ vā yasmin samaye dhutaṃ bhavati saṃkṛttaṃ vicūrṇaṃ tasmin samaye mṛdu ca bhavati laghu ca karmaṇyaṃ ca,
SA20srabhu_u:493_0: evam evehaikatyasya piṇḍapātapātarāgeṇa piṇḍapāte cittaṃ saktaṃ bhavati saṃsaktaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:493_1: cīvararāgeṇa cīvare cittam saktaṃ bhavati saṃsaktam,
SA20srabhu_u:493_2: śayanāsanarāgeṇa śayanāsane cittaṃ saktaṃ bhavati saṃsaktam /
SA20srabhu_u:497_3: pratiśrayarāgasya prahāṇāya vṛkṣamūlika ābhyavakāśikaḥ śmāśāniko bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:497_4: api ca śmāśānikatvaṃ mithunarāgasya prahāṇāya bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:498_1: kathaṃ prāsādiko bhavati / prāsādikenābhikramapratikrameṇa samanvāgato bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:499_1: kathaṃ mātrajño bhavati / iha śrāddhā brāhmaṇagṛhapatayo svarthaṃ pravārayanti,
SA20srabhu_u:499_3: tatra pratigrahe mātrāṃ jānāti evaṃ mātrajño bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:500_2: uccakulapravrajito vā sann āḍhyakulapravrajito vābhirūpo vā darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko bahuśruto vākkaraṇenopetaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:500_3: anyatamānyatamasya vā jñānamātrakasya darśanamātrakasparśavihāramātrakasya lābhī sann etena nātmānam utkarṣayati parāṃś ca paṃsayati /
SA20srabhu_u:500_4: [chos daṅ rjes su mthun pa'i chos 'ba' źig bsgrub par bya ba kho na yin par rig nas /
SA20srabhu_u:501_3: yathā katham iti / bālo duścintitacintī bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:501_9: kathaṃ kṣamo bhavati / ākruṣṭo na pratyākrośati / roṣito na pratiroṣayati / tāḍito na pratitāḍayati / bhaṇḍito na pratibhaṇḍayati /
SA20srabhu_u:501_10: sa cāyuṣmān kṣamo bhavati śītasyoṣṇasya jighatsāyāḥ pipāsāyā daṃśamaśakavātātapasarīsṛpasaṃsparśāṇām,
SA20srabhu_u:501_12: śārīrikāṇāṃ vedanānāṃ duḥkhānāṃ tīvrāṇāṃ kharāṇāṃ kaṭukānām amana-āpānāṃ prāṇahāriṇīnāṃ kṣamo bhavaty adhivāsanajātīyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:502_1: katham sūrato bhavati / yathāpi tan maitreṇa kāyakarmaṇā samanvāgato bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:502_2: maitreṇa vākkarmaṇā, maitreṇa manaskarmaṇā, śāstur antike vijñānāṃ ca sabrahmacāriṇām /
SA20srabhu_u:502_7: śīlasāmānyagataś ca bhavati, dṛṣṭisāmānyagataś ca / sa ebhiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ saṃrañjanīyair dharmaiḥ samanvāgataḥ priyakaraṇair gurukaraṇair avivādakaraṇaiḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:502_8: sukhasaṃvāsyo bhavati, aviheṭhanajātīyaḥ / abhinandanti cainaṃ vijñāḥ sabrahmacāriṇa ekavyavasāyam /
SA20srabhu_u:503_1: kathaṃ peśalo bhavati / vigatabhṛkuṭir bhavaty uttānamukhavarṇaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:504_1: sa ebhir dharmaiḥ samanvāgato dharmakāmo bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:504_4: nāpy apavādikayā / asantaṃ dharmaṃ na samāropayati /
SA20srabhu_u:504_5: santaṃ dharmaṃ nāpavadati / sa “yat tad bhavati kavitaṃ kāveyaṃ citrākṣaraṃ cihnapadavyañjanaṃ lokāyatapratisaṃyuktam,
SA20srabhu_u:505_5: “mā me tato nidānaṃ bhaviṣyaty anekaparyāyeṇa vyākṣepād vyāpāro vā teṣāṃ vā punar vipariṇāmād anyathībhāvād utpatsyante śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsā” iti /
SA20srabhu_u:506_1: prajahati, vinodayati, vyantīkaroti / “mā me 'tonidānam utpadyate dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ vā duḥkhaṃ sāṃparāyikaṃ ve”ti /
SA20srabhu_u:507_1: acyutaśīlaḥ, abhraṣṭavrataḥ, śraddhādeyaṃ paribhuṅkte / na ca śraddhādeyaṃ pratikṣipati /
SA20srabhu_u:508_4: āpannaś ca laghu laghv eva yathādharmaṃ (Śbh I 294) pratikaroti /
SA20srabhu_u:508_5: itikaraṇīyeṣu ca dakṣo bhavaty analasaḥ svayaṃkārī /
SA20srabhu_u:509_3: nāham” iti viditvā, na ca svayaṃdṛṣṭiparāmarśasthāyī bhavaty asamañjasagrāhī duḥpratiniḥsargamantrī /
SA20srabhu_u:510_0: sa ebhir guṇair yukta evaṃvihārī evaṃśikṣamāṇaḥ śramaṇālaṃkāreṇālaṃkṛtaḥ śobhate /
SA20srabhu_u:510_1: tadyathā kaś cid eva puruṣo yuvā maṇḍanajātīyaḥ kāmopabhogī snātānulipto 'vadātavastraprāvṛto vividhair bhūṣaṇair alaṃkṛtaḥ śobhate,
SA20srabhu_u:510_2: tadyathā harṣair vā keyūrair vāṅgulimudrikayā vā jātarūparajatamālayā vā /
SA20srabhu_u:510_3: evam eva sa ebhir vividhaiḥ śramaṇālaṃkārair guṇair alaṃkṛto bhāsate tapati virocate /
SA20srabhu_u:512_7: laukikaṃ caiva vairāgyaṃ tathā lokottareṇa ca /
SA20srabhu_u:512_8: tayoś caiva hi saṃbhāro bhūmir naiṣkramyasaṃjñitā // [4]
SA20srabhu_u:514_2: tatra kati pudgalā ye 'syāṃ naiṣkramyabhūmau yathādeśitāyāṃ yathāparikīrtitāyāṃ niṣkrāmanti /
SA20srabhu_u:514_4: katamad ālambanam / katamo 'vavādaḥ / katamā śikṣā / katame śikṣānulomikā dharmāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:514_5_0: katamo yogabhraṃśaḥ / katame yogāḥ / katamo manaskāraḥ / katamad yogakaraṇīyam /
SA20srabhu_u:514_5_1: kati yogācārāḥ / katamā yogabhāvanā / katamad bhāvanāphalam / kati pudgalaparyāyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:514_5_2: kati mārāḥ / kati mārakarmāṇi / katham ārambho viphalo bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:516_2: yasya pudgalasya mṛdūnīndriyāṇi dhandhavāhīni mandavāhīni jñeye vastunīti pūrvavat /
SA20srabhu_u:517_2: yasya pudgalasya tīkṣṇānīndriyāṇy adhandhavāhīni bhavanty amandavāhīni jñeye vastunīti pūrvavat /
SA20srabhu_u:518_1: rāgotsadaḥ pudgalaḥ katamaḥ / yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu rāga āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:518_2: sa tena hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi rañjanīye vastuni tīvrarāgaś ca bhavaty āyatarāgaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:519_2: yena pudgalena dveṣaḥ pūrvam anyāsu (Śbh II 6) jātiṣv āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:519_3: tena ca hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi dveṣaṇīye vastuni tīvradveṣaś ca bhavaty āyatadveṣaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:520_1: mohotsadaḥ pudgalaḥ katamaḥ / yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu moha āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:520_2: tena ca hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi mohanīye vastuni tīvramohaś ca bhavaty āyatamohaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:521_1: mānotsadaḥ pudgalaḥ katamaḥ / yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu māna āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:521_2: tena ca hetunā tena ca pratyayenaitarhi mananīye vastuni tīvramānaś ca bhavaty āyatamānaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:522_2: yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu vitarka āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:522_3: tena ca hetunā tenaiva pratyayenaitarhi vitarkasthānīye vastuni tīvravitarkaś ca bhavaty āyatavitarkaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:523_3: yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu rāgo dveṣo moho māno vitarko nāsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:523_4: na caite dharmā ādīnavato dṛṣṭā vidūṣitāḥ saṃtīritāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:523_5: sa tena hetunā tena pratyayena rañjanīye vā vastuni dveṣaṇīye mohanīye manyanīye vitarkanīye na tīvrarāgo bhavati nāpy āyatarāgaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:523_6: na cāsya na samudācarati rāgo yaduta tena vastuna /
SA20srabhu_u:523_7: yathā rāga evaṃ dveṣo moho māno vitarkaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:524_2: yena pudgalena pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu na rāga āsevito bhāvito bahulīkṛtaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:524_3: ādīnavataś ca bahulaṃ dṛṣṭo bhavati vidūṣitaḥ saṃtīritaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:524_4: sa tena hetunā tena pratyayenaitarhi rañjanīye vastuni samavahite saṃmukhībhūte 'dhimātre pracura ulbaṇe dhandhaṃ rāgam utpādayati /
SA20srabhu_u:524_6: yathā rāga evaṃ dveṣo moho māno vitarko veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:526_1: phalasthaḥ pudgalaḥ katamaḥ / āha / srota-āpannaḥ, sakṛdāgāmī, anāgāmī, arhan / ayam ucyate phalasthaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:527_4: no tūdgṛhīteṣu dharmeṣu paryavāpteṣu cintiteṣu tuliteṣūpaparīkṣiteṣu svayam eva śakto bhavati pratibalas tān dharmān bhāvanākāreṇānusartum /
SA20srabhu_u:528_2: yaḥ pudgalo yathāśruteṣu dharmeṣu paryavāpteṣu cintiteṣu tuliteṣūpaparīkṣiteṣu svayam eva śakto bhavati pratibalas tān dharmān bhāvanākāreṇānusartum /
SA20srabhu_u:528_4: yaduta phalasyādhigamāya / ayam ucyate dharmānusārī pudgalaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:529_3: āha / sa eva śraddhānusārī pudgalo yasmin samaye śrāmaṇyaphalam adhigacchati sparśayati sākṣātkaroti parato 'vavādānuśāsanīm āgamya,
SA20srabhu_u:530_2: āha / sa eva dharmānusārī pudgalo yasmin samaye śrāmaṇyaphalam adhigacchati sparśayati sākṣātkaroti parato nāvavādānuśāsanīm āgamya,
SA20srabhu_u:531_1: kāyasākṣī pudgalaḥ katamaḥ / yo 'yaṃ pudgalo 'nulomapratilomam aṣṭau vimokṣān samāpadyate vyuttiṣṭhate ca /
SA20srabhu_u:531_3: na ca sarveṇa sarvam āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti /
SA20srabhu_u:532_2: yo 'yaṃ pudgalas trayāṇām saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāt satkāyadṛṣṭeḥ śīlavrataparāmarśasya vicikitsāyāḥ srota-āpanno bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:532_3: avinipātadharmā niyataḥ saṃbodhiparāyaṇaḥ saptakṛdbhavaparamaḥ saptakṛtvo devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca saṃdhāvya saṃsṛtya duḥkhasyāntaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhu_u:533_2: kulaṃkulaḥ pudgalaḥ katamaḥ / [smras pa / rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni gñis te /
SA20srabhu_u:533_3: lha'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:533_4: mi'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba'o /
SA20srabhu_u:533_5: / de la lha'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni /
SA20srabhu_u:533_6: lha rnams kyi rigs nas rigs su mtshams sbyar źiṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:533_7: 'khor nas sdug bsṅal mthar byed pa gaṅ yin pa'o /
SA20srabhu_u:533_8: de la mi'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba ni /
SA20srabhu_u:533_9: mi rnams kyi rigs nas rigs su mtshams sbyar źiṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:533_10: 'khor nas sdug bsṅal mthar byed pa gaṅ yin pa ste] /
SA20srabhu_u:534_2: yasya sakṛdāgāminaḥ pudgalasyānāgāmiphalapratipannakasya kāmāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānām adhimātramadhyakleśāḥ prahīṇā bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:534_4: sakṛc ca kāmāvacaradevabhavam abhinirvartya tatraiva parinirvāti /
SA20srabhu_u:535_5: tadyathā parīttaḥ śakalikāgnir utpanna eva parinirvāti /
SA20srabhu_u:536_3: no tu yenopapattibhavas tenādyāpy upanato bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:536_4: tadyathā, ayoguḍānāṃ vāyaḥsthālānāṃ vā dīptāgnisaṃprataptānām ayoghanair hanyamānānām ayaḥprapāṭikotpataty eva parinirvāti /
SA20srabhu_u:536_6: upanataś ca punar anupapanna eva parinirvāti /
SA20srabhu_u:537_0: ta ime trayo 'ntarāparinirvāyiṇaḥ pudgalā ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipyāntarāparinirvāyī pudgala ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:540_3: yo 'bhisaṃskāreṇa prayatnena khedena mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya tatropapannaḥ parinirvāti /
SA20srabhu_u:541_2: yaḥ pudgalo 'nāgāmī prathame dhyāna upapannaḥ sa na tatrastha eva parinirvāti /
SA20srabhu_u:541_3: api tu tasmāc cyavitvottarottaram upapattyāyatanam abhinirvartayan yāvad akaniṣṭhān vā devān gacchati,
SA20srabhu_u:542_2: yo mṛdvindriyagotraḥ pudgalo laukikebhyo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihīyate /
SA20srabhu_u:542_3: cetayati vā maraṇāya / anurakṣate vā vimuktim / atyarthāpramādacaryām anuyukto bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:542_6: no tu teṣāṃ teṣāṃ rātriṃdivasānāṃ kṣaṇalavamuhūrtānām atyayād atyarthaṃ viśeṣāya paraiti /
SA20srabhu_u:543_2: akopyadharmā pudgalaḥ katamaḥ / etadviparyayeṇākopyadharmā pudgalo veditavyaḥ //
SA20srabhu_u:544_2: yaḥ pudgalaḥ sarveṇa sarvam āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti /
SA20srabhu_u:544_3: no tv aṣṭau vimokṣān kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharati /
SA20srabhu_u:545_2: yaḥ pudgalaḥ sarveṇa sarvam āsravakṣayam anuprāpnoti /
SA20srabhu_u:545_4: tasya kleśāvaraṇāc ca cittaṃ muktaṃ bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:545_5: vimokṣāvaraṇāc ca / ayam ucyata ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ pudgalaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:546_2: pudgalavyavasthānaṃ katamat / ekādaśabhiḥ prabhedaiḥ pudgalavyavasthānaṃ veditavyam /
SA20srabhu_u:548_2: bhikṣur bhikṣuṇī śikṣamāṇā śrāmaṇeraḥ śrāmaṇery upāsaka upāsikā ca /
SA20srabhu_u:551_2: iha rāgacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ parītte sarvanihīne rañjanīye vastuni ghanam adhimātraṃ rāgaparyavasthānam utpādayati /
SA20srabhu_u:551_4: tac ca punā rāgaparyavasthānaṃ saṃtatyā cirakālam avasthāpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:552_1: no tu śaknoti rañjanīyān dharmān abhibhavitum /
SA20srabhu_u:552_3: akarkaśendriyaḥ, aparuṣendriyaḥ / nātyarthaṃ pareṣāṃ viheṭhanajātīyo yaduta kāyena vācā durvivejyaś ca bhavati duḥsaṃvejyaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:552_4: hīnādhimuktikaś ca bhavati / dṛḍhakarmāntaḥ / sthirakarmāntaḥ / dṛḍhavrataḥ / sthiravrataḥ / sahiṣṇuś ca bhavaty upakaraṇeṣu pariṣkāreṣu lolupajātīyas tadgurukaś ca,
SA20srabhu_u:552_5: saumanasyabahulaś ca bhavaty ānandībahulo vigatabhṛkuṭir uttānamukhavarṇaḥ smitapūrvaṃgamaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:552_6: ity evaṃbhāgīyāni rāgacaritasya pudgalasya liṅgāni veditavyāni /
SA20srabhu_u:553_2: iha dveṣacaritaḥ pudgalo (Śbh II 26) dveṣaṇīye vastuni parīttena pratighavastunimittena ghanaṃ prabhūtaṃ pratighaparyavasthānam utpādayati /
SA20srabhu_u:553_4: tasya ca pratighaparyavasthānasya dīrghakālaṃ saṃtatim avasthāpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:553_7: no tu dveṣaṇīyān dharmāñ chaknoty abhibhavitum /
SA20srabhu_u:553_8: rūkṣendriyaś ca bhavati / kharendriyaḥ karkaśendriyaḥ paruṣendriyaś ca bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:553_9: atyarthaṃ ca pareṣāṃ viheṭhanajātīyo bhavati yaduta kāyena vācā /
SA20srabhu_u:553_11: dhvāṅkṣo bhavati mukharaḥ, pragalbhaḥ, anadhimuktibahulaḥ / na dṛḍhakarmanto na sthirakarmanto na dṛḍhavrato na sthiravrataḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:553_13: akṣamo bhavaty asahiṣṇuḥ, vilomanajātīyaḥ, apradakṣiṇagrāhī duṣpratyāneyajātīyaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:553_14: upanāhabahulaḥ / krūrāśayaś caṇḍaś ca bhavaty ādāśī pratyakṣaravādī so 'lpamātram apy uktaḥ sann abhiṣajyate,
SA20srabhu_u:553_15: kupyati, vyāpadyate madguḥ pratitiṣṭhati kopaṃ saṃjanayati /
SA20srabhu_u:553_16: vikṛtabhṛkuṭiś ca bhavati / anuttānamukhavarṇaḥ, parasaṃpattidveṣṭā, īrṣyābahulaḥ / ity evaṃbhāgīyāni dveṣacaritasya pudgalasya liṅgāni veditavyāni /
SA20srabhu_u:554_3: iha mohacaritaḥ pudgalo mohasthānīye vastuni parītte ghanaṃ prabhūtaṃ mohaparyavasthānam utpādayati /
SA20srabhu_u:554_4: prāg eva madhyādhimātre / dīrghaṃ ca kālaṃ tasya mohaparyavasthānasya saṃtatim avasthāpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:554_5: tena ca anubaddho bhavati / sa mohanīyair dharmair abhibhūyate /
SA20srabhu_u:554_6: no tu mohanīyān dharmāñ chaknoty abhibhavitum /
SA20srabhu_u:554_7: dhandhendriyaś ca bhavati / jaḍendriyaś ca bhavati, mandendriyaś ca śithilakāyakarmāntaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:554_8_1: mandabhāṣī, durmedhaḥ, muṣitasmṛtiḥ, asaṃprajānadvihārī, vāmagrāhī, durvivejyaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:554_11: ity evaṃbhāgīyāni mohacaritasya pudgalasya liṅgāni veditavyāni /
SA20srabhu_u:555_2: iha mānacaritaḥ pudgalo mānasthānīye vastuni parītte 'pi ghanaṃ prabhūtamṃ mānaparyavasthānam utpādayati /
SA20srabhu_u:555_4: tasya ca mānaparyavasthānasya (Śbh II 30) dīrghakālaṃ saṃtatim avasthāpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:555_5: tena cānubaddho bhavati / sa mānasthānīyair dharmair abhibhūyate /
SA20srabhu_u:555_6: no tu mānasthānīyān dharmāñ chaknoty abhibhavitum /
SA20srabhu_u:555_7: uddhatendriyaś ca bhavaty unnatendriyaś ca kāyamaṇḍanānuyogam anuyuktaś ca bhavati/
SA20srabhu_u:555_8: adhimātram unnatāṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣate nāvanatām /
SA20srabhu_u:555_9: mātāpitṛjñātigurusthānīyānāṃ ca na kālena kālaṃ yathānurūpām apacitiṃ kartā bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:555_14: udārādhimuktiś ca bhavati / mandakāruṇyaḥ / adhimātraṃ cātmasattvajīvapoṣapuruṣapudgaladṛṣṭimanyubahalo bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:555_15: upanāhī ca / ity evaṃbhāgīyāni mānacaritasya pudgalasya liṅgāni veditavyāni /
SA20srabhu_u:556_2: iha vitarkacaritaḥ pudgalo vitarkasthānīye vastuni parītte 'pi ghanaṃ prabhūtaṃ vitarkaparyavasthānam utpādayati /
SA20srabhu_u:556_7: no tu vitarkasthānīyān dharmāñ chaknoty abhibhavitum /
SA20srabhu_u:556_8: asthirendriyaś ca bhavati capalendriyaś cañcalendriyo vyākulendriyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:556_18: ity evaṃbhāgīyāni vitarkacaritasya pudgalasya liṅgāni veditavyāni /
SA20srabhu_u:558_3: asti pratyekabuddhayāne, asti mahāyāne / tatra yo 'yaṃ pudgalaḥ śrāvakayāne kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ sa syāc chrāvakagotraḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:558_4: syāt pratyekabuddhagotraḥ, syān mahāyānagotraḥ / tatra yo 'yaṃ pudgalaḥ pratyekāyāṃ bodhau kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ so 'pi syāt pratyekabuddhagotraḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:558_5: syāc chrāvakagotraḥ, syān mahāyānagotraḥ / tatra yo 'yaṃ pudgalo mahāyāne kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ so 'pi syāc chrāvakagotraḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:559_0: tatra yo 'yaṃ śrāvakagotraḥ pudgalaḥ pratyekāyāṃ bodhāv anuttarāyāṃ vā samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:559_1: sa śrāvakagotratvād avaśyam ante kāle (Śbh II 34) tatpraṇidhānaṃ vyāvartya śrāvakayānapraṇidhāna evāvatiṣṭhate /
SA20srabhu_u:560_0: tatra bhavaty eṣāṃ pudgalānāṃ praṇidhānasaṃcāraḥ praṇidhānavyatikaraḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:560_1: no tu gotrasaṃcāraḥ, gotravyatikaraḥ / asmiṃs tv arthe śrāvakayānapraṇidhānāḥ śrāvakagotrāś caite pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:561_2: eṣāṃ yathoddiṣṭānāṃ yathāparikīrtitānāṃ pudgalānāṃ catasṛbhiḥ pratipadbhir niryāṇaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:561_3: katamābhiś catasṛbhiḥ / asti pratipad duḥkhā dhandhābhijñā/
SA20srabhu_u:562_0: tatra mṛdvindriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānālābhino yā pratipad iyam ucyate duḥkhā dhandhābhijñā /
SA20srabhu_u:562_1: tatra tīkṣṇendriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānālābhino yā pratipad iyam ucyate duḥkhā kṣiprābhijñā /
SA20srabhu_u:562_2: tatra mṛdvindriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipad iyam ucyate sukhā dhandhābhijñā /
SA20srabhu_u:562_3: tatra tīkṣṇendriyasya pudgalasya mauladhyānalābhino yā pratipad iyam ucyate sukhā kṣiprābhijñā /
SA20srabhu_u:563_6: srota-āpannasya, sakṛdāgāmino, 'nāgāmino, 'rhataś ca / ye pratipannakamārge vartante te pratipannakās teṣāṃ pratipannakamārgeṇa vyavasthānam /
SA20srabhu_u:564_3: no yaḥ pudgalaḥ śraddhānusāreṇa prayuktaḥ sa śraddhānusārī /
SA20srabhu_u:564_4: yo dharmeṣu aparapratyayavinayānusāreṇa prayuktaḥ sa dharmānusārī /
SA20srabhu_u:565_2: tadyathā kāyasākṣy aṣṭau vimokṣān kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharati /
SA20srabhu_u:565_3: na ca sarveṇa sarvam āsravakṣayam anuprāpto bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:565_4: rūpī rūpāṇi paśyati / adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati /
SA20srabhu_u:565_5: śubhaṃ vimokṣaṃ (Śbh II 38) kāyena sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya viharati /
SA20srabhu_u:565_6: akāśānantyāyatanam, vijñ snānantyāyatanam, ākiñcanyāyatanam, naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam, )saṃjñāvedayitanirodham anulomapratilomaṃ samāpadyate ca,
SA20srabhu_u:565_7: vyuttiṣṭhate ca / evaṃ samāpattiprabhedena pudgalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:566_4: sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyiṇaḥ, ūrdhvaṃsrotasaś ca / evam upapattiprabhedena pudgalavyavasthānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:567_2: tadyathā samayavimuktasyārhato yo bhavyo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇāya /
SA20srabhu_u:567_4: akopyadharmakasyārhato yo na bhavyo dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārebhyaḥ parihāṇāya /
SA20srabhu_u:568_4: na samāpattyāvaraṇāt / ubhayatobhāgavimuktas tv arhan kleśāvaraṇāc ca vimuktaḥ samāpattyāvaraṇāc ca /
SA20srabhu_u:569_1: ebhiḥ prabhedair yathoddiṣṭair yathoddiṣṭānāṃ pudgalānāṃ yathākramaṃ vyavasthānaṃ veditavyam //
SA20srabhu_u:571_2: āha / tad api caturvidham / tadyathā avikalpaṃ pratibimbam,
SA20srabhu_u:572_3: dṛṣṭaṃ vā, śrutaṃ vā, parikalpitaṃ vopādāya jñeyavastusabhāgaṃ pratibimbam samāhitabhūmikair vipaśyanākārair vipaśyati,
SA20srabhu_u:573_0: tatra jñeyaṃ vastu / tadyathāśubhā vā, maitrī vā, idaṃpratyayatāpratītyasamutpādo vā,
SA20srabhu_u:573_1: dhātuprabhedo vā, ānāpānasmṛtir vā, skandhakauśalyaṃ vā, dhātukauśalyam āyatanakauśalyaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:574_1: saddharmaśravaṇam vā, tanniśrayeṇa samāhitabhūmikaṃ manaskāraṃ saṃmukhīkṛtya,
SA20srabhu_u:574_2: tān eva dharmān (Śbh II 44) adhimucyate tad eva jñeyaṃ vastv adhimucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:574_3: tasya tasmin samaye pratyakṣānubhāvika ivādhimokṣaḥ pravartate jñeyavastuni /
SA20srabhu_u:574_4: na taj jñeyaṃ vastu pratyakṣībhūtaṃ bhavati samavahitaṃ saṃmukhībhūtam /
SA20srabhu_u:574_5: na ca punar anyat tajjātīyaṃ dravyam /
SA20srabhu_u:574_6: api tv adhimokṣānubhavaḥ sa tādṛśo manaskārānubhavaḥ samāhitabhūmikaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:574_7: yena tasya jñeyasya vastuno 'nusadṛśaṃ tad bhavati pratibhāsam /
SA20srabhu_u:574_8: yena tad ucyate jñeyavastusabhāgaṃ pratibimbam iti /
SA20srabhu_u:574_9: yad ayaṃ yogī santīrayaṃs tasmin prakṛte jñeye vastuni parīkṣye guṇadoṣāvadhāraṇaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhu_u:575_2: ihāyaṃ yogī pratibimnanimittam udgṛhya na punar vipaśyati,
SA20srabhu_u:575_3: vicinoti, prativicinoti, parivitarkayati, parimīmāṃsām āpadyate / api tu tad evālambanam amukto śamathākāreṇa tac cittaṃ śamayati /
SA20srabhu_u:575_4: yaduta navākārayā cittasthityādhyātmam eva cittaṃ sthāpayati,
SA20srabhu_u:575_5_0: saṃsthāpayati, avasthāpayati, upasthāpayati, damayati, śamayati, vyupaśamayati, ekotīkaroti,
SA20srabhu_u:575_5_1: samādhatte / tasya tasmin samaye nirvikalpaṃ (Śbh II 46) tat pratibimbam ālambanaṃ
SA20srabhu_u:576_0: tac ca pratibimbaṃ pratibimbam ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:576_2: tiṅ ṅe 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi yul daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:576_3: tiṅ ṅe 'dzin gyi thabs daṅ / tiṅ ṅe 'dzin gyi sgo daṅ / yid la byed pa'i rten daṅ / naṅ du rnam par rtog pa'i lus daṅ /
SA20srabhu_u:576_4: snaṅ brñan źes kyaṅ bya ste] /
SA20srabhu_u:576_5: itīmāni tasya jñeyavastusabhāgasya pratibimbasya paryāyanāmāni veditavyāni /
SA20srabhu_u:577_1: vastuparyantatā katamā / yālambanasya yāvadbhāvikatā yathāvadbhāvikatā ca /
SA20srabhu_u:578_0: tatra yāvadbhāvikatā katamā / yasmāt pareṇa nāsti rūpaskandho vā,
SA20srabhu_u:578_1: vedanāskandho vā, saṃjñāskandho vā, saṃskāraskandho vā, vijñānaskandho veti sarvasaṃskṛtavastusaṃgrahaḥ pañcabhir dharmaiḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:579_3_1: iti yā cālambanasya yāvadbhāvikatā yā ca (Śbh II 48) yathāvadbhāvikatā tad ekadhyam
SA20srabhu_u:580_2: yad asya yogina āsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayāc chamathavipaśyanāyā yah pratibimbālambano manaskāraḥ sa paripūryate /
SA20srabhu_u:580_5: āśrayaparivṛtteś ca pratibimbam atikramya tasminn eva jñeye vastuni nirvikalpaṃ pratyakṣaṃ jñānadarśanam utpadyate /
SA20srabhu_u:581_0: tāny etāni bhavanti catvāry ālambanavastūni sarvatragāni sarveṣv ālambaneṣv anugatāni /
SA20srabhu_u:582_0: api caitad ālambanam śamathapakṣyaṃ vipaśyanāpakṣyaṃ sarvavastukam bhūtavastukaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:582_1: hetuphalavastukaṃ ca / tena tad vyāpīty ucyate / yat tāvad t āha “savikalpaṃ pratibimbam” itīdam atra vipaśyanapakṣyasya /

SA20srabhu_u:647_1: sa punaḥ katamaḥ / santy asmin kāya ūrdhvaṃgamā vāyavaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:647_2: adhogamā vāyavaḥ, pārśvaśayā vāyavaḥ, kukṣiśayā vāyavaḥ, pṛṣṭhiśayā vāyavaḥ vāyvaṣṭhīlā vāyavaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:647_4: viṣūcikā vāyavaḥ, āśvāsapraśvāsā vāyavaḥ, aṅgapratyaṅgānusāriṇo vāyavaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:648_0: bāhyo vāyudhātuḥ katamaḥ / yad bāhyaṃ vāyur vāyugataṃ laghutvaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:648_2: sa punaḥ katamaḥ / santi bahirdhā pūrvā vāyavaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:648_3_0: dakṣiṇā vāyavaḥ, uttarā vāyavaḥ, paścimā vāyavaḥ, sarajaso vāyavaḥ, arajaso vāyavaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:648_3_1: parīttā mahadgatā vāyavaḥ, viśvā vāyavaḥ, vairambhā vāyavaḥ, vāyumaṇḍalakavāyavaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:648_3_2: bhavati ca samayo yasmin mahān vāyuskandhaḥ samudāgato vṛkṣāgrān api (Śbh II 78)
SA20srabhu_u:648_4: kuḍyāgrān api pātayati, parvatāgrān api pātayati / pātayitvā nirupādāno nirgacchati /
SA20srabhu_u:648_6: tālavṛntena vā, vidhamanakena veti, yo vā punar anyo 'py evaṃbhāgīyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:649_1_0: ākāśadhātuḥ katamaḥ / yac cakṣuḥsauṣiryaṃ vā, śrotrasauṣiryaṃ vā, ghrāṇasauṣiryaṃ
SA20srabhu_u:649_1_1: vā, mukhasauṣiryaṃ vā, kaṇṭhasauṣiryaṃ veti, yena vābhyavaharati, yatra vābhyavaharati,
SA20srabhu_u:649_1_2: yena vābhyavahriyate, adhobhāgena pragharatīti, yo vā punar anyo 'py evaṃbhāgīyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:649_4: tat punaś cittaṃ mano vijñānaṃ ca /
SA20srabhu_u:650_1: tatra mānacaritaḥ pudgala imaṃ dhātuprabhedaṃ manasikurvan kāye piṇḍasaṃjñāṃ vibhāvayati,
SA20srabhu_u:650_4: mānaṃ pratanūkaroti / tasmāc caritāc cittaṃ (Śbh II 80) viśodhayati /
SA20srabhu_u:650_5: ayam ucyate dhātuprabhedaḥ / mānacaritasya pudgalasya caritaviśodhanam ālambanam /
SA20srabhu_u:651_1: tatrānāpānasmṛtiḥ katamā / āśvāsapraśvāsālambanā smṛtir iyam ucyata ānāpānasmṛtiḥ //
SA20srabhu_u:652_1: tatra dvāv āśvāsau / katamau dvau / āśvāso 'ntarāśvāsaś ca / dvau praśvāsau / katamau dvau / praśvāso 'ntarapraśvāsaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:653_0: tatrāśvāso yaḥ praśvāsasamanantaram antarmukho vāyuḥ pravartate yāvan nābhīpradeśāt /
SA20srabhu_u:654_0: tatrāntarāśvāso ya uparate 'sminn āśvāse na tāvat praśvāsa utpadyate,
SA20srabhu_u:654_1: yadantarāle viśrāmasthānasahagata itvarakālīnas tadanusadṛśo vāyur utpadyate /
SA20srabhu_u:656_0: tatrāyaṃ viśeṣo bahirmukho vāyuḥ pravartata iti vaktavyam,
SA20srabhu_u:657_1: dvāv āśvāsapraśvāsanidānau / katamau dvau / tadākṣepakaṃ ca karma, nābhīpradeśasauṣiryaṃ ca, tato vā punar uttari yat kāyasauṣiryam /
SA20srabhu_u:658_3: katamau dvau / kāyaś cittaṃ ca / tat kasya hetoḥ / kāyasaṃniśritāś cittasaṃniśritāś cāśvāsapraśvāsāḥ pravartante /
SA20srabhu_u:658_4: te ca yathāyogaṃ sacet kāyasaṃniśritā eva pravarteran,
SA20srabhu_u:658_5: asaṃjñisamāpannānāṃ, nirodhasamāpannānām asaṃjñisattveṣu deveṣūpapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ pravarteran /
SA20srabhu_u:659_0: sacet kāyasaṃniśritāś cittasaṃniśritāḥ pravarteraṃs te ca na yathāyogaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:659_1: tena caturthadhyānasamāpannopapannānām sattvānāṃ kalalagatānāṃ cārbudagatānāṃ peśīgatānām sattvānāṃ pravarteran /
SA20srabhu_u:659_2: na ca pravartante / tasmād āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ kāyasaṃniśritāś cittasaṃniśritāś ca pravartante te ca yathāyogam /
SA20srabhu_u:660_1: dve āśvāsapraśvāsayor gatī / katame dve / āśvāsayor adhogatiḥ, praśvāsayor ūrdhvagatiḥ //
SA20srabhu_u:661_1: dve āśvāsapraśvāsayor bhūmī / katame dve / audārikaṃ ca sauṣiryaṃ, sūkṣmaṃ ca sauṣiryam /
SA20srabhu_u:662_0: tatraudārikaṃ sauṣiryaṃ nābhīpradeśam upādāya yāvan mukhanāsikādvāram /
SA20srabhu_u:663_3: katamāni catvāri / vāyavaḥ, ānāpānāḥ, āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ, kāyasaṃskārāś ceti / tatrānyair vāyubhiḥ (Śbh II 84) sādhāraṇaṃ paryāyanāmaikaṃ yaduta vāyur iti /
SA20srabhu_u:665_0: tatrātiśithilaprayogatayā kausīdyaprāptasya styānamiddhaṃ vā cittaṃ paryavanahati,
SA20srabhu_u:665_1: bahirdhā vā vikṣipyate / tathātyavaṣṭabdhaprayuktasya kāyavaiṣamyam votpadyate cittavaiṣamyaṃ vā /
SA20srabhu_u:666_1: balābhinigraheṇāśvāsapraśvāsān abhiniṣpīḍayataḥ kāye viṣamā vāyavaḥ pravartante /
SA20srabhu_u:666_2: ye 'sya tatprathamatas teṣu teṣv aṅgapratyaṅgeṣu sphuranti /
SA20srabhu_u:666_3: ye sphurakā ity ucyante / te punaḥ sphurakā vāyavo vivardhamānā rujakā bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:666_4: ye 'sya teṣu teṣv aṅgapratyaṅgeṣu rujām utpādayanti /
SA20srabhu_u:667_1: cittaṃ vāsya vikṣipyate / pragāḍhena vā daurmanasyopāyāsenābhibhūyate /
SA20srabhu_u:668_1: asyāḥ khalv ānāpānasmṛteḥ pañcavidhaḥ paricayo veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:668_2: tadyathā gaṇanāparicayaḥ skandhāvatāraparicayaḥ pratītyasamutpādāvatāraparicayaḥ satyāvatāraparicayaḥ ṣoḍaśākāraparicayaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:670_1: tatraikaikagaṇanā katamā / yadāśvāsaḥ praviṣṭo bhavati, tadāśvāsapraśvāsālambanopanibaddhayā smṛtyaikam iti gaṇayati /
SA20srabhu_u:670_2: yadāśvāse niruddhe praśvāsa utpadya nirgato bhavati tadā dvitīyaṃ gaṇayati,
SA20srabhu_u:670_3: evaṃ yāvad daśa gaṇayati / eṣā hi gaṇanā saṃkhyā nātisaṃkṣiptā nātivistarā /
SA20srabhu_u:671_1: dvayaikagaṇanā katamā / yadāśvāsaḥ praviṣṭo bhavati niruddhaś ca praśvāsa utpanno bhavati nirgataś ca,
SA20srabhu_u:671_2: tadaikam iti gaṇayati / anena gaṇanāyogena yāvad daśa gaṇayati /
SA20srabhu_u:671_3: iyam ucyate dvayaikagaṇanā / āśvāsaṃ ca praśvāsaṃ cedaṃ dvayam ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipyaikam iti gaṇayati,
SA20srabhu_u:672_1: anulomagaṇanā katamā / anayaivaikaikagaṇanayā dvayaikagaṇanayā vānulomaṃ yāvad daśa gaṇayati /
SA20srabhu_u:673_1: pratilomagaṇanā katamā / pratilomaṃ daśa upādāya navāṣṭau sapta ṣaṭ pañca yāvad ekaṃ gaṇayati /
SA20srabhu_u:674_0: yadā sa ekaikagaṇanāṃ niśritya dvayaikagaṇanāṃ vā,
SA20srabhu_u:675_1: katamo gaṇanāviśeṣaḥ / ekaikagaṇanayā vā, dvayaikagaṇanayā vā, dvayam ekaṃ kṛtvā gaṇayati / tatra dvayaikagaṇanayā catvāra āśvāsapraśvāsā ekaṃ (Śbh II 88) bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:675_2: ekaikagaṇanayā punar āśvāsaḥ praśvāsaś “ caikaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:675_3: evaṃ yāvad daśa gaṇayati / evam uttarottaravṛddhyā yāvac chatam apy ekaṃ kṛtvā gaṇayati /
SA20srabhu_u:675_5: evam asya gaṇanāprayutkasya yāvad daśaikaṃ kṛtvā gaṇayati /
SA20srabhu_u:675_6: yāvac ca daśa paripūrayati / tayā daśaikagaṇanayā na cāsyāntarāc cittaṃ vikṣipyate /
SA20srabhu_u:676_0: tasya ca gaṇanāprayuktasya saced antarāc cittaṃ vikṣipyate,
SA20srabhu_u:676_1: tadā punaḥ pratinivartyādito gaṇayitum ārabhate 'nulomaṃ vā,
SA20srabhu_u:676_2: pratilomaṃ vā / yadā cāsya gaṇanāparicayāt tac cittaṃ svarasenaiva vāhimārgasamārūḍham āśvāsapraśvāsālambanopanibaddham avyavacchinnaṃ nirantaraṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:676_6: nivṛtte punar nivṛttigrāhakam āśvāsaśūnyāvasthāgrāhakam avikaṃpyam avicalam avikṣepākāram,
SA20srabhu_u:677_3: āśvāsapraśvāsā anugantavyāś cābhilakṣayitavyāś ca sāntarāśvāsapraśvāsāḥ sapravṛttinivṛttyavasthāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:677_6: sa khalv eṣa gaṇanāparicayo mṛdvindriyāṇāṃ vyapadiśyate /
SA20srabhu_u:677_7: teṣām etad (Śbh II 90) vyākṣepasthānaṃ bhavati cittasthitaye cittanirataye /
SA20srabhu_u:677_8: anyathā gaṇanām antareṇa teṣāṃ styānamiddhaṃ vā cittaṃ paryavanaheta,
SA20srabhu_u:677_10: gaṇanāprayuktānāṃ tu teṣām etan na bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:678_0: ye tu tīkṣṇendriyāḥ paṭubuddhayas teṣāṃ punar gaṇanāprayogeṇa priyārohatā bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:678_1: tatropadiṣṭā evaṃ gaṇanāprayogaṃ laghu laghv eva pratividhyanti,
SA20srabhu_u:678_2: na ca tenābhiramante / te punar āśvāsapraśvāsālambanāṃ smṛtim upanibadhya yatra ca pravartante yāvac ca pravartante,
SA20srabhu_u:678_3: yathā ca pravartante, yadā ca pravartante, tat sarvam anugacchaty upalakṣayaty upasthitayā smṛtyā /
SA20srabhu_u:679_0: tasya ca prayogasyāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayāt kāyaprasrabdhir utpadyate,
SA20srabhu_u:679_1: cittaprasrabdhiś ca / ekāgratāṃ ca spṛśaty ālambanābhiratiṃ ca nirgacchati /
SA20srabhu_u:680_1: sa evaṃ kṛtaparicayo grāhyagrāhakavastumanasikāreṇa skandhān avatarati /
SA20srabhu_u:680_2: kathaṃ ca punar avatarati / ye cāśvāsapraśvāsā yaś caiṣām āśrayakāyas taṃ manasikurvan rūpaskandham avatarati /
SA20srabhu_u:680_3: yā teṣām āśvāsapraśvāsānāṃ tadgrāhikayā smṛtyā saṃprayuktānubhāvanā sa vedanāskandha ity avatarati /
SA20srabhu_u:680_4: yā saṃjānanā sa saṃjñāskandha ity avatarati /
SA20srabhu_u:680_5: yā cāsau smṛtir yā ca cetanā,
SA20srabhu_u:680_6: yā ca tatra prajñā, ayaṃ saṃskāraskandha ity avatarati /
SA20srabhu_u:680_7: yac (Śbh II 92) cittaṃ mano vijñānam ayaṃ vijñanaskandha ity avatarati /
SA20srabhu_u:680_8: yā tadbahulavihāritā evaṃ skandheṣv avatīrṇasyāyam ucyate skandhāvatāraparicayaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:681_1: yadā cānena skandhamātraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati parijñātaṃ saṃskāramātraṃ vastumātraṃ tadā sa eṣām eva saṃskārāṇāṃ pratītyasamutpādam avatarati /
SA20srabhu_u:681_2: kathaṃ ca punar avatarati / sa evaṃ samanveṣate paryeṣate,
SA20srabhu_u:681_4: tasyaivaṃ bhavati / “kāyāśritā eta āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ kāyapratyayāś cittāśritāś cittapratyayāś ca” /
SA20srabhu_u:682_1: sa “kāyaś cittaṃ ca jīvitendriyapratyayam” ity avatarati /
SA20srabhu_u:683_11: sa tadbahulavihārī pratītyasamutpādāvatāre kṛtaparicaya ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:684_1: sa evaṃ pratītyasamutpāde kṛtaparicayo “ya ete saṃskārāḥ pratītyasamutpannā anityā eta” ity avatarati /
SA20srabhu_u:684_3: punar ete 'bhūtvā bhavanti bhūtvā ca prativigacchanti te jātidharmāṇaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:684_4: jarādharmāṇaḥ, vyādhidharmāṇaḥ, maraṇadharmāṇaḥ / ye jātijarāvyādhimaraṇadharmāṇas te duḥkhāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:684_5: ye duḥkhās te 'nātmānaḥ, asvatantrāḥ, svāmivirahitāḥ” / evaṃ so 'nityaduḥkhaśūnyānātmākārair duḥkhasatyam avatīrṇo bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:684_6: tasyaivaṃ bhavati / “yā kācid eṣāṃ saṃskārāṇām abhinirvṛttir duḥkhabhūtā rogabhūtā gaṇḍabhūtā sarvāsau tṛṣṇāpratyayā /
SA20srabhu_u:684_7: yat punar asyā duḥkhajanikāyās tṛṣṇāyā aśeṣaprahāṇam etac chāntam etat praṇītam evaṃ ca me jānata evaṃ bahulavihāriṇas tṛṣṇāyā aśeṣaprahāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatī”ti /
SA20srabhu_u:684_8: evaṃ hi samudayasatyaṃ nirodhasatyaṃ mārgasatyam avatīrṇo bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:685_0: tasyaivam satyeṣu kṛtaparicayasya darśanaprahātavyeṣu kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣu bhāvanāprahātavyā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:686_2: katame punaḥ ṣoḍaśākārāḥ / (Śbh II 96) tadyathā smṛta āśvasan “smṛta āśvasimī”ti śikṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:686_4: dīrgham hrasvaṃ sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasan “sarvakāyapratisaṃvedy āśvasimī”ti śikṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:686_6: prasrabhya kāyasaṃskārān āśvasan “prasrabhya kāyasaṃskārān āśvasimī”ti śikṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:686_9: cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān āśvasan “prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān āśvasimī”ti śikṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:686_10: prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān praśvasan “prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān praśvasimī”ti śikṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:686_11: cittapratisaṃvedī / abhipramodayaṃś cittaṃ samādadhaṃś crttaṃ vimocayaṃś cittam āśvasan “vimocayaṃś cittam āśvasimī”ti śikṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:686_12: vimocayaṃś cittaṃ praśvasan “vimocayaṃś cittaṃ praśvasimī”ti śikṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:686_13: anityānudarśī, prahāṇānudarśī, virāgānudarśī, nirodhānudarśy āśvasan “nirodhānudarśy āśvasimī”ti śikṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:686_14: nirodhānudarśī praśvasan nirodhānudarśī praśvasimīti (Śbh II 98) śikṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:687_2: sa śaikṣo dṛṣṭapado lābhī bhavati caturṇāṃ smṛtyupasthānānām /
SA20srabhu_u:687_3: āśvāsapraśvāsālambanaṃ ca manaskāram ārabhate 'vaśiṣṭānāṃ saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇāya /
SA20srabhu_u:688_0: yadāśvāsaṃ vā praśvāsaṃ vālambate tadā “dīrgham āśvasimi praśvasimī”ti śikṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:689_0: yadāntarāśvāsam antarapraśvāsaṃ vālambanīkaroti tadā “hrasvam āśvasimi praśvasimī”ti śikṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:691_0: yasmin vā punaḥ samaye niruddha āśvāse 'ntarāśvāse ca /
SA20srabhu_u:691_4: praśvāsāśvāsaśūnyāṃ tadvyapetāṃ tadvyavahitāṃ riktām avasthām ālambanīkaroti /
SA20srabhu_u:692_0: api tu khalu tasyāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayāt /
SA20srabhu_u:692_1: ye kharā duḥsaṃsparśā āśvāsapraśvāsāḥ pūrvam akṛtaparicayasya pravṛtta bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:692_2: kṛtaparicayasya anye ca mṛdavaḥ sukhasaṃsparśāḥ pravartante /
SA20srabhu_u:693_0: sa caivam ānāpānasmṛtiprayogeṇa ca yuktaḥ sacel lābhī bhavati prathamasya vā dhyānasya dvitīyasya vā tasmin samaye prītipratisaṃvedy āśvasan,
SA20srabhu_u:694_0: sacet punar lābhī bhavati niṣprītikasya tṛtīyasya dhyānasya sa tasmin samaye sukhapratisaṃvedī bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:694_1: tṛtīyāc ca dhyānād ūrdhvam ānāpānasmṛtisaṃprayogo nāsti /
SA20srabhu_u:695_0: tasyaivaṃ prītipratisaṃvedino vā sukhapratisaṃvedino vā sacet kadācit karhacit smṛtisaṃpramoṣād utpadyate /
SA20srabhu_u:695_1: “asmī”ti vā, “ayam aham asmī”ti vā, “bhaviṣyāmī”ti vā, “na bhaviṣyāmī”ti vā, “rūpī bhaviṣyāmy arūpī bhaviṣyāmi” (Śbh II 102) /
SA20srabhu_u:695_3: evam saṃmohasaṃjñācetanāsahagatam iñjitaṃ manyitaprapañcitābhisaṃskṛtaṃ tṛṣṇāgatam utpadyate /
SA20srabhu_u:695_4: sa tad utpannaṃ laghu laghv eva prajñayā pratividhyati nādhivāsayati prajahāti vinodayati vyantīkaroti /
SA20srabhu_u:695_5: evaṃ cittasaṃskārapratisaṃvedī “prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān āśvasimī”ty āśvasan “prasrabhya cittasaṃskārān āśvasimī”ti śikṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:696_0: sacet punar lābhī bhavati maulānāṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyānāṃ dhyānānāṃ sa cāvaśyam anāgamyasya prathamadhyānasāmantakasya lābhī bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:696_1: sa taṃ niśrityotpannaṃ svaṃ cittaṃ pratyavekṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:696_2: sarāgaṃ vā vigatarāgaṃ vā sadveṣaṃ vā vigatadveṣaṃ vā samohaṃ vigatamohaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:696_3_0: saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ līnaṃ pragṛhītam uddhatam anuddhataṃ vyupaśāntaṃ avyupaśāntaṃ
SA20srabhu_u:696_3_1: samāhitam asamāhitaṃ subhāvitam asubhāvitaṃ vimuktaṃ cittam avimuktaṃ cittam iti
SA20srabhu_u:697_0: sa yadā styānamiddhanivaraṇena cittaṃ nivṛtaṃ bhavaty adhyātmam saṃśamayatas tadānyatamānyatamena prasadanīyenālambanena saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati /
SA20srabhu_u:698_0_0: yadā punar auddhatyanivaraṇena kaukṛtyanivaraṇena nivṛtaṃ paśyaty abhisaṃpragṛhṇatas
SA20srabhu_u:699_0: yadā ca tac cittam āsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayān nivaraṇasamudācārād dūrīkṛtaṃ bhavati nivaraṇebhyo viśodhitam /
SA20srabhu_u:699_1: tenāha vimocayaṃś cittam āśvasan “vimocayaṃś cittam āśvasimī”ti śikṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:700_0: tasya nivaraṇebhyo vimuktacetaso mārgabhāvanāyā āntarāyikebhyo 'nuśayā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti prahātavyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:700_2: yaduta saṃskārānityatām eva sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca yoniśaḥ pratyaveksate /
SA20srabhu_u:701_0: tena ca pūrvaṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyadhyānasanniśrayeṇānāgamyasaṃniśrayeṇa vā punaḥ śamathayogaḥ kṛtaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:701_2: evam asya tac cittaṃ śamathavipaśyanāparibhāvitaṃ dhātuṣu vimucyate yadutānuśayebhyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:702_0: katame dhātavaḥ / yaś ca prahāṇadhātur yaś ca virāgadhātur yaś ca nirodhadhātuḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:702_1: tatra sarvasaṃskārāṇāṃ darśanaprahātavyānāṃ prahāṇāt (Śbh II 106) prahāṇadhātuḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:702_4: sa evaṃ trīn dhātuñ śāntato manasikurvan kṣemata ārogyataḥ śamathavipaśyanāṃ bhāvayati /
SA20srabhu_u:702_5: yenāsyāsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayād avaśiṣṭebhyo bhāvanāprahātavyebhyaḥ kleśebhyaś cittaṃ vimucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:702_6: tenāha prahāṇānudarśī, virāgānudarśī, nirodhānudarśy āśvasan “nirodhānudarśy āśvasimī”ti śikṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:703_0: evam ayaṃ darśanabhāvanāprahātavyeṣu kleśeṣu prahīṇeṣv arhan bhavati kṣīṇāsravaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:703_4: yaś cāyaṃ pañcavidhaḥ paricaya iyam asyocyata ānāpānasmṛtiḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:704_0: yatra vitarkacaritaḥ pudgalaḥ prayujyamānaḥ priyārohatayā prayujyate /
SA20srabhu_u:704_1: savyāpāraṃ caitad ālambanaṃ savyākṣepam adhyātmaṃ pratyātmam āsannāsannaṃ,
SA20srabhu_u:704_2: yenāsya tatra prayujyamānasya yo vitarkasaṃkṣobhaḥ sa na bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:704_4: abhiramate / idaṃ pañcamaṃ vitarkacaritasya pudgalasya caritaviśodhanam ālambanam /
SA20srabhu_u:705_2: tadyathā skandhakauśalyaṃ dhātukauśalyam āyatanakauśalyaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalyaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalyam /
SA20srabhu_u:706_2: tatra katame skandhāḥ, katamat skandhakauśalyam / āha / pañca skandhāḥ rūpaskandho vedanāskandhaḥ saṃjñāskandhaḥ saṃskāraskandho vijñānaskandhaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:707_0: tatra rūpaskandhaḥ katamaḥ / yat kiñcid rūpaṃ sarvaṃ tac catvāri mahābhūtāni catvāri mahābhūtāny upādāya /
SA20srabhu_u:707_1: tat punar atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ vaudārikaṃ vā sūkṣmaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā praṇītaṃ vā dūre vāntike vā /
SA20srabhu_u:708_2: duḥkhavedanīyaṃ vā, aduḥkhāsukhavedanīyaṃ vā / ṣaḍ vedanākāyāś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā /
SA20srabhu_u:709_1: tadyathā sanimittasaṃjñā, animittasaṃjñā, parīttasaṃjñā, mahadgatasaṃjñā, apramāṇasaṃjñā, nāsti kiñcid ity ākiñcanyāyatanasaṃjñā /
SA20srabhu_u:709_2: ṣaṭ saṃjñākāyāś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā saṃjñā śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanaḥsaṃsparśajā saṃjñā /
SA20srabhu_u:710_0: saṃskāraskandhaḥ katamaḥ / ṣaṭ cetanākāyāś cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā cetanā,
SA20srabhu_u:710_2: vedanāṃ ca saṃjñāṃ ca sthāpayitvā ye tadanye caitasikā dharmāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:710_4: yac cittaṃ mano vijñānam / te punaḥ ṣaḍ vijñānakāyāḥ / cakṣurvijñānaṃ śrotraghrāṇajihvākāyamanovijñānam /
SA20srabhu_u:711_0: sā caiṣā vedanā saṃjñā saṃskāras tac caitad vijñānam atītānāgatapratyutpannam ādhyātmikaṃ vā bāhyaṃ veti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20srabhu_u:712_0: skandhakauśalyaṃ katamat / ya etān yathoddiṣṭān dharmāN nānātmakatayā (Śbh II 110) ca jānāti bahvātmakatayā ca,
SA20srabhu_u:712_1: na ca tataḥ param upalabhate vikalpayati vā /
SA20srabhu_u:713_1: anya eva rūpaskandho 'nyo vedanāskandha evam anyo yāvad vijñānaskandhaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:714_0: tatra katamā bahvātmakatā / yo rūpaskandho 'nekavidho bahunānāprakāraḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:715_0: kiṃ ca na tasmāt param upalabhate vikalpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:715_2: no tu skandhavyatirekeṇātmānam upalabhate nityadhruvam avipariṇāmadharmakam /
SA20srabhu_u:715_3: nāpy ātmīyaṃ, kiṃcid idaṃ nopalabhate, na vikalpayati tasmāt pareṇa /
SA20srabhu_u:716_1_0: tatra katame dhātavaḥ / katamad dhātukauśalyam / āha / aṣṭādaśa dhātavaḥ / cakṣurdhātū
SA20srabhu_u:716_1_1: rūpadhātuś cakṣurvijñānadhātuḥ śrotradhātuḥ śabdadhātuḥ śrotravijñānadhātur ghrāṇadhātur
SA20srabhu_u:716_1_2: gandhadhātur ghrāṇavijñānadhātur jihvādhātū rasadhātur jihvāvijñānadhātuḥ kāyadhātuḥ
SA20srabhu_u:717_1: yat punar etān aṣṭādaśa dharmān svakāt svakād dhātoḥ svakasvakād bījāt svakasvakād gotrāj jāyante nirvartante prādurbhavantīti jānāti rocayann upanidhyāti /
SA20srabhu_u:717_2: idam ucyate dhātukauśalyam / yad aṣṭādaśānāṃ dharmāṇām svakasvakād dhātoḥ pravṛttiṃ jānāti tad evam sati hetupratyayakauśalyam etad yaduta dhātukauśalyam /
SA20srabhu_u:719_0: katamad āyatanakauśalyam / tatra cakṣur adhipatī rūpāṇy ālambanaṃ cakṣurvijñānasya sasaṃprayogasyotpattaye,
SA20srabhu_u:719_2: tatra śrotram adhipatiḥ śabda ālambanaṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ ca manaḥ samanantarapratyayaḥ śrotravijñānasya sasaṃprayogasyotpattaye /
SA20srabhu_u:719_3: evaṃ yāvan manaḥsamanantaraṃ tajjo manaskāro 'dhipatipratyayo dharma ālambanaṃ manovijñānasya sasaṃprayogasyotpattaye,
SA20srabhu_u:719_4: iti tribhiḥ pratyayaiḥ samanantarapratyayena ālambanapratyayena adhipatipratyayena ca ṣaṇṇāṃ vijñānakāyānāṃ pravṛttir bhavati sasaṃprayogāṇām iti /
SA20srabhu_u:720_3: āha / avidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārāḥ, saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānam, vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpam / vistareṇa yāvat / evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:721_0: yat punar dharmā eva dharmān abhispandayanti dharmā eva dharmān parispandayanti /
SA20srabhu_u:721_2: te ca hetusamutpannatvāt (Śbh II 114) pratītyasamutpannatvād abhūtvā bhavanti bhūtvā ca prativigacchanti /
SA20srabhu_u:721_4: ye punar anityās te jātidharmāṇo jarādharmāṇo vyādhidharmāṇo maraṇadharmāṇaḥ śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsadharmāṇaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:721_6: ye vā punar duḥkhā, asvatantrā, durbalās ta anātmāna iti / yad ebhir ākāraiḥ pratītyasamutpanneṣu dharmeṣv anityajñānam,
SA20srabhu_u:723_3: akuśalānām aniṣṭa iti / yad evaṃ jñānam idam ucyate sthānāsthānakauśalyam /
SA20srabhu_u:724_0: tac caitat pañcasthānakauśalyaṃ samāsataḥ svalakṣaṇakauśalyaṃ bhavati sāmānyalakṣaṇakauśalyaṃ ca /
SA20srabhu_u:724_1: tatra skandhakauśalyena svalakṣaṇakauśalyam ākhyātam avaśiṣṭaiḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇakauśalyam /
SA20srabhu_u:725_2: āha / adhobhūmīnām audārikatvam uparibhūmīnāṃ śāntatvaṃ ca /
SA20srabhu_u:725_3: tadyathā kāmadhātau prathamadhyānasya evaṃ yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasya /
SA20srabhu_u:726_0: tatra katamā audārikatā / audārikatā dvividhā / svabhāvaudārikatā saṃkhyaudārikatā ca /
SA20srabhu_u:727_0: tatra svabhāvaudārikatā kāmadhātāv api pañcaskandhāḥ saṃvidyante prathame tu dhyāne /
SA20srabhu_u:727_1: ye kāmāvacarās te sādīnavatarāś ca duḥkhavihāratarāś ca,
SA20srabhu_u:727_5: prathame tu dhyāne na tathā tena te śāntatarāḥ praṇītatarā ity ucyante /
SA20srabhu_u:728_1: kāmāvacaro rūpaskandhaḥ prabhūtataraḥ parijñeyaḥ prahātavya evaṃ yāvad vijñānaskandhaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:728_3: evam uparimāsu bhūmiṣu svabhāvaudārikatā saṃkhyaudārikatā ca yathāyogaṃ veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:729_0: iyaṃ tūparimāsu bhūmiṣu yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanāt tadaudārikatā veditavyāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:729_1: sarvā adharimā bhūmayo duḥkhavihāratarāś ca alpāyuṣkatarāś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:730_1: yasyāṃ yasyāṃ bhūmau prabhūtataram ādīnavaṃ bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:731_0: yasyāṃ tu yasyāṃ bhūmāv alpataram ādīnavaṃ bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:731_2: idaṃ laukikānāṃ laukikena mārgeṇa kleśaviśodhanam ālambanam,
SA20srabhu_u:731_4: rogataḥ, ayogakṣemataḥ, uparimāṃ ca bhūmiṃ śāntataḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:731_5: ya adhobhūmikāḥ kleśā yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikāḥ kāmadhātum upādāya te prahīyante /
SA20srabhu_u:731_7: te punar eva te pratisaṃdhikā bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:732_2: lokottareṇa vā punar mārgeṇa kleśaviśodhanam ālambanaṃ caturvidhaṃ tadyathā duḥkhasatyaṃ samudayasatyaṃ nirodhasatyaṃ mārgasatyaṃ ca /
SA20srabhu_u:733_0: tatra duḥkhasatyaṃ katamat / tadyathā jātir duḥkhaṃ jarā duḥkhaṃ vyādhir maraṇam apriyasaṃprayogaḥ priyavinābhāva icchāvighātaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:734_0: tatra samudaya āryasatyaṃ tṛṣṇā paunarbhavikī nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī /
SA20srabhu_u:735_0: tatra nirodha āryasatyaṃ yad asyā eva tṛṣṇāyā aśeṣaprahāṇam /
SA20srabhu_u:737_0: tatra kṛṣṇapakṣaṃ śuklapakṣaṃ copādāya hetuphalavyavasthānena catuḥsatyavyavasthānam /
SA20srabhu_u:737_1: tatra duḥkhasatyaṃ phalam / samudayasatyaṃ hetuḥ / nirodhasatyaṃ phalam / mārgasatyaṃ hetuḥ prāptaye sparśanāyai /
SA20srabhu_u:738_0: tatra duḥkhasatyaṃ vyādhisthānīyaṃ tat prathamataḥ parijñeyam /
SA20srabhu_u:738_2: nirodhasatyam ārogyasthānīyaṃ tac ca sparśayitavyaṃ sākṣātkartavyam /
SA20srabhu_u:738_3: mārgasatyaṃ bhaiṣajyasthānīyaṃ tac cāsevitavyaṃ bhāvayitavyaṃ bahulīkartavyam /
SA20srabhu_u:739_1: bhūtaṃ caitat tathā avitathā aviparītam aviparyastaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhārthena,
SA20srabhu_u:739_2: yāvan mārgo mārgārthena tasmāt satyam ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:740_2: kasmāt punar etāny āryāṇām eva satyāni bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:740_3: āryā etāni satyāny eva samānāni satyato jānanti paśyanti yathābhūtam /
SA20srabhu_u:740_4: bālās tu na jānanti, na paśyanti yathābhūtam / tasmād āryasatyānīty ucyante /
SA20srabhu_u:741_1: tatra jātiduḥkham iti jāyamānasya duḥkhā vedanotpadyate kāyikacaitasikī,
SA20srabhu_u:741_2: na tu jātir eva duḥkhaṃ duḥkhanidānam sā evaṃ yāvad icchāvighāto duḥkham iti,
SA20srabhu_u:741_4: na tv icchāvighāta eva duḥkhaṃ duḥkhanidānaṃ punaḥ sa iti peyālam /
SA20srabhu_u:742_0: saṃkṣepataḥ pañcopādānaskandhā duḥkham ity ebhir jātyādibhiḥ paryāyair duḥkhaduḥkhataiva paridīpitā /
SA20srabhu_u:743_0: tatra vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhatā cāvaśiṣṭā sā punaḥ pañcopādānaskandhaduḥkhatayā paridīpitā bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:743_1: tathā hi pañcopādānaskandhās trivedanāparigatās te tathoktāyā duḥkhaduḥkhatāyā bhājanabhūtāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:743_2: yā ca noktā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatā saṃskāraduḥkhatā ca sāpy eṣv eva draṣṭavyā /
SA20srabhu_u:744_0: kena punaḥ kāraṇena bhagavatā duḥkhaduḥkhataiva parikīrtitā svaśabdena,
SA20srabhu_u:744_2: tathā hi duḥkhaduḥkhatāyām āryāṇāṃ bālānāṃ ca tulyā duḥkhatābuddhiḥ pravartate /
SA20srabhu_u:744_3: saṃvejikā atyarthaṃ duḥkhaduḥkhatā pūrvam akṛtaprajñānām evaṃ ca deśyamāne sukham avatāro bhavati satyeṣu vineyānām /
SA20srabhu_u:745_2: tatra trividhāyā duḥkhatāyāḥ kathaṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:745_3: yat tāvad duḥkhaṃ jātir duḥkhaṃ yāvad icchāvighāto duḥkham ity anena sādhiṣṭhānā duḥkhā vedanā ākhyātā sā ca duḥkhaduḥkhatā /
SA20srabhu_u:746_0: ye ye vā punar etad vipakṣā dharmās tathā yauvanaṃ jarāyāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:746_4: ye ca duḥkhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ pravṛttāḥ kleśāḥ sādhiṣṭhānāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:746_5: ye cārogyādiṣu sukhasthānīyeṣu dharmeṣu tannirjātāyāṃ ca vedanāyāṃ ye pravṛttāḥ kleśāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:747_2: kleśāḥ punaḥ sarvatra pravṛttāḥ paryavasthānata eva duḥkhā bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:747_3: vipariṇāmaś ca sa cetasas tasmād vipariṇāmaduḥkhatety ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:747_4: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā, “avadīrṇavipariṇatena cittena mātṛgrāmasya hastagrahaṇaṃ ce”ti vistaraḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:747_5: yathā coktaṃ “kāmacchandaparyavasthitaḥ kāmacchandaparyavasthānapratyayaṃ tajjaṃ caitasikaṃ duḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ pratisaṃvedayate” /
SA20srabhu_u:747_6: evaṃ vyāpādastyānamiddhauddhatyakaukṛtyavicikitsāparyavasthitas tad anenāgamenāptena paramāptena kleśeṣu duḥkhārtho 'pi labhyate vipariṇāmārtho 'pi /
SA20srabhu_u:748_3: yā ca (Śbh II 124) sādhiṣṭhānasukhavedanāsaṃgṛhitā tāṃ sthāpayitvā ye tadanye skandhā aduḥkhāsukhasahagatās tannirjātās tadutpattipratyayās tasya cotpannasya sthitibhājanāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:749_0: ye skandhā anityā udayavyayayuktāḥ sopādānās trivedanābhir anuṣaktā dauṣṭhulyopagatā ayogakṣemapatitā avinirmuktā duḥkhaduḥkhatāyā vipariṇāmaduḥkhatāyā asvavaśavartinaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:750_1: sā punaḥ prārthanā tribhir mukhaiḥ pravṛttā tadyathā punarbhavaprārthanā,
SA20srabhu_u:750_2: viṣayaprārthanā ca / tatra yā punarbhavaprārthanā sā paunarbhavikī tṛṣṇā /
SA20srabhu_u:750_6: tatra yā prāpteṣu viṣayeṣu saumanasyādhyavasānasahagatā nandīrāgasahagatety ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:750_7: yā punar aprāpteṣu viṣayeṣu saṃyogābhilāṣasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinīty ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:753_0: idam ālambanaṃ kleśaviśodhanaṃ lokottareṇa mārgeṇa veditavyam //
SA20srabhu_u:756_1: yad aviparītaṃ dharmam arthaṃ ca deśayati grāhayati bhūtaṃ yad asya niryāti samyagduḥkhakṣayāya duḥkhasyāntakriyāyai /
SA20srabhu_u:757_0: anupūrvāvavādaḥ katamaḥ / yat kālena dharmaṃ deśayati /
SA20srabhu_u:757_2: tataḥ paścād gambhīrāṇi, prathamasya vā satyasyābhisamayāya tatprathamato 'vavadate,
SA20srabhu_u:757_7: tatrāgamāvavādo yathā tena gurūṇām antikād āgamitaṃ bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:757_9: tathāgatasya vā, tathāgataśrāvakasya vā tathaivānenānyūnamadhikaṃ kṛtvā parān avavadate /
SA20srabhu_u:758_0: tatrādhigamāvavādo yathānena te dharmā adhigatā bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:758_1: sparśitāḥ sākṣātkṛtā, ekākinā vyavakṛṣṭavihāriṇā / tathaiva pareṣāṃ prāptaye / sparśanāyai sākṣātkriyāyā avavadate /
SA20srabhu_u:758_5: sa punaḥ katamaḥ / yas tribhiḥ prātihāryair avavadati /
SA20srabhu_u:759_0: ṛddhiprātihāryeṇa, anekavidhaṃ ṛddhiviṣayam upadarśayaty ātmani ca bahumānaṃ janayati pareṣām /
SA20srabhu_u:759_1: yathā tena bahumānajātāḥ śrotrāvadhānena (Śbh II 128) yoge manasikāra ādarajātā bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:759_2: tatra deśanāprātihāryeṇa cittacaritaā samanveṣya anuśāstiprātihāryeṇa yathendriyam,
SA20srabhu_u:759_4: pratipattau samanuśāsti / tenāyaṃ prātihāryatrayasaṃgṛhītaḥ sarvākāraparipūrṇāvavādo bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:760_2: tatra śikṣā katamā / āha / tisraḥ śikṣāḥ / adhiśīlaṃśikṣā, adhicittam adhiprajñaṃśikṣā /
SA20srabhu_u:761_0: tatrādhiśīlaṃśikṣā katamā / yathāpi tac “chīlavān viharatī”ti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20srabhu_u:762_0_0: tatrādhicittaṃśikṣā viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ
SA20srabhu_u:762_0_1: savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ ca prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvac caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya
SA20srabhu_u:762_1: iyam adhicittaṃśikṣā / api khalu sarva ārūpyās tadanyāś ca samādhisamāpattayo 'dhicittaṃśikṣety ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:762_2: api tu dhyānāni niśritya tatprathamataḥ satyābhisamayo nyāmāvakrāntir bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:762_3: na tu sarveṇa sarvaṃ vinā dhyānais tasmāt pradhānāni dhyānāni kṛtvādhicittaṃśikṣety uktāni /
SA20srabhu_u:763_0: tatrādhiprajñaṃśikṣā yac caturṣv āryasatyeṣu yathābhūtaṃ jñānaṃ //
SA20srabhu_u:764_1: kena kāraṇena tisra eva śikṣā na tata ūrdhvam /
SA20srabhu_u:765_1: tathā hi śīlaṃ pratiṣṭhāya cittaikāgratāṃ spṛśati cittasamādhim /
SA20srabhu_u:766_1: tathā hi samāhitacittasyaikāgratāsmṛtyā jñeye vastuni yathābhūtaṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate /
SA20srabhu_u:767_1: tathā hi suviśuddhena jñānadarśanena kleśaprahāṇam sākṣātkaroti /
SA20srabhu_u:767_2: eṣa hi svārtha etat paramaṃ kṛtyaṃ (Śbh II 132) yaduta kleśaprahāṇaṃ tata uttarikaraṇīyaṃ punar nāsti /
SA20srabhu_u:768_4: sukhitasya cittasamādhiḥ samāhitacitto yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti yathābhūtaṃ paśyati /
SA20srabhu_u:768_5: yathābhūtaṃ jānan paśyan nirvidyate nirviṇṇo virajyate /
SA20srabhu_u:768_7: evam imāni śīlāni bhāvitāny agratāyām upanayanti /
SA20srabhu_u:769_1: tatra kena kāraṇenādhiśīlaṃ śikṣā adhiśīlam ity ucyate,
SA20srabhu_u:770_0: tatra katham adhikārārthena / adhicittam adhikṛtya yac chīlaṃ sā adhiśīlaṃ śikṣā /
SA20srabhu_u:770_2: sā adhicittaṃśikṣā / kleśaprahāṇam adhikṛtya yaj jñānaṃ darśanam,
SA20srabhu_u:771_0: katham adhikārthena / yā cādhiśīlaṃśikṣā yā cādhicittaṃ yā cādhiprajñaṃśikṣā etāḥ śikṣā asminn eva śāsane,
SA20srabhu_u:772_1: asti punar adhicittaṃśikṣā yā adhiprajñaṃśikṣāyā āvāhikā,
SA20srabhu_u:772_4: śaikṣo dṛṣṭapadaḥ, tataḥ paścād bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ (Śbh II 134) kleśānāṃ prahāṇāya prayujyamānaḥ smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ bhāvayati yāvad upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgam /
SA20srabhu_u:772_6: adhicittaṃ punaḥ śikṣāṃ adhiprajñāyā āvāhikā pūrvam evoktā /
SA20srabhu_u:773_1: nādhiprajñam / asty adhiśīlam adhicittam, nādhiprajñam / na tv asty adhiprajñaṃśikṣā yā vinādhiśīlenādhicittena ca /
SA20srabhu_u:773_2: ato yatrādhiprajñaṃśikṣā tatra tisraḥ śikṣā veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:773_3: idaṃ tāvac chikṣāvyavasthānaṃ tatra yoginā yogaprayuktena śikṣitavyam /
SA20srabhu_u:773_6: katame trayaḥ / tadyathā / avītarāgo yadbhūyo vītarāgaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:773_7: vītarāgaś ca / tatra sarveṇa sarvam avītarāgaḥ satyāny abhisamāgacchan sahasatyābhisamayāt srota-āpanno bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:773_8: yadbhūyo vītarāgaḥ punaḥ satyāny abhisamāgacchan sahasatyābhisamayāt sakṛdāgāmī bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:773_9: vītarāgaḥ satyāny abhisamāgacchan sahasatyābhisamayād anāgāmī bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:774_1: trīṇīndriyāṇi / anājñātam ājñāsyāmīndriyam ājñendriyam ājñātavata indriyam /
SA20srabhu_u:775_2: trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni / tadyathā śūnyatā apraṇihitam ānimittam /
SA20srabhu_u:776_0: eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vimokṣamukhānāṃ kathaṃ vyavasthānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:776_1: āha / dvayam idaṃ saṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ ca /
SA20srabhu_u:777_1: asaṃskṛtaṃ punar nirvāṇam / idam ubhayaṃ yac ca saṃskṛtam,
SA20srabhu_u:777_3: yat punar idam ucyata ātmā vā,
SA20srabhu_u:778_0: tatra saṃskṛte doṣadarśanād ādīnavadarśanād apraṇidhānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:779_0: nirvāṇe punas tatra praṇidhānavataḥ praṇidhānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:779_2: niḥsaraṇadarśanāc ca punar ānimittaṃ vimokṣamukhaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA20srabhu_u:780_0: tatrāsaty asaṃvidyamāne naiva praṇidhānaṃ nāpraṇidhānaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:780_1: tad yathaivāsat tathaivāsad iti jānataḥ paśyataḥ śūnyatāvimokṣamukhaṃ vyavasthāpyate /
SA20srabhu_u:781_3: āha / daśa śikṣāvilomā dharmāḥ / teṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇa daśa śikṣānulomikā veditavyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:782_1: tadyathā mātṛgrāmaḥ śiśur udāravarṇo rañjanīyaḥ śikṣāprayuktasya kulaputrasyādhimātram antarāyakaraḥ paripanthakaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:782_3: ālasyam, kausīdyam / satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ kavaḍaṃkārāhāram upādāya rasarāgo lokākhyānakathāsv anekavidhāsu bahunānāprakārāsu citrāsu chandarāgānunayaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:783_0_0: sa punaḥ katamaḥ / tadyathā kāṅkṣā vimatir vicikitsā ratneṣu vā satyeṣu vā skandheṣu
SA20srabhu_u:783_0_1: vā karmaphale vā prahāṇaprayuktasya ca kāyadauṣṭhulyaḥ śaithilikasya śamathavipaśyanāpakṣālamanasikāraḥ
SA20srabhu_u:783_3: lābhena vā yaśasā vā praśaṃsayā vā anyatamānyatamena vā sukhalavamātratvena nandīsaumanasyam auddhatyam avyupaśama audbilyam utplāvitatvam /
SA20srabhu_u:783_5: amātrayā bhāṣyaprayogaḥ, atyabhijalpaḥ, dharmyām api kathāṃ kathayatā vigṛhyakathām ārambhānuyogaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:783_6: pūrvadṛṣṭaśrutānubhūteṣu viṣayeṣv anekavidheṣu bahunānāprakāreṣu cittavisāraś cittākṣepaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:784_2: spṛṣṭasya śārīrikābhir vedanābhir duḥkhābhir yāvat prāṇahāriṇībhir jīvitaniyantir jīvitāśā,
SA20srabhu_u:784_3: tadāśānugatasya śocanā, klāmyanā, paridevanā / itīme daśa śikṣāvilomā dharmāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:785_1: katame daśa śikṣāpadānāṃ vilomānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratipakṣeṇa śikṣānulomikā bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:785_2_0: tadyathā / aśubhasaṃjñā / anityasaṃjnā / anitye duḥkhasaṃjñā / duḥkhe 'nātmasaṃjñā /
SA20srabhu_u:785_2_2: nirodhasaṃjñā / maraṇasaṃjñā / itīmā daśa saṃjñā āsevitā bhāvitā bahulīkṛtā daśavidhasya
SA20srabhu_u:785_2_3: śikṣāparipanthakasya daśānāṃ śikṣāvilomānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya saṃvartante /
SA20srabhu_u:786_0: tatra dharmālokaḥ, arthālokaḥ, śamathālokaḥ, vipaśyanālokaś ca / etān ālokān adhipatiṃ kṛtvā ālokasaṃjñā /
SA20srabhu_u:786_1: asminn artha abhipretā dharmacintāyogamanasikārāḥ paripanthasya prahāṇāya /
SA20srabhu_u:787_2: katame daśa / tadyathā pūrvako hetuḥ / ānulomika upadeśaḥ / yoniśaḥ prayogaḥ / sātatyasatkṛtyakāritā / tīvracchandatā / yogabalādhānatā / kāyacittadauṣṭhulyapratiprasrabdhiḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:788_0: tatra pūrvako hetuḥ katamaḥ / yaḥ pūrvam indriyaparipāka indriyasamudāgamaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:789_1: tatrānulomika upadeśo ya upadeśo 'viparītaś cānupūrvikaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:790_0: tatra yoniśaḥ prayogo yathaivāvavāditas tathaiva prayujyate /
SA20srabhu_u:791_0: tatra sātatyasatkṛtyakāritā yadrūpeṇa prayogeṇa avandhyaṃ ca kālaṃ karoti kuśalapakṣeṇa /
SA20srabhu_u:792_0: tatra tīvracchandatā yathāpi tad uttare vimokṣaspṛhām utpādayati /
SA20srabhu_u:792_1: “kadāsvid ahaṃ tad āyatanam upasaṃpadya vihariṣyāmi yad āryā āyatanam upasaṃpadya viharantī”ti /
SA20srabhu_u:793_0: tatra yogabalādhānatā dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ yogabalādhānaprāpto bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:794_0: tatra kāyacittadauṣṭhulyapratiprasrabdhir yathāpi tac chrāntakāyasya klāntakāyasyotpadyate kāyadauṣṭhulyaṃ cittadauṣṭhulyam /
SA20srabhu_u:795_3: prakṛtyaiva cāprahīṇakleśasya kleśapakṣaṃ kāyacittadauṣṭhulyam avigataṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:796_1: tatrābhīkṣṇapratyavekṣā abhīkṣṇaṃ śīlāny ārabhya kukṛtaṃ pratyavekṣate sukṛtaṃ ca /
SA20srabhu_u:796_2: akṛtaṃ ca pratyavekṣate, kṛtaṃ ca / kukṛtāc cākṛtād vyāvartate / sukṛtāc cākṛtān na pratyudāvartate /
SA20srabhu_u:796_5: tathā kleśānāṃ prahīṇāprahīṇānāṃ mīmāṃsāmanaskāram adhipatiṃ kṛtvā abhīkṣṇaṃ pratyavekṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:797_0: tatra prahīṇatāṃ jñātvā [yid bde bar 'gyur la /
SA20srabhu_u:797_1: ma spaṅs bar śes na] punaḥ punas tam eva mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20srabhu_u:798_0: tatrāparitamanā / yat kālāntareṇa jñātavyaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ prāptavyaṃ tad ajānato 'paśyato 'nadhigacchataḥ paritamanā utpadyate,
SA20srabhu_u:798_1: caitasikaḥ klamaḥ, caitasiko vighātaḥ / tām utpannāṃ nādhivāsayati prajahāti /
SA20srabhu_u:799_0: tatra nirabhimānatā / adhigame prāptau sparśanāyāṃ nirabhimāno bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:799_1: aviparītagrāhī, prāpte prāptasaṃjñī, adhigate 'dhigatasaṃjñī sākṣātkṛte sākṣatkṛtasaṃjñī /
SA20srabhu_u:800_0: itīme daśa dharmāḥ śikṣākāmasya yogina ādimadhyaparyavasānam upādāya śikṣām anulomayanti,
SA20srabhu_u:801_2: tatra katamo yogabhraṃśaḥ / āha / catvāro yogabhraṃśāḥ / katame catvāraḥ / asti yogabhraṃśa ātyantikaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:802_2: te hy aparinirvāṇadharmakatvād atyantaparibhraṣṭā eva yogād bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:803_0: tatra tāvatkālikaḥ / tadyathā gotrasthānāṃ parinirvāṇadharmakāṇāṃ pratyayavikalānām,
SA20srabhu_u:803_1: te hi dūram api param api gatvā avaśyam eva pratyayān āsādayiṣyanti /
SA20srabhu_u:803_3: tenaiṣa teṣāṃ tāvatkālika eva yogabhraṃśo bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:804_7: prabhūtarajaskajātīyaḥ paṭuvijñānaś ca bhavati paṭubuddhiḥ sahajayā buddhyā samanvāgataḥ sa śrutam udgṛhṇāti śrutaṃ paryavāpnoty alpaṃ vā,
SA20srabhu_u:804_8: prabhūtaṃ vā / araṇye vā punar viharati, āgatāgatānāṃ ca gṛhipravrajitānām,
SA20srabhu_u:804_9: ṛjukānām, ṛjukajātīyānāṃ (Śbh II 148) dharmadeśanayā cittam ārādhayati kuhanānucaritayā ca ceṣṭayā kāyavākpratisaṃyuktayā /
SA20srabhu_u:804_10: tasya tena hetubhāvena tena pratyayenotpadyate lābhasatkāraślokaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:804_11: sa jñāto bhavati mahāpuṇyo lābhī bhavati cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇām,
SA20srabhu_u:804_12_0: satkṛtaś ca bhavati, gurukṛtaḥ, rājñāṃ rājamātrāṇām, yāvat sārthavāhānām, arhatsaṃmataḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:804_12_1: tasyānvāvartante śrāvakāḥ, gṛhiṇaḥ, pravrajitā api, anvāvṛtteṣu gredhaṃ nigamayaty
SA20srabhu_u:805_0: tasyaivaṃ bhavati / “santi me śrāvakāḥ, gṛhipravrajitā ye, mayi saṃbhāvanā jātā yeṣām arhatsaṃmatas te cen mām upasaṃkramya yoge manasikāre śamathavipaśyanāyāṃ praśnaṃ pṛccheyuḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:805_1: teṣāṃ cāhaṃ pṛṣṭo vyākuryāṃ na jānāmīty evaṃ sati yā saṃbhāvanā sā ca hīyet,
SA20srabhu_u:805_2: na ca syām arhatsaṃmataḥ, yan nv ahaṃ svayam eva cintayitvā tulayitvopaparīkṣya yogaṃ vyavasthāpayeyam” /
SA20srabhu_u:805_3: sa etam evārtham adhipatiṃ kṛtvā lābhasatkārābhigṛddha ekākī rahogataḥ svayam eva cintayitvā tulayitvopaparīkṣya yogaṃ vyavasthāpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:806_0: sa cāsya yogo na sūtre 'vatarati na vinaye saṃdṛśyate /
SA20srabhu_u:806_1: dharmatāṃ ca vilomayati / sa ye te bhikṣavaḥ sūtradharā,
SA20srabhu_u:806_2: vinayadharā, mātṛkādharās teṣaṃ tad yogasthānaṃ vinigūhati na prakāśayati /
SA20srabhu_u:806_3: ye 'py asya śravakā (Śbh II 150) bhavanti gṛhiṇaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:806_4: pravrajitāś ca, tān api yogapratiguptaya ājñāpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:807_0: tat kasya hetoḥ / “mā haiva te sūtradharā, vinayadharā, mātṛkādharā, etad yogasthānaṃ śrutvā sūtre 'vatārayeyuḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:807_1: tac ca nāvataret / vinaye saṃdarśayeyuḥ, tac ca na saṃdṛśyet / dharmatayā upaparīkṣeyuḥ, tac ca dharmatāṃ virodhayet /
SA20srabhu_u:807_2: te ca tato nidānam apratītā bhaveyur apratītavacanaiś ca māṃ codayeyuḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:808_0: “evam ahaṃ punar api na satkṛtaḥ syāṃ na gurukṛtaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:808_1: rājñāṃ rājāmātrāṇāṃ yāvad dhanināṃ śreṣṭhināṃ sārthavāhānām,
SA20srabhu_u:808_2: na ca punar lābhī syāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇām” iti /
SA20srabhu_u:809_0: sa tām eva lābhasatkārakāmatām adhipatiṃ kṛtvā adharme dharmasaṃjñī,
SA20srabhu_u:809_1: vinidhāya saṃjñāṃ rucim adharmaṃ dharmato dīpayati saṃprakāśayati /
SA20srabhu_u:810_0_0: tatra ye 'sya dṛṣṭyanumatam āpadyante te 'py adharme dharmasaṃjñino bhavanti mandatvān
SA20srabhu_u:810_0_1: momuhatvāt te 'dharme dharmasaṃjñino yathānuśiṣṭā api pratipadyamānā mithyāpratipannā
SA20srabhu_u:810_1: ayam evaṃrūpo mithyāpratipattikṛto yogabhraṃśaḥ saddharmapratirūpako hy asaddharmaḥ saddharmasyāntardhānāya /
SA20srabhu_u:811_0: itīme catvāro yogabhraṃśā dhyāyinā bhikṣuṇā yogācāreṇa parijñeyā varjayitavyāḥ //
SA20srabhu_u:812_1: tatra yogaḥ katamaḥ / āha / caturvidho yogaḥ / tadyathā śraddhā chando vīryam upāyaś ca //
SA20srabhu_u:814_0: chando 'pi caturvidhaḥ / tadyathā prāptaye yathāpīhaikatya uttare vimokṣaspṛhām utpādayati,
SA20srabhu_u:814_1: vistareṇa pūrvavat / paripṛcchāyai yathāpīhaikatyaḥ spṛhām utpādayaty ārāmaṃ gamanāya,
SA20srabhu_u:814_2: vijñānāṃ sabrahmacāriṇāṃ yogajñānām antikam aśrutasya śravaṇāya,
SA20srabhu_u:814_3: śrutasya ca paryavadānāya / saṃbhārasamudāgamāya cchando yathāpīhaikatyaḥ śīlasaṃvarapāriśuddhaye,
SA20srabhu_u:814_4: indriyasaṃvarapāriśuddhaye, bhojane mātrajñatāyām, jāgarikānuyoge, saṃprajānadvihāritāyām uttarottarāṃ spṛhām utpādayati /
SA20srabhu_u:814_5: anuyogāya cchando yathāpīhaikatyaḥ sātatyaprayogatāyāṃ satkṛtyaprayogatāyāṃ ca mārgabhāvanāyāṃ spṛhām utpādayaty abhilāṣaṃ kartukāmatām /
SA20srabhu_u:814_7: yaduta prāptaye paripṛcchanāyai saṃbhārasamudāgamāya anuyogāya ca /
SA20srabhu_u:815_2: tatra vīryam api caturvidhaṃ tadyathā śravaṇāya, cintanāyai, bhāvanāyai, āvaraṇapāriśuddhaye ca /
SA20srabhu_u:816_0: tatra śravaṇāya vīryaṃ / yad aśrutaṃ ca śṛṇvataḥ, paryavadāpayataḥ, cetaso 'bhyutsāhaḥ, avinyastaprayogatā / evaṃ yathāśrutānāṃ dharmāṇām ekākino rahogatasyārtham,
SA20srabhu_u:816_2: evaṃ pratisaṃlayanapraviṣṭasya kālena kālaṃ śamathavipaśyanāṃ bhāvayataḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:816_3: evam ahorātrānuyuktasya caṃkramaniṣadyābhyāṃ nivaraṇebhyaś cittaṃ viśodhayataḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:817_1: tatropāyo 'pi caturvidhaḥ / tadyathā śīlasaṃvaram indriyasaṃvaram adhipatiṃ kṛtvā sūpasthitasmṛtitā tathā copasthitasmṛter apramādaś cetasa ārakṣā /
SA20srabhu_u:818_0: sa cāyaṃ yogaś caturvidhaḥ / ṣoḍaśākāro bhavati //
SA20srabhu_u:819_2: prāptim (Śbh II 156) abhisaṃpratyayāt kartukāmatām utpādayati kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu /

SA20srabhu_u:867_0: yat punar āha “purato vā gacchantaṃ pṛṣṭhato gacchan pratyavekṣata” ity anena pratyutpannena manaskāreṇānantaraniruddhasya manaskārasya pratyavekṣā paridīpitā /

SA20srabhu_u:869_0: tatra śamathaṃ ca vipaśyanāṃ ca bhāvayaṃs tadubhayapakṣyām ālokasaṃjñāṃ bhāvayati /

SA20srabhu_u:878_1: tatra katamaḥ kāyaḥ / katamā kāye kāyānupaśyanā / katamā smṛtiḥ / katamāni smṛter upasthānāni /

SA20srabhu_u:885_0: tatrālambanopanibandhāya / yathoktaṃ caturvidha ālambane smṛtim upanibadhnataḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:885_1: tadyathā vyāpiny ālambane caritaviśodhane kauśalyālambane kleśaviśodhane vā /

SA20srabhu_u:887_1: tatra vedanā katamā / tadyathā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca vedanā /
SA20srabhu_u:887_3: yathā kāyikī, evaṃ caitasikī / sukhāpi sāmiṣā duḥkhāpy aduḥkhāsukhāpi /
SA20srabhu_u:887_4: evaṃ nirāmiṣāpi, evaṃ gardhāśritā, naiṣkramyāśritā vedanā sukhāpi duḥkhāpy aduḥkhāsukhāpi /
SA20srabhu_u:888_0: saiṣā ekaviṃśatividhā vedanā bhavati, navavidhā vā //
SA20srabhu_u:889_1_0: tatra cittaṃ katamat / tadyathā sarāgaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ sadveṣaṃ vigatadveṣaṃ
SA20srabhu_u:889_1_1: samohaṃ vigatamohaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ līnaṃ pragṛhītam uddhatam anuddhataṃ vyupaśāntam
SA20srabhu_u:889_1_2: avyupaśāntaṃ samāhitam asamāhitaṃ subhāvitam asubhāvitaṃ suvimuktaṃ cittam asuvimuktaṃ

SA20srabhu_u:891_2: sā punar yā pañcavijñānasaṃprayuktā sā kāyikī,

SA20srabhu_u:892_2: sā punar yā pañcavijñānakāyasaṃprayuktā sā kāyikī,

SA20srabhu_u:894_2: tatra sarāgaṃ cittaṃ yad rañjanīye vastuni rāgaparyavasthitam /
SA20srabhu_u:894_6: tatra saṃmohaṃ yan mohanīye vastuni mohaparyauasthitam /
SA20srabhu_u:895_0: tāny etāni ṣaṭ cittāni cārasahagatāni veditavyāni /
SA20srabhu_u:895_3: vikṣiptaṃ yad bahirdhā pañcasu kāmaguṇeṣv anuvisṛtam /

SA20srabhu_u:897_0: tatra vyupaśāntaṃ cittaṃ yan nivaraṇebhyo vimuktam / avyupaśāntaṃ punar yad avimuktam /
SA20srabhu_u:898_0: tatra samāhitaṃ cittaṃ yan nivaraṇavimokṣān mauladhyānapraviṣṭam / asamāhitaṃ yad apraviṣṭam /
SA20srabhu_u:899_0: tatra subhāvitaṃ cittaṃ yat tasyaiva samādher dīrghakālaparicayān nikāmalābhī bhavaty akṛcchralābhy āśusaṃpattā /
SA20srabhu_u:899_1: tatra na subhāvitam cittam etadviparyayeṇa veditavyam /

SA20srabhu_u:900_2: na suvimuktaṃ cittaṃ yan na sarvato nāpy atyantato vimuktam /
SA20srabhu_u:901_1: tatra nivaraṇaviśuddhibhūmim ārabhya vihāragatāny aṣṭau cittāni /
SA20srabhu_u:901_2: saṃkṣiptaṃ vitkṣiptaṃ yāvad vyupaśāntam avyupaśāntam iti /
SA20srabhu_u:901_3: kleśaviśuddhiṃ punar ārabhya vihāragatāni ṣaṭ cittāni /
SA20srabhu_u:901_4: yāvat suvimuktaṃ cittaṃ na suvimuktam iti /
SA20srabhu_u:902_0: yat punaḥ saty adhyātmaṃ nivaraṇe “asti me nivaraṇam” iti jānāti,
SA20srabhu_u:902_1: asati nivaraṇe “nāsti me nivaraṇam” iti janāti /
SA20srabhu_u:902_2: yathā cānutpannasya nivaraṇasyotpādo bhavati tad api prajānāti,
SA20srabhu_u:902_3: yathā cotpannasya vigamo bhavati tad api prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:903_0: tatra sati cakṣuḥsaṃyojane yāvan manaḥsaṃyojane “asti me yāvan manaḥsamyojanam” iti,
SA20srabhu_u:903_1: asati yāvan manaḥsaṃyojane “nāsti me yāvan manaḥsaṃyojanam” iti prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:903_2: yathā cānutpannasya yāvan manaḥsaṃyojanasyotpādo bhavati tad api prajānāti,
SA20srabhu_u:903_3: yathā cotpannasya nirodho bhavati tad api prajānāti /

SA20srabhu_u:904_1: asati “nāsti me” prajānāti / yathā cānutpannasya smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgasyotpādo bhavati tad api prajānāti,
SA20srabhu_u:904_2: yathā cotpannasya sthitir bhavaty asaṃmoṣo bhāvanāparipūribhūyobhāvavṛddhivipulatā tad api prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:906_1: yad evaṃ svabhāvanidānādīnavapratipakṣākāraiḥ saṃkliṣṭadharmaparijñānam idaṃ śarīraṃ dharmasmṛtyupasthānasya /
SA20srabhu_u:907_1: yathā kāye kāyānupaśyanā smṛtyupasthānam uktam evaṃ vedanāyāṃ citte dharmeṣu yathāyogaṃ veditavyam /
SA20srabhu_u:908_0: tatra katham adhyātmaṃ kāye kāyānudarśī viharati, kathaṃ bahirdhā, katham adhyātmabahirdhā /
SA20srabhu_u:909_0: yadā adhyātmaṃ pratyātmaṃ sattvasaṃkhyāte kāye kāyānupaśyī viharati,
SA20srabhu_u:910_0: yadā bahirdhā asattvasaṃkhyātaṃ rūpam ālambanīkaroti, evaṃ bahirdhā kāye kāyānudarśī viharati /

SA20srabhu_u:922_1: tatra caturṇāṃ viparyāsānāṃ pratipakṣeṇa bhagavatā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni vyavasthāpitāni /
SA20srabhu_u:923_1: tathā hi bhagavatā kāyasmṛtyupasthānabhāvanāyām aśubhāpratisamyuktāś catasraḥ śivapathikā deśitāḥ,

SA20srabhu_u:925_1_1: anekavidhānāṃ bahunānāprakāratāṃ (Śbh II 196) cittasyopalabhya yo 'nitye nityam iti
SA20srabhu_u:926_1: tasya yeṣām ātmadṛṣṭyādikānāṃ saṃkleśānāṃ sadbhāvād yeṣām anātmadṛṣṭyādikānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām asadbhāvāt skandheṣv ātmadarśanaṃ bhavati,
