SA20srabhu_u:927_7: yatraiva ca te citte manasi vijñāna ātmagrāheṇa saṃmūḍhā ātmavastusaṃmohāpanayanārthena cittasmṛtyupasthānaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
SA20srabhu_u:927_11: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ / yatra ca karma karoti, yadarthaṃ ca karoti, yaś ca karma karoti, yena ca karoti, tat sarvam ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni vyavasthāpitāni,
SA20srabhu_u:927_12: tatra kāye karoti vedanārthaṃ cittaṃ kuśalākuśalair dharmaiḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:928_1: aparaḥ paryāyaḥ / yatra ca saṃkliśyate viśudhyate yataś ca yaś ca yena kliśyate viśudhyate,
SA20srabhu_u:928_2: tad ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni vyavasthāpitāni,
SA20srabhu_u:928_3: tatra kāye saṃkliśyate viśudhyate ca vedanābhyaś cittaṃ dharmaiḥ saṃkliśyate viśudhyate ca /
SA20srabhu_u:929_2: āha / yatra ca smṛtim upasthāpayati yena ca smṛtim upasthāpayati tad ucyate smṛtyupasthānam /
SA20srabhu_u:929_4: yena smṛtim upasthāpayati tatra yā prajñā smṛtiś ca samādhisaṃgrāhikā tat svabhāvasmṛtyupasthānam /
SA20srabhu_u:930_0: api ca kāyavedanācittadharmādhipateyo yo mārgaḥ samutpannaḥ kuśalaḥ sāsravo 'nāsravaś ca tat smṛtyupasthānam /
SA20srabhu_u:930_1: sa punaḥ śrutamayaś cintāmayo bhāvanāmayaś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:931_2: sa evaṃ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu kṛtaparicaya audārikaudārikaṃ viparyāsam apanīya kuśalākuśaladharmābhijñaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:931_4: utpannānāṃ prahāṇāya, anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya,
SA20srabhu_u:931_5: utpannānām sthitaya” iti vistareṇa pūrvavad yāvac cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti pradadhāti /
SA20srabhu_u:932_2: yat kāmāvacaraṃ kliṣṭaṃ kāyakarma vākkarma manaskarma kāyavāṅmanoduścaritasaṃgṛhītam,
SA20srabhu_u:932_3: ye ca tatsamutthāpakāḥ kleśās te punar ye 'samavahitā asaṃmukhībhūtās te 'nutpannāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:933_0: tatra kuśalā dharmā ye tatprātipakṣikā dharmā duścaritaprātipakṣikā nivaraṇaprātipakṣikāḥ saṃyojanaprātipakṣikā vā /
SA20srabhu_u:933_1: te 'py anutpannās tathaiva veditavyā utpannāś ca yathā pāpakā akuśalā dharmāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:934_1: tatra yadānutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya spṛhām utpādayati praṇidhatte “sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā notpādayiṣyāmī”ti,
SA20srabhu_u:934_2: evaṃ chandaṃ janayati / utpannān vā punaḥ samavahitān “sarveṇa sarvaṃ nādhivāsayiṣyāmi prahāsyāmi prativinodayiṣyāmi” /
SA20srabhu_u:935_0: yad anutpanneṣu pāpakeṣv akuśaleṣu dharmeṣu pūrvam evānutpādāya spṛhām utpādayati praṇidhatte nādhivāsayitukāmo bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:936_1: te punaḥ pāpakā akuśalā dharmā atītavastvālambanā vā anāgatavastvālambanā vā vartamānaviṣayālambanā votpadyante,
SA20srabhu_u:937_1: tatra parokṣaviṣayālambanānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpannānām anutpādāya,
SA20srabhu_u:937_3: pratyakṣaviṣayālambanānāṃ punar anutpannānām anutpādāyotpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya vīryam ārabhate /
SA20srabhu_u:938_0: tathā hi teṣāṃ dṛḍhatareṇa vīryārambheṇānutpattiḥ prahāṇaṃ vā bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:938_1: api ca mṛdumadhyānāṃ paryavasthānānām anutpannānām anutpādāya,
SA20srabhu_u:939_0: saced atīta ālambane carati, tathā carati yathāsya tenālambanena kleśo notpadyate /
SA20srabhu_u:939_1: sacet punaḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣād utpadyate nādhivāsayati prajahāti vinodayati vyantīkaroti /
SA20srabhu_u:939_3: (Śbh II 204) evam ayam anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāyotpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya “vyāyacchata” ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:940_1: tathā tathā carati yathā tenālambanena kleśo notpadyate /
SA20srabhu_u:940_2: sacet punaḥ smṛtisaṃpramoṣād utpadyata utpannaṃ nādhivāsayati prajahāti vinodayati vyantīkaroti /
SA20srabhu_u:940_3: evam anutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāyotpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya “vīryam ārabhata” ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:941_1: santi pāpakā akuśalā dharmā ye saṃkalpavaśenotpadyante na viṣayabalena,
SA20srabhu_u:941_2: santi ye saṃkalpabalena ca viṣayabalena ca /
SA20srabhu_u:944_1: tatra ye saṃkalpabalenotpadyante teṣām anutpannānām anutpādāya,
SA20srabhu_u:944_3: tatra ye viṣayabalena saṃkalpabalena cotpadyante teṣām anutpannānām anutpādāya,
SA20srabhu_u:945_2: tatr”ānutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya cchandaṃ janayatī”ti /
SA20srabhu_u:945_3: ye kuśalā dharmā apratilabdhā asaṃmukhībhūtāś ca teṣāṃ pratilambhāya saṃmukhībhāvāya ca spṛhām utpādayati cittaṃ praṇidhatte,
SA20srabhu_u:945_4: tīvrā pratilabdhukāmatā saṃmukhīkartukāmatā cāsya pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:946_0: “utpannānāṃ ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām sthitaye 'saṃmoṣāya bhāvanāparipūraye chandaṃ janayatī”ti,
SA20srabhu_u:946_1: “utpannāḥ kuśalā dharmā” ye pratilabdhāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāś ca /
SA20srabhu_u:946_4: teṣām eva ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratilabdhānāṃ saṃmukhībhūtānām āsevanānvayāt pariniṣpattiṃ niṣṭhāgamanam adhikṛtyāha “bhāvanāparipūraya” iti /
SA20srabhu_u:946_5: tatra ca spṛhām utpādayati cittaṃ praṇidhatte tīvrā cāsya sthitikāmatā asaṃmoṣakāmatā bhāvanāparipūrikāmatā pratyupasthitā bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:946_6: ayam ucyata “utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye 'saṃmoṣāya bhāvanāparipūraye chandaḥ” /
SA20srabhu_u:949_0: api ca mṛdumadhyānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpannānām utpādāya,
SA20srabhu_u:949_3: utpannānāṃ ca yāvad bhāvanāparipūraye vīryam ārabhate /
SA20srabhu_u:950_0: tatra “cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti” / yadā tac cittaṃ śamathabhāvanāyām ekāgratāyāṃ prayuktaṃ bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:950_2: (Śbh II 208) evaṃ vistareṇa yāvad utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye 'saṃmoṣāya bhāvanāparipūraye tac ca tathādhyātmam abhisaṃkṣiptaṃ līnatvāya paraiti,
SA20srabhu_u:950_4: tadānyatamānyatamena pragrāhakeṇa nimittena prasadanīyena pratigṛhṇāti saṃharṣayati /
SA20srabhu_u:951_0: kathaṃ “pradadhāti” / punar uddhatam auddhatyābhiśaṅki vā pragrahakāle paśyati,
SA20srabhu_u:951_1: tadā punar apy adhyātmam abhisaṃkṣipati śamathāya praṇidadhāti /
SA20srabhu_u:952_3: utpannānāṃ ca prahāṇāya cchando vyāyāmo vīryārambhaś cittapragrahaḥ pradadhanam ime dve samyakprahāṇe /
SA20srabhu_u:953_0: tatraikaṃ saṃvaraṇaprahāṇam, yad “utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya cchandaṃ janayatī”ti vistareṇa /
SA20srabhu_u:954_0: dvitīyaṃ prahāṇaprahāṇam, yad “anutpannānām anutpādāya cchandaṃ janayatī”ti vistareṇa /
SA20srabhu_u:954_2: anutpannaṃ ca yat tad asamudācārataḥ prahīṇam eva tad asaṃmukhībhāvataḥ prahātavyaṃ iti kṛtvā,
SA20srabhu_u:955_0: tatra bhāvanāprahāṇam ekam / yad āha / “anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāye”ti vistareṇa yāvac “cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti pradadhātī”ti /
SA20srabhu_u:956_1: tathā hi kuśalā dharmā āsevyamānā bhāvyamānā,
SA20srabhu_u:956_4: tatrānurakṣaṇāprahāṇam ekam / yad āha / “utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye” vistareṇa yāvac “cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti,
SA20srabhu_u:956_5: pradadhāti” / tathā hi pratilabdheṣu saṃmukhīkṛteṣu ca kuśaleṣu dharmeṣu yā pramādavarjanā apramādaniṣevaṇā ca sā kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye,
SA20srabhu_u:956_7: evam utpannāḥ kuśalā dharmā anurakṣitā bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:957_1: samāsārthaḥ punaḥ katamaḥ / āha / kṛṣṇaśuklapakṣikasya tyāgādānavastuno 'dhyāśayasaṃpat prayogasaṃpac ca paridīpitā bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:957_4: etāvac ca yoginā karaṇīyam / yat prahātavyasya vastunaḥ prahāṇāya prāptavyasya ca vastunaḥ prāptaye pūrvam eva spṛhājātena bhavitavyam,
SA20srabhu_u:957_7: paryavasthānaprahāṇānuśayaprahāṇāya ca ye pratipakṣikā dharmāḥ kuśalās te samudānayitavyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:957_8: tac caitat sarvaṃ caturbhiḥ samyakprahāṇaiḥ paridīpitaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:959_0: tatra cchandam adhipatiṃ kṛtvā yaḥ pratilabhyate samādhir ayaṃ chandasamādhiḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:959_1: vīryam, cittam, mīmāṃsām adhipatiṃ kṛtvā yaḥ pratilabhyate samādhir ayaṃ mīmāṃsāsamādhiḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:960_1: yadā tāvad ayaṃ chandam eva kevalaṃ janayati /
SA20srabhu_u:960_2: chandajātaś ca tān pāpakān akuśalān dharmān svabhāvato nidānata ādīnavataḥ pratipakṣataś ca samyag evopanidadhyāti,
SA20srabhu_u:960_4: evaṃ kuśalān dharmān svabhāvato nidānato 'nuśaṃsato niḥsaraṇataḥ samyag evopanidadhyāti,
SA20srabhu_u:960_7: na tv adyāpy anuśayaṃ (Śbh II 214) samudghātayati pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām /
SA20srabhu_u:961_1: sa atīte vānāgatapratyutpanne vā punar ālambane pāpakākuśaladharmasthānīye mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśaparyavasthānīye,
SA20srabhu_u:961_2: anutpannasya vānutpādāya, utpannasya vā prahāṇāya, vyāyacchamāno vīryam ārabhamāṇaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:961_3: tatrālambane vicarataḥ, tasya vālambanasya svabhāvato nidānata ādīnavataḥ pratipakṣataś ca samyag upanidhyāyataḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:961_6: na tv adyāpy anuśayaṃ samudghātayati pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām /
SA20srabhu_u:962_3: kālena ca kālam adhyupekṣito yat pāpakākuśalān dharmān pāpakākuśaladharmasthānīyānvayān,
SA20srabhu_u:962_4: kuśalākuśalān dharmān kuśalākuśalasthānīyāṃś ca dharmān svabhāvato nidānata ādīnavato 'nuśaṃsataḥ pratipakṣato niḥsaraṇataḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:962_7: vistareṇa yāvat / ayam ucyate cittādhipateyaḥ samādhiḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:963_1: tatra ye pāpakākuśaladharmasthānīyā dharmā bhavanty ayoniśomanasikurvataḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:963_5: te pāpakā akuśalā dharmā na samudācaranti /
SA20srabhu_u:964_0: tasyaivaṃ bhavati / “kiṃ sataḥ saṃvidyamānān pāpakān akuśalān dharmān na pratisaṃvedayāmy āhosvid asato 'saṃvidyamānān yan nv ahaṃ parimīmāṃseyam” /
SA20srabhu_u:964_1: sa mīmāṃsāmanaskāram adhipatiṃ kṛtvā prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ mīmāṃsate,
SA20srabhu_u:964_4: yena nirabhimāno bhavati / “paryavasthānamātrakān me cittaṃ vimuktaṃ na tu sarveṇa sarvam anuśayebhyaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:964_5: tatpratipakṣāś ca me samādhipramukhāḥ kuśalā dharmāḥ pratilabdhā,
SA20srabhu_u:964_6: bhāvitā, na tv anuśayaprātipakṣikā” iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:965_2: sa taṃ caturvidhaṃ samādhim adhipatiṃ kṛtvā paryavasthāneṣu dūrīkṛteṣu,
SA20srabhu_u:965_3_0: sarveṇa sarvam anuśayasamudghātāya pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ tatprātipakṣikāṇāñ
SA20srabhu_u:965_3_1: ca kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ samudāgamāya punar api chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchata iti vistareṇa
SA20srabhu_u:967_1: anuśayāṃś ca prahāsyāmi pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām” /
SA20srabhu_u:969_0: śraddhā yā avinyastaprayogasya viharata uttare 'dhigame śraddadhānatā, abhisaṃpratyayaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:970_0: tatra praśrabdhir yac chraddhāprasādapūrvaṃgamaṃ prāmodyaṃ prītiḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:970_2: tatra smṛtir yā navākārā, navākārāyāś cittasthiteḥ śamathapakṣyāyāḥ saṃgrāhikā /
SA20srabhu_u:972_1: tatra cetanā yaś cittābhisaṃskāraḥ prahīṇāprahīṇatāṃ mīmāṃsamānasya yaś cittābhisaṃskāraḥ śamathavipaśyanānukūlaḥ kāyakarma vākkarma samutthāpayati /
SA20srabhu_u:973_0: tatropekṣā yātitānāgatapratyutpanneṣu pāpakākuśaladharmasthānīyeṣu carataś cittāsaṃkleśā cittasamatā /
SA20srabhu_u:973_1: ābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kāraṇābhyāṃ prahīṇatām anuśayānāṃ paricchinatti jānāti /
SA20srabhu_u:975_2: tatra chandaś chanda eva, yo vyāyāma idaṃ vīryam, yā śraddhā sā śraddhā, yā ca praśrabdhir yā ca smṛtir yac ca saṃprajanyaṃ yā ca cetanā yā copekṣā ayam upāyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:975_3: tad idaṃ sarvam abhisamasya, ye ca pūrvakāś chandasamādhayaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:975_4: ye ceme prahāṇasaṃskārāḥ prahīṇeṣv anuśayeṣu pariniṣpanne samādhau,
SA20srabhu_u:976_3: āha / tadyathā yasya pādaḥ saṃvidyate so 'bhikramapratikramaparākramasamartho bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:976_6: sa evaṃ pariśuddhe citte, paryavadāte, anaṅgaṇe, vigatopakleśe, ṛjubhūte, karmaṇyasthite, āniñjyaprāpte, abhikramapratikramaparākramasamartho bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:976_8: eṣā hi parā ṛddhiḥ parā samṛddhiḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:977_1: sa evaṃ samādhipratiṣṭhitaḥ samādhiṃ niśrityādhicittaṃśikṣāyām adhiprajñaṃśikṣāyāṃ yogaṃ karoti /
SA20srabhu_u:977_2: tatrāsya yogaṃ kurvataḥ pareṣāṃ cādhigame śāstuḥ śrāvakāṇāṃ ca yo 'bhisaṃpratyayaḥ prasādaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:978_0: kutra punar asyādhipatyam / āha / lokottaradharmotpattipramukhānāṃ vīryasmṛtisamādhiprajñānām utpattaya ādhipatyam /
SA20srabhu_u:978_1: ye 'pi te vīryādayas teṣām api lokottaradharmotpattaya ādhipatyam /
SA20srabhu_u:979_2: yā punaḥ pūrveṇāparaṃ viśeṣādhigamaṃ saṃjānatas tadanusāreṇa taduttaralokottaradharmādhigamāyābhisaṃpratyayaḥ prasādaḥ śraddadhānatā /
SA20srabhu_u:979_6: māreṇa vā, brahmaṇā vā, kenacid vā punar loke sahadharmeṇa,
SA20srabhu_u:979_7: kleśaparyavasthānena vā / tena sānavamṛdyety ucyate / tatpramukhās tatpūrvaṃgamā ye vīryādayas te 'pi balānīty ucyante /
SA20srabhu_u:979_8: taiḥ sa balair balavān sarvaṃ mārabalaṃ vijitya prayujyata āsravāṇāṃ kṣayāya /
SA20srabhu_u:980_1: tatra yac ca śraddhendriyaṃ yac ca śraddhābalaṃ caturṣv etad avetyaprasādeṣu draṣṭavyam /
SA20srabhu_u:980_2: tat kasya hetoḥ / yo 'sau samyaktvanyāmāvakrāntasyāvetyaprasādaḥ sa taddhetukas tatpratyayas tannidānaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:980_3: tasmād dhetuphalasaṃbandhena tasyās tad adhipatiphalam iti kṛtvā tatra draṣṭavyam ity uktaṃ bhagavatā,
SA20srabhu_u:981_1: tat kasya hetoḥ / yāni katamāni samyakprahāṇāni /
SA20srabhu_u:981_4: tāni hy atyantatāyai pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya saṃvartante /
SA20srabhu_u:983_1: tatra samādhīndriyaṃ caturṣu dhyāneṣu draṣṭavyam / yāni dhyānāny anāgāmitāyāṃ prāyogikāṇi /
SA20srabhu_u:984_1: iti yat satyajñānaṃ caturṇām āryasatyānām abhisamayāya saṃvartate śrāmaṇyaphalaprāptaye /
SA20srabhu_u:985_1: sa eṣām indriyāṇām eteṣāṃ ca balānām āsevanānvayād bhāvanānvayād bahulīkārānvayān nirvedhabhāgīyāni kuśalamūlāny utpādayati mṛdumadhyādhimātrāṇi /
SA20srabhu_u:986_0: tadyathā kaścid eva puruṣo 'gnināgnikāryaṃ kartukāmo 'gninārthy adharāraṇyām uttarāraṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpyābhimathnann utsahate ghaṭate vyāyacchate /
SA20srabhu_u:986_1: tasyotsahato ghaṭato vyāyacchataś ca tatprathamato 'dharāraṇyām ūṣmā jāyate /
SA20srabhu_u:987_4: yathābhimanthanavyāyāma evaṃ pañcānām indriyāṇām āsevanā draṣṭavyā /
SA20srabhu_u:987_7: pūrvaṃgamāni nimittabhūtāny agnisthānīyānām anāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kleśaparidāhakānām utpattaye /
SA20srabhu_u:987_8: yathā tasyaivoṣmaṇa ūrdhvam āgamanam evaṃ mūrdhāno draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:987_9: yathā dhūmaprādurbhāva evaṃ satyānulomāḥ kṣāntayo draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:987_10: yathāgneḥ patanaṃ nirarciṣa evaṃ laukikāgradharmā draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:987_11: yathā tadanantaram arciṣa utpāda evaṃ lokottarānāsravā dharmā draṣṭavyāḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:987_12: ye laukikāgradharmasaṃgṛhītānāṃ pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ samanantaram utpadyante /
SA20srabhu_u:988_1: te punaḥ katame / āha / saptabodhyaṅgāni / yo 'sau yathābhūtāvabodhaḥ samyaktvanyāmāvakrāntasya pudgalasya tasyaitāny aṅgāni /
SA20srabhu_u:988_3: tribhiḥ śamathapakṣyaiḥ, tribhir vipaśyanāpakṣyaiḥ, ekenobhayapakṣyeṇa / tasmād bodhyaṅgānīty ucyante /
SA20srabhu_u:989_0: tatra yaś ca dharmavicayaḥ, yac ca vīryam, yā ca prītir itīmāni trīṇi vipaśyanāpakṣyāṇi /
SA20srabhu_u:989_1: tatra yā ca prasrabdhiḥ, yaś ca samādhiḥ, yā copekṣā (Śbh II 230) itīmāni trīṇi śamathapakṣyāṇi /
SA20srabhu_u:989_3: sa tasmin samaye tatprathamato bodhyaṅgalābhāc chaikṣo bhavati dṛṣṭapadaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:990_3: sa teṣāṃ prahāṇāya triskandham āryāṣṭāṅgaṃ mārgaṃ bhāvayati /
SA20srabhu_u:991_0: tatra yā ca samyagdṛṣṭir, yaś ca samyaksaṃkalpaḥ, yaś ca samyagvyāyāmaḥ, ayaṃ prajñāskandhaḥ / tatra ye samyakvākkarmāntājīvāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:992_1: āha / āryasya śaikṣasya dṛṣṭapadasyāyaṃ mārga iyaṃ pratipad aṣṭābhir aṅgaiḥ saṃgṛhītaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:993_1: tatra yaś ca bodhyaṅgakāle tattvāvabodhaḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:993_2: pratilabhya ca yat tasyaiva prajñayā vyavasthānaṃ karoti yathādhigatasyāvabodhasya,
SA20srabhu_u:993_3: tad ubhayam ekadhyam abhisaṃkṣipya samyagdṛṣṭir ity ucyate /
SA20srabhu_u:994_0: tāṃ samyagdṛṣṭim adhipatiṃ kṛtvā yan naiṣkramyasaṃkalpaṃ saṃkalpayaty avyāpādasaṃkalpam avihiṃsāsaṃkalpam /
SA20srabhu_u:995_3: samyagdṛṣṭim adhipatiṃ kṛtvā tenaiva kuśalāt saṃkalpād dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayati /
SA20srabhu_u:996_1: tatparyeṣaṇāṃ vāpadyate / so 'bhikramapratikrame saṃprajānadvihārī bhavaty ālokitavyavalokite,
SA20srabhu_u:996_3: vihāragato vā punaḥ paryeṣiteṣu cīvarādiṣu gate sthite niṣaṇṇe yāvan nidrāklamaprativinodane saṃprajānadvihārī bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:997_0: sa tac cīvaraṃ yāvad bhaiṣajyapariṣkāraṃ dharmeṇa paryeṣate /
SA20srabhu_u:998_1: te 'nena pūrvam eva manaskāralābhād bodhyaṅgair eva saha labdhā bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:999_1_0: kena kāraṇena / dīrghakālaṃ hy etad āryāṇāṃ satāṃ samyaggatānām iṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ
SA20srabhu_u:999_1_1: mana-āpaṃ “kaccid ahaṃ tad vāgduścaritasya kāyaduścaritasya mithyājīvasyākaraṇaṃ
SA20srabhu_u:999_2: yad asya dīrgharātram iṣṭaṃ kāntaṃ priyaṃ mana-āpaṃ tad anena tasmin samaye pratilabdhaṃ bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:999_4: tathā hi sa labdheṣv āryakānteṣu śīleṣu,
SA20srabhu_u:999_7: nādattam ādatte, (Śbh II 234) na kāmeṣu mithyā carati,
SA20srabhu_u:999_9: iti tāny āryakāntāni śīlāny adhipatiṃ kṛtvā mārgabhāvanākāle yā vāk pravartate yac ca kāyakarma yaś cājīvaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:1000_0: tasya samyagdṛṣṭisamyaksaṃkalpavākkarmāntājīvasanniśrayeṇa bhāvanāprayuktasya yac chando vīryo vyāyāmo niṣkramaḥ parākramasthāmārambhaś cetasaḥ saṃpragrahaḥ sātatyam /
SA20srabhu_u:1000_1: yac catvāri smṛtyupasthānāny adhipatiṃ kṛtvāviparyāsasaṃgṛhītā smṛtir navākārā navākāracittasthitisaṃgrāhikā /
SA20srabhu_u:1001_1: tad etat sarvam abhisamasyāryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaś cārakaraṇīye ca vihārakaraṇīye cāvasthitaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:1001_4: śamatho vipaśyanā ca / tatra yā ca samyagdṛṣṭiḥ, yaś ca samyaksaṃkalpaḥ, yaś ca samyagvyāyāma iyaṃ vipaśyanā /
SA20srabhu_u:1001_5: tatra yā ca samyaksmṛtir yaś ca samyaksamādhir ayaṃ śamathaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:1002_0: evaṃ pariśuddhān vākkarmāntājīvān niśritya śamathavipaśyanāṃ bhāvayati kālena kālaṃ niravaśeṣasaṃyojanaprahāṇaṃ sākṣātkaroty agraphalam arhattvaṃ (Śbh II 236) prāpnoti /
SA20srabhu_u:1002_1: prākarṣikaś ca bhāvanāmārgaḥ kālāntarābhyāsena kleśān prajahāti /
SA20srabhu_u:1002_2: jñānamātrapratibaddhas tu darśanamārgo jñānotpattimātrakeṇa kleśān prajahāti /
SA20srabhu_u:1003_0: iti ya evam eṣām anayānupūrvyā saptatriṃśatāṃ bodhipakṣyāṇāṃ dharmāṇām abhyāsaḥ paricayaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:1004_2: tatra bhāvanāphalaṃ katamat / āha / catvāri śrāmaṇyaphalāni / srota-āpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam agraphalam arhattvam /
SA20srabhu_u:1005_0: tatra katamac chrāmaṇyam, katamat phalam / āha / mārgaḥ, kleśaprahāṇaṃ phalam / api ca pūrvotpannasya mārgasya paścād utpanno mārgaḥ phalaṃ madhyo viśiṣṭo vā sadṛśo vā /
SA20srabhu_u:1005_1: punas tatra kena kāraṇena catvāri vyavasthāpitāni /
SA20srabhu_u:1006_1: tadyathā nirvastukānāṃ kleśānām apāyagamanīyānām apāyagamanahetubhūtānāṃ prahāṇāt pratipakṣotpādāc ca srota-āpattiphalaṃ vyavasthāpitam /
SA20srabhu_u:1006_2: trayāṇāṃ tu saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād vyavasthāpitaṃ bhagavatā triṣu pakṣeṣu,
SA20srabhu_u:1007_0: tatra gṛhipakṣe satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ, yayāyam ādita eva na prayujyata ity ādita uttrāsikā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:1009_1_0: tatroccalitaś ca bhavati, na ca mithyāpratipanno 'pi tv anabhyāsāt tasya yāvad yathābhūtadarśanaṃ
SA20srabhu_u:1009_1_1: na bhavati jñeye vastuni tāvat kāṅkṣā vimatayo vibandhakarā bhavanti (Śbh II 240)
SA20srabhu_u:1011_1: tasyāsya srota-āpannasya paraṃ sapta bhavā avaśiṣṭā bhavanti /
SA20srabhu_u:1011_2: sa cāsya janmaprabandho yadā ca janmaprābandhikān kleśān prajahāti devabhavasaṃgṛhītān manuṣyabhavasaṃgṛhītāṃś ca,
SA20srabhu_u:1011_3: yeṣāṃ prahāṇāt param ekaṃ devabhavam abhinirvartayaty ekaṃ manuṣyabhavam /
SA20srabhu_u:1012_1: yadā tu devabhavam eva kevalam abhinirvartayati,
SA20srabhu_u:1014_1: tat punaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ trayāṇām saṃyojanānāṃ prahāṇād rāgadveṣamohānāṃ ca tanutvād bhagavatā vyavasthāpitam,
SA20srabhu_u:1015_1: tatra ye rāgadveṣamohamānavitarkacariteṣu pudgaleṣu pūrvaṃ tāvac (Śbh II 242) caritaviśodhana ālambane caritaṃ viśodhayitavyaṃ tataḥ paścāc cittasthitim adhigacchanti /
SA20srabhu_u:1015_2: teṣāṃ pratiniyatam eva tad ālambanam avaśyaṃ tais tenālambanena prayoktavyam /
SA20srabhu_u:1016_0: samabhāgacaritasya tu yatra priyārohitā tatra tena prayoktavyaṃ kevalaṃ cittasthitaye,
SA20srabhu_u:1016_1: na tu caritaviśuddhaye / yathā samabhāgacarita evaṃ mandarajasko veditavyaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:1017_0: ayaṃ tv eṣāṃ viśeṣḥ / rāgādicaritaḥ prayujyamānaś cireṇādhigantā bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:1017_1: samabhāgacarito nāticireṇa, mandarajaskas tv āśu tvaritatvaritaṃ cittasthitim adhigacchati /
SA20srabhu_u:1018_2: samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya mandarajaskasya ca katamāni liṅgāni /
SA20srabhu_u:1018_3: āha / samabhāgacaritasya pudgalasya sarvāṇi tāni liṅgāni saṃvidyante yāni rāgādicaritānām,
SA20srabhu_u:1018_4: tāni rāgādīni tu nādhimātrāṇi na pradhānāni yathā rāgādicaritānām /
SA20srabhu_u:1018_5: samaprāptāni tāni bhavanti, pratyayeṣu satsu prajñāyante /
SA20srabhu_u:1019_3: prasādabahulo medhāvī puṇyavān guṇānvitaś ca bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:1020_2: tatra trīṇy āvaraṇāni karmāvaraṇaṃ kleśāvaraṇaṃ vipākāvaraṇam /
SA20srabhu_u:1021_1: yac cānyad api kiṃcit karma saṃcetanīyaṃ gurukarma vipakvavipākaṃ mārgotpattaye nibandhakārakam /
SA20srabhu_u:1022_1: yā dṛṣṭe dharme caritaviśodhanenālambanaviśodhanena na śakyate viśodhayitum /
SA20srabhu_u:1023_4: apratibalo bhavati subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇām artham ājñātum /
SA20srabhu_u:1024_1: tatrādiśuddhiḥ śīlaṃ ca suviśuddhaṃ dṛṣṭiś ca ṛjvī /
SA20srabhu_u:1025_0: tatra śīlaṃ suviśuddhaṃ daśabhiḥ kāraṇair veditavyam /
SA20srabhu_u:1026_0: tatra dṛṣṭyṛjutā, śraddhāṃ saṃprayogāt, adhimuktisaṃprayogāt, vigatamāyāśāṭhyatayā, sucintitadharmārthasya niḥkāṅkṣānirvicikitsāprayoganiryāṇatayā /
SA20srabhu_u:1027_0: yā dṛṣṭiḥ śraddhayā saṃprayuktā, asmād dharmavinayād asaṃhāryā bhavati /
SA20srabhu_u:1028_0: adhimuktyā ca saṃprayuktā, buddhānāṃ buddhaśrāvakāṇāṃ ca,
SA20srabhu_u:1029_1: yayā ṛjuko bhavati / ṛjukajātīyo yathānuśiṣṭaś ca pratipadyate,
SA20srabhu_u:1030_0: dharmāṇāṃ vānityatām ārabhya duḥkhatāṃ śūnyatām anātmatām arthaḥ suvicintito bhavati sutulitaḥ sūpaparīkṣitaḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:1031_0: itīyaṃ caturākārā dṛṣṭir yathoddiṣṭā dṛṣṭyṛjutety ucyate //
SA20srabhu_u:1032_1: tatra saṃbhārasaṃbhṛtatā, vistareṇa saṃbhāraḥ pūrvam eva nirdiṣṭaḥ /
SA20srabhu_u:1033_0: tatra puṇyasaṃbhāro yenāpy etarhy ānulomikāḥ pariṣkārāḥ pracurā bhavanti pradakṣiṇāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:1034_1: pratibalaḥ subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ (Śbh II 248) dharmāṇām artham ājñātum,
SA20srabhu_u:1035_0: tatra pūrvako yenaitarhi paripakvānīndriyāṇi labhate pūrvakuśalamūlopacayāt /
SA20srabhu_u:1036_1: tathā paripakvendriyasya śīlasaṃvara indriyasaṃvara iti vistareṇa pūrvavat /
SA20srabhu_u:1037_1: tatra prasādabahulatā, na śāstari kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati prasīdaty adhimucyate,
SA20srabhu_u:1038_2: cireṇa dharmam arthaṃ ca na vismārayati,
SA20srabhu_u:1039_1: tatra kṛtapuṇyatā yayābhirūpo bhavati darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko dīrghāyur bhavati,
SA20srabhu_u:1039_2: ādeyavākyo maheśākhyo jñāto bhavati mahāpuṇyo lābhī cīvarādīnām,
SA20srabhu_u:1040_1: tatra guṇānvita iti guṇā alpecchatādayo veditavyāḥ,
SA20srabhu_u:1040_2: yathoktāḥ śramaṇālaṃkāre, tair ayaṃ prakṛtyaiva samanvāgato bhavati /
